If damaged, its repair fees have to be paid out-of-pocket. With a half-decent salary, they can at least afford to rent a one-bedroom apartment on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

skills.description: Goes into the Counter state for 1 turn. If attacked by a target while in this state, immediately use "Smite of Frost" on the attacker. This effect can only be triggered 1 time.

skills.name: Support
skills.description: When the phase starts, immediately summon Silvermane Soldiers or Silvermane Cannoneers.

skills.name: Support
skills.description: When the phase starts, immediately summons Silvermane Cannoneers.

skills.name: Support
skills.description: When the phase starts, immediately summons Silvermane Lieutenant (Complete).

1004030.name: Bronya
1004030.description:
Successor to Belobog's Guardian, and commander of the Silvermane Guards.
Bronya can use various tactics to attack her enemies, and greatly enhance the battle prowess of all allies.

skills.name: Windrider Bullet
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Combat Redeployment
skills.description: Dispels all debuffs on a friendly unit except Bronya, and causes them to take action immediately.

skills.name: Coordinated Reinforcement
skills.description: Summons Silvermane Soldiers or Silvermane Gunners

skills.name: Suppressive Fire
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action.

1004031.name: Bronya (Complete)
1004031.description:
A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is Belobog's Guardian successor and commander of the Silvermane Guards.
Bronya (complete) can use various tactics to attack her enemies, and greatly enhance the battle prowess of all allies.

skills.name: Windrider Bullet
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Combat Redeployment
skills.description: Dispels all debuffs on a friendly unit except Bronya, causes them to take action immediately, and slightly increases their DMG dealt.

skills.name: Coordinated Reinforcement
skills.description: Summons Silvermane Soldiers or Silvermane Gunners

skills.name: Suppressive Fire
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action.

1004032.name: Bronya (Illusion)
1004032.description:
Successor to Belobog's Guardian, and commander of the Silvermane Guards.
Bronya can use various tactics to attack her enemies, and greatly enhance the battle prowess of friendly units. This entity is a phantom borne from your memories.

skills.name: Windrider Bullet
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Combat Redeployment
skills.description: Dispels all debuffs on a friendly unit except Bronya, and causes this unit to take action immediately.

skills.name: Coordinated Reinforcement
skills.description: Summons Silvermane Cannoneers.

skills.name: Suppressive Fire
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action.

skills.name: Marching Orders
skills.description: Increases SPD of all friendly units.

skills.name: Carried By Inertia
skills.description: Slightly increases Bronya's SPD and ATK at the start of her turn. This effect is stackable, but is dispelled when Bronya's Weakness is broken.

skills.name: Shared Hatred
skills.description: When Gepard is downed, Bronya immediately takes action and becomes Enhanced, increasing her SPD. When in this state, Bronya will summon even more Silvermane Cannoneers.

skills.name: Tacit Teamwork
skills.description: Gepard and Bronya take turns switching between the Main Attacker and Support state. When in the Main Attacker state, their Toughness Protection is removed and they take normal actions. When in Support state, their SPD is reduced, they gain Toughness Protection, and they can only use Coordinated Reinforcement and Combat Redeployment.

1005010.name: Cocolia, Mother of Deception
1005010.description: After being assimilated by the overflowing Fragmentum energy of the Stellaron, the Supreme Guardian transforms into a singer able to control Imaginary Energy and the mouthpiece of its promised "new world."

skills.name: Bone-Shattering Cold
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Soulrend Coldstream
skills.description: Deals massive Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Icy Rain of Annihilation
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Heartless Annihilator Call
skills.description: Summons Lances of the Eternal Freeze.

skills.name: Genesis Chord
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a high chance of causing Imprisonment.

skills.name: The Creation's Prelude
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. The next action uses "Last Choir of Genesis" on all targets.

skills.name: Last Choir of Genesis
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Harbinger of Annihilation
skills.description: Locks Onto a single target. The next action uses "Soulrend Coldstream."

skills.name: Creator's Resolve
skills.description: After changing phases, slightly increases SPD and deals Imaginary DMG when attacking.

1005013.name: Cocolia, Mother of Deception (Illusion)
1005013.description: After being assimilated by the overflowing Fragmentum energy of the Stellaron, the Supreme Guardian transforms into a singer able to control Imaginary Energy and the mouthpiece of its promised "new world." This entity is a phantom borne from your memories.

1005014.name: Annihilator of Desolation Mistral: Mother of Deception
1005014.description: After being assimilated by the overflowing Fragmentum energy of the Stellaron, the Supreme Guardian transforms into a chantress able to control Imaginary Energy and the mouthpiece of the Stellaron's promised "new world."

skills.name: Unstoppable Momentum
skills.description: Damage received by Annihilator of Desolation Mistral: Mother of Deception is greatly reduced. However, after being Weakness Broken, its action is additionally delayed, and it receives more DMG, as well as recovering allies' Skill Points and activating all allies' Ultimates.

skills.name: Desolation Mistral
skills.description: The Annihilator of Desolation Mistral: Mother of Deception's will <u>transfer</u> their Weakness Type to Lance of the Eternal Freeze.

skills.name: Nowhere to Escape
skills.description: When Annihilator of Desolation Mistral: Mother of Deception uses Soulrend Coldstream or Genesis Chord, these abilities will be <u>unleashed additional times</u> against targets locked on by Lance of the Eternal Freeze.

skills.name: Tenacious Resolve
skills.description: Reduces DMG received by all friendly units, but every Weakness-Type they have increases DMG received.

1012010.name: Automaton Hound
1012010.description:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. It looks like a transportation vehicle whose purpose has long been forgotten.
In combat, Automaton Hounds can provide support and restore HP to its allies.

skills.name: Vertical Strike
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Self-Healing Module
skills.description: Immediately recovers all friendly units' HP.

1012011.name: Automaton Hound
1012011.description:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. It looks like a transportation vehicle whose purpose has long been forgotten.
In combat, Automaton Hounds can provide support and restore HP to its allies.

skills.name: Vertical Strike
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Self-Healing Module
skills.description: Immediately recovers all friendly units' HP.

1012020.name: Automaton Spider
1012020.description:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology, tasked with replacing humans in performing the most basic forms of physical labor.
In combat, Automaton Spiders are highly unstable, capable of exploding when damaged.

skills.name: Ram
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Timed Module
skills.description: The next action uses Self-Exploding Module.

skills.name: Self-Exploding Module
skills.description: Self-destructs, dealing Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Chains of Destruction
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to adjacent units when suffering a killing blow.

1012021.name: Automaton Spider
1012021.description:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology, tasked with replacing humans in performing the most basic forms of physical labor.
In combat, Automaton Spiders are highly unstable, capable of exploding when damaged.

skills.name: Ram
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Timed Module
skills.description: The next action uses Self-Exploding Module.

skills.name: Self-Exploding Module
skills.description: Self-destructs, dealing Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Chains of Destruction
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to adjacent units when suffering a killing blow.

1012030.name: Automaton Beetle
1012030.description:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. A signal light is placed on its legs, and the unit may have been used for mining or construction operations.
In combat, Automaton Beetles can create forcefields to shield themselves.

skills.name: Unstable Forcefield
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target, and grants a Barrier to another friendly unit. The Barrier nullifies all DMG received except for DoT until after the friendly unit is attacked.

1012032.name: Amber King
1012032.description: Invincible. There's no other way to put it.

skills.name: Amber Assault
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target.

1012040.name: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit
1012040.description:
A mechanical device controlled by Svarog.
When active on battlefield for certain turns, it will ruthlessly attack its enemies.

skills.name: Oppressive Embrace
skills.description: Deals Restrained targets Physical DMG equal to a percentage of their Max HP.

skills.name: Oppressive Embrace
skills.description: Restrains a single target, and deals Physical DMG 1 time. When this unit has their Weakness Broken, dispels the Restrain status from the target.

skills.name: Disabling Field
skills.description: Deals Restrained targets Physical DMG equal to a percentage of their Max HP.

skills.name: Controlled Blasting
skills.description: The Auxiliary Robot Arm explodes, dealing massive Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Overload Warning
skills.description: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit enters Overload mode and immediately removes Restrain status from friendly units. When entering this mode, Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit will cast Controlled Blasting in its next action.

1012041.name: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit
1012041.description:
A mechanical device controlled by Svarog.
When active on battlefield for certain turns, it will ruthlessly attack its enemies.

skills.name: Oppressive Embrace

skills.name: Oppressive Embrace
skills.description: Restrains a single target, and deals Physical DMG 1 time. When this unit has their Weakness Broken or drops below a certain amount of HP, dispels the Restrain status from the target.

skills.name: Disabling Field
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to a percentage of their Max HP to Restrained targets.

skills.name: Controlled Blasting

skills.name: Overload Warning

1012042.name: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit
1012042.description:
A mechanical device controlled by Svarog.
After being active on the battlefield for a certain number of turns, this robot arm will ruthlessly attack its targets.

1013010.name: Automaton Grizzly
1013010.description:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. It has been reinforced with durable armor, so it can charge forward and protect the Silvermane Guards.
In combat, Automaton Grizzlys will summon Automaton Spiders and unleash a powerful charged attack.

skills.name: Detonation Order
skills.description: Summons Automaton Spider.

skills.name: Enrage Order
skills.description: Has a chance to Taunt all targets.

skills.name: Overcombust Order
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. The next action uses "Purge Order" on all targets.

skills.name: Purge Order
skills.description: Deals Massive Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Destruction Order
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

1013011.name: Automaton Grizzly (Bug)
1013011.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an automaton pieced together with Old World technology. It's been reinforced with durable armor to charge forward and protect the Silvermane Guards.
In combat, Automaton Grizzlies (Bug) will send out a signal to summon Automaton Spiders and Beatles, and at the same time unleash powerful charged attacks.

skills.name: Detonation Order
skills.description: Summons Automaton Spider and Automaton Beetle.

skills.name: Enrage Order
skills.description: Has a high chance to Taunt all targets.

skills.name: Overcombust Order
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. The next action uses "Purge Order" on all targets.

skills.name: Purge Order

skills.name: Destruction Order
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

1013012.description:

In combat, Automaton Grizzly (Complete) will send out a signal to summon Automaton Spiders, and at the same time unleash powerful charged attacks.

1013020.name: Automaton Direwolf
1013020.description:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. This rare type of humanoid automaton is equipped with a chainsaw on its right arm, presumably used for mining or construction operations.
In combat, Automaton Direwolfs will use their chainsaw to Bleed enemies, dealing DoT.

skills.name: Felling Order
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target, with a chance to Bleed the hit target. If the hit target is not Shielded, then a random ally of theirs suffers "Dismantle" for 1 time.

skills.name: Lock On Target
skills.description: Locks Onto a single target. The next action on the target will cast "Felling Order."

skills.name: Disintegration Order
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

skills.name: Dismantle
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

skills.name: Targeting Order

skills.name: Speed Refactor
skills.description: Enters Speedy Recovery state when downed, returning to battle after a certain number of turns and further increasing SPD by a slight amount. The SPD boost is stackable.

1014010.name: Svarog
1014010.description:
An ancient relic from the Old World, that was originally used as an automated control unit by the Geomarrow Development Group. Unlike the vast majority of machines that lack intellect and can only act on command, Svarog is capable of much more complex thinking.
In battle, Svarog summons mechanical arms to grab and control his enemies, delivering devastating attacks.

skills.name: Banishing Punch
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Burning Beam
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and delays their action.

skills.name: Oppressive Embrace
skills.description: Restrains a single target, preventing them from taking action or being targeted. The Restraint is dispelled if the Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit suffers Weakness Break.

skills.name: Shrewd Bombing
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to all targets, with a high chance to reduce their DEF.

skills.name: Controlled Blasting
skills.description: The Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit explodes, dealing massive Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Overload Warning
skills.description: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit enters Overload Countdown, causing the next action to cast Controlled Blasting.

skills.name: Boost Deployment
skills.description: Summons Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit.

1014011.name: Svarog (Complete)
1014011.description:

The referent entity is an ancient relic from the Old World, that was originally used as an automated control unit by the Geomarrow Development Group. Unlike the vast majority of machines that lack intellect and can only act on command, Svarog is capable of much more complex thinking.
In battle, Svarog (Complete) can summon various machines as well as a robot arm unit to grab and control enemies while unleashing devastating strikes.

skills.name: Boost Deployment

skills.name: Power Amplification
skills.description: Slightly increases the DMG dealt by all friendly units. This DMG boosting effect is stackable.

skills.name: Emergency Support
skills.description: Summons Automaton Beetle and Automaton Hound at random.

skills.name: Tactical Support
skills.description: Summons Automaton Direwolf.

1022010.name: Everwinter Shadewalker
1022010.description:
Shades that wander in the Fragmentum after the arrival of the Eternal Freeze. It mimics the form of the Silvermane Guards in a twisted manner. Fitted with the same uniformed armors as the Belobog warriors, its skull is however replaced by an icicle of faceless ice.
Everwinter Shadewalkers will swing their ice ax and slow their enemies in battle.

skills.name: Frost Crush
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target and delays their action.

1022020.name: Incineration Shadewalker
1022020.description:
Shades that wander in the Fragmentum after the arrival of the Eternal Freeze. It mimics the form of the Silvermane Guards in a twisted manner. Fitted with the same uniformed armors as the Belobog warriors, its skull is however replaced by faceless embers.
Incineration Shadewalkers will swing their fiery ax and burn their enemies in battle.

skills.name: Scorching Crush
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Burn the target.

1023010.name: Searing Prowler
1023010.description:
A machine unit prowling in the Fragmentum. Undoubtedly, this monstrosity is not a human creation, but one that was born out of the perversion of the Fragmentum.
Searing Prowler's attacks will deal extra damage against enemies afflicted with Burn.

skills.name: Crimson Blade
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Burn the target.

skills.name: Combustion Slash
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target. This attack prioritizes targets afflicted with Burn.

skills.name: Melt
skills.description: After attacking a Burned target, receives a DMG increase.

skills.name: High-Temperature Operation
skills.description: Slightly increases ATK and greatly increases SPD. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.

skills.name: Dancing Cinders
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to all targets. Targets suffering from Burn are dealt an extra Fire DMG and have Burn removed.

1023011.name: Searing Prowler (Bug)
1023011.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a machine unit prowling in the Fragmentum. Undoubtedly, this monstrosity is not a human creation, but one that was born out of the perversion of the Fragmentum.
The attacks of Searing Prowler (Bug) will deal extra damage against Burned enemies.

skills.name: Crimson Blade
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single target, with a chance to Burn the target.

skills.name: Combustion Slash
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target. This attack prioritizes targets afflicted with Burn.

skills.name: High-Temperature Operation
skills.description: Slightly increases ATK and greatly increases SPD. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.

skills.name: Dancing Cinders
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to all targets. Targets suffering from Burn are dealt an extra Fire DMG. And at the same time, there's a chance to Burn any targets that are attacked.

skills.name: Augury of Fireburst
skills.description: The next action uses Scorching Burst.

skills.name: Scorching Burst
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to all targets. Burned target will explode, subsequently dealing Fire DMG to the Burned target and units adjacent to the target. The Burn status will be removed afterward.

skills.name: Melt
skills.description: After attacking a Burned target, receives a DMG increase.

1023020.name: Frigid Prowler
1023020.description:
A machine unit prowling in the Fragmentum. Undoubtedly, this monstrosity is not a human creation, but one that was born out of the perversion of the Fragmentum.
Frigid Prowlers will attract Everwinter Shadewalkers and reduce its enemy's SPD and Ice RES.

skills.name: Ice Wheel Fist
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Summon Otherling
skills.description: Summons Everwinter Shadewalker.

skills.name: Frozen Storm
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to all targets, with a high chance to Deep Freeze the targets.

skills.name: Devour Otherling
skills.description: Devours 1 Everwinter Shadewalker to increase ATK and Locks Onto a single target. If there are no Everwinter Shadewalkers on the field, DEF is decreased.

skills.name: Devour Otherling
skills.description: Devours 1 Everwinter Shadewalker to increase ATK and Locks Onto a single target. If there are no Everwinter Shadewalkers on the field, DEF is decreased.

skills.name: Ice Wheel Crusher
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Deep Freeze the target.

1023021.name: Frigid Prowler (Bug)
1023021.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a machine unit prowling in the Fragmentum. Undoubtedly, this monstrosity is not a human creation, but one that was born out of the perversion of the Fragmentum.
Frigid Prowler (Bug) will attract Everwinter Shadewalker and reduce its opponents' SPD and Ice RES.

skills.name: Ice Wheel Fist
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Summon Otherling
skills.description: Summons Everwinter Shadewalker.

skills.name: Frozen Storm
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to all targets, with a high chance to Deep Freeze the targets.

skills.name: Devour Otherling
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Deep Freeze the target.

skills.name: Ice Wheel Crusher
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Deep Freeze the target.

skills.name: Devour Otherling
skills.description: Devouring Everwinter Shadewalkers increases ATK and unleashes Blazing Freeze in the next action. The more Everwinter Shadewalkers devoured, the more times Blazing Freeze will be used in the next action. If there are no Everwinter Shadewalkers on the field, DEF is decreased.

skills.name: Blazing Freeze
skills.description: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets, with a high chance to Deep Freeze the targets.

1023022.name: IPC Team Leader Illusion
1023022.description: An Interastral Peace Corporation senior staff member with a minimal rank of project team leader. The mech they drive belongs to the IPC. If damaged, its repair fees have to be paid out-of-pocket. With a half-decent salary, they can at least afford to rent a one-bedroom apartment on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

skills.name: Devour Otherling
skills.description: Devouring Everwinter Shadewalkers increases this unit's ATK and unleashes Blazing Freeze in the next action. The more Everwinter Shadewalkers devoured, the more times Blazing Freeze will be used in the next action. If there are no Everwinter Shadewalkers on the field, DEF is decreased.

skills.name: Frozen Storm
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to all targets, with a high chance to afflict Deep Freeze on the targets.

skills.name: Blazing Freeze
skills.description: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets, with a high chance to afflict Deep Freeze on the targets.

2002010.name: Cloud Knights Patroller
2002010.description: Member of the ground patrol division of the Xianzhou Luofu Cloud Knights. Wearing a light set of silver armor and with a Devastator Glaive in hand, they are in charge of maintaining order in every delve.

skills.name: Cloud Edge
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target with a high chance to slightly increase the DMG taken by the target.

2002020.name: Flying Sword
2002020.description: Qi-controlled hovering attack unit, also named "Flying Sword." Closely connected to the wielder's psyche and can be used as an extension of its wielder's will.

skills.name: Jadecarve Strike
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

2002021.name: Flying Sword
2002021.description: Qi-controlled hovering attack unit, also named "Flying Sword." Closely connected to the wielder's psyche and can be used as an extension of its wielder's will.

skills.name: Jadecarve Strike
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

2002030.name: Wraith Warden
2002030.description:
A somber warrior that accompanies the Judges of the Ten-Lords Commission to execute missions.
Adorned with the black and white mask that symbolizes the netherworld envoy, they wield a guillotine blade, their strikes echoing the weighty and unyielding duty of the Ten-Lords Commission.

skills.name: Sawing Evil
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and has a chance to inflict Reverberation to the target. After targets afflicted with Reverberation receive an attack, they enter Strong Reverberation and then have Reverberation dispelled. Targets with Strong Reverberation cannot take action.

2002031.name: Wraith Warden
2002031.description:
A somber warrior that accompanies the Judges of the Ten-Lords Commission to execute missions.
Adorned with the black and white mask that symbolizes the netherworld envoy, they wield a guillotine blade, their strikes echoing the weighty and unyielding duty of the Ten-Lords Commission.

skills.name: Sawing Evil
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

2002032.name: Wraith Warden
2002032.description:
A somber warrior that accompanies the Judges of the Ten-Lords Commission to execute missions.

After targets afflicted with Reverberation receive an attack, they enter Strong Reverberation and then have Reverberation dispelled. Targets with Strong Reverberation cannot take action.

2004010.name: Stellaron Hunter: Kafka
2004010.description: One of the Stellaron Hunters. A beautiful assassin wearing an enigmatic smile, she excels in manipulation and various weaponry. It was by her design that the Astral Express was led here, all of which was simply part of a certain plan...

skills.name: Midnight Tumult
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

skills.name: Caressing Moonlight
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target. If the primary target is Shocked, inflicts Shock on the secondary units as well.

skills.name: Silent and Sharp Mockery
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Spirit Whisper
skills.description: Has a high chance of Dominating a single target and Advancing their action forward to immediately attack a random ally of theirs.

skills.name: Tremble
skills.description: If the target is currently Shocked, directly causes Shock DMG 1 time.

skills.name: Cruelty
skills.description: When friendly units (apart from Kafka) or Dominated targets attack the Shocked primary target, unleash an extra Lightning attack. This can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

2004011.name: Stellaron Hunter: Kafka (Complete)
2004011.description: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is one of the Stellaron Hunters. A beautiful assassin wearing an enigmatic smile, she excels in manipulation and weaponry of various kinds. It was by her design that the Astral Express was led where it is now, all of which was simply part of a certain unknown plan...

skills.name: Spirit Whisper

skills.name: Seething Whisper of the Fallen
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target. At the same time, deals Lightning DMG to all other Shocked targets.

skills.name: Psychological Suggestion
skills.description: Applies Psychological Suggestion to multiple targets, and adds Revelation onto the Action Order. The next time Revelation takes action, any targets with Psychological Suggestion will become Dominated.

skills.name: Griever
skills.description: Every time a target triggers the Shock state, DMG dealt by Kafka slightly increases.

skills.name: Spirit Whisper
skills.description: Has a high chance of Dominating a single target and Advancing their action forward to immediately use their Basic ATK on a random ally of theirs.

skills.name: Deprivation
skills.description: When Kafka acts, if any IPC Workers possess Performance Points, Kafka will seize the points and cast Caressing Moonlight. Seized Performance Points can greatly increase the DMG Kafka deals in this attack.

2004014.name: Soulhook Sovereign
2004014.description: One of the Stellaron Hunters. A beautiful assassin wearing an enigmatic smile, she excels in manipulation and various weaponry. It was by her design that the Astral Express was led here, all of which was simply part of a certain plan...

skills.name: Puppet Understudy
skills.description: Applies <u>Madden</u> to summons.

skills.name: Soulcaller
skills.description: Summons 2 Elite Enemies to assist in battle. When a target deals DMG to summons, Soulhook Sovereign will lose an equal amount of HP. When summons are Weakness Broken, their action is further delayed. After any summon is defeated, its Weakness Type is transferred to the other summon still in the battle, and applies <u>Sanguine Gaze</u> to it.

2004020.name: Cloud Knight Lieutenant: Yanqing
2004020.description: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age.

skills.name: Rapturous Wind

2004023.description: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age. This entity is a phantom borne from your memories.

skills.name: Rapturous Wind

2004026.description: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age.

skills.name: Rapturous Wind
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to one designated target. Yanqing and all Flying Swords gain 1 stack of "Chilling Light" and slightly increase DMG dealt.

skills.name: Swallow Return

skills.name: Cloud Knight Linebreaker
skills.description: Black Mud will appear in battle to enhance the Boss. After enhancement, "Cloud Knight Lieutenant: Yanqing (Corrupted)" will immediately use "Swallow Return."

2005010.name: Maddened Feixiao
2005010.description:
The Merlin's Claw, who swallowed down the Crimson Moon to salvage the crisis and therefore descended into madness.
Possessed by the monster within born of yesteryear's unending battles, Feixiao turned into a tireless avatar of war. As her friend and present enemy, you understand that the only "antidote"... is to keep fighting.

skills.name: Gunblade: Swordfang
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Great Ax: Irontalon
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict <u>Weaken</u>.

skills.name: Heaven's Binds
skills.description: Enhances self to gain additional action.

skills.name: Wreathed in Storm
skills.description: Resonates with all parts of the Ecliptic Inner Beast and dispels their Weakness Broken state. This unit cannot be attacked before its next action. In the next action, this unit will use Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth on all targets.

skills.name: Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth
skills.description: Deals massive Wind DMG to all targets and Enhances this unit based on the parts that have yet to be Weakness Broken. Every part that has yet to be Broken will increase the DMG dealt by this ability, and this ability will enhance the parts that are not Weakness Broken.

skills.name: Passing Tempest
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Beastbond Strike
skills.description: The additional action from Shadow of "Feixiao" will resonate with the Ecliptic Inner Beast's body parts. Resonance will restore a certain amount of Toughness for the Ecliptic Inner Beast's parts and increase the Toughness value reduced when attacked. The next action becomes Enhanced. Resonance with "Nebula Devourer" has a high chance of inflicting <u>Outrage</u> on all targets. Resonance with "Planeshred Claws" additionally greatly increases DMG. Resonance with "Worldpurge Tail" has a high chance of inflicting <u>Weaken</u> on all targets.

skills.name: Safeguard
skills.description: Enters the Safeguard state. While not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

2011010.name: Entranced Ingenium: Obedient Dracolion
2011010.description: An ingenium casually made by craftsmasters of the Artisanship Commission. It was originally an inanimate alarm bell used for warnings, but now it has been given a short-lived "life" due to certain mutations.

skills.name: Lion's Roar
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target, with a chance to Weaken them.

2011020.name: Entranced Ingenium: Golden Cloud Toad
2011020.description: An ingenium casually made by craftsmasters of the Artisanship Commission. It was originally an inanimate burner used for purifying the air, but now it has been given a short-lived "life" due to certain mutations.

skills.name: Dense Fog
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a chance to reduce the target's SPD.

2012010.name: Entranced Ingenium: Illumination Dragonfish
2012010.description: An ingenium casually made by craftsmasters of the Artisanship Commission. It was originally an inanimate illuminator used for casting light upon darkness, but now it has been given a short-lived "life" due to certain mutations.

skills.name: Nightly Luminosity
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to all targets, with a high chance to reduce their DEF.

skills.name: Candle Flame
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Fire DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to reduce their DEF.

2013010.name: Aurumaton Gatekeeper
2013010.description:
Garrison aurumaton created with ancient ingenium technology.
Countless years ago, the aurumatons set sail with the Xianzhou to seek divine recipes of immortality, and were tasked to oversee humanity and to aid humankind during warfare. However, after countless rebellions, they were finally overpowered by the Xianzhou natives.
Now, all aurumatons are strictly controlled with talismans, and are employed to guard important places.

skills.name: Farewell Etiquette
skills.description: The Sanction Rate level increases when your team uses Skills or Ultimates to attack. When the Sanction Rate reaches its level cap, enters Sanction mode and summons Entranced Ingenium: Illumination Dragonfish.

skills.name: Dread
skills.description: Increases Sanction Rate level and deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets. Has a high chance to inflict Weaken on the targets.

skills.name: Restraint
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Enchainment
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment.

2013011.name: Aurumaton Gatekeeper (Bug)
2013011.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the garrison aurumatons created with ancient ingenium technology.
Countless years ago, the aurumatons set sail with the Xianzhou to seek divine recipes of immortality, and were tasked to oversee humanity and to aid humankind during warfare. However, after countless rebellions, they were finally overpowered by the Xianzhou natives.
Now, all aurumatons are strictly controlled with talismans, and are employed to guard important places.

skills.name: Penal Code
skills.description: Sanction Rate level increases when allies use Skills or Ultimates to attack. When Sanction Rate reaches its level cap, this unit enters Sanction Mode: Punisher, locks on to 3 targets, and summons Entranced Ingenium: Illumination Dragonfish.

skills.name: Dread
skills.description: Increases Sanction Rate level and deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets. Has a high chance to inflict Weaken on the targets.

skills.name: Track Down
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to the locked-on single target, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked target.

2013012.name: Aurumaton Gatekeeper
2013012.description:
Garrison aurumaton created with ancient ingenium technology.
Countless years ago, the aurumatons set sail with the Xianzhou to seek divine recipes of immortality, and were tasked with overseeing humanity and aiding humankind during warfare. However, after countless rebellions, they were finally overpowered by the Xianzhou natives.
Now, all aurumatons are strictly controlled with talismans and are employed to guard important places.

skills.name: Farewell Etiquette
skills.description: The Sanction Rate level increases when your team uses Skills or Ultimates to attack. When the Sanction Rate reaches its level cap, enters Sanction mode and summons Entranced Ingenium: Illumination Dragonfish.

skills.name: Dread
skills.description: Increases Sanction Rate level and deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets. Has a high chance to inflict Weaken on the targets.

skills.name: Restraint
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Enchainment
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a small chance of inflicting Imprisonment.

2013020.name: Aurumaton Spectral Envoy
2013020.description:
A law-enforcing aurumaton engraved with the Ten-Lords Martial Scriptures and taking orders from the Ten-Lords Commission.
Living beings are susceptible to the corporeal and mental existence of the self, but gold and metal will never be swayed and will unwaveringly follow the Ten-Lords' edicts.
These aurumaton law enforcers use their strength to subdue evils that have strayed from the natural order of life, and bring them to the Netherworld to meet their sentence. Its authority is sometimes even greater than that of a judge.

skills.name: Adjudicate
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Subdue
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Reverberation on the target. After targets afflicted with Reverberation receive an attack, they enter the Strong Reverberation state and then have the Reverberation state dispelled. Targets with Strong Reverberation cannot take action.

skills.name: Revert Yin and Yang
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets and has a chance to inflict Reverberation.

skills.name: Heaven's Fall
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target. If the target is afflicted with Strong Reverberation, they additionally take Physical DMG, and Strong Reverberation is then dispelled.

skills.name: Soul Warrant
skills.description: When there are targets afflicted with Strong Reverberation on the field, lock on to those targets and during the next action, use Heaven's Fall on them.

skills.name: Heaven's Fall
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target. If the target is afflicted with Strong Reverberation, they additionally take Physical DMG, and Strong Reverberation is then dispelled.

2013021.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a law-enforcing aurumaton engraved with the Ten-Lords Martial Scriptures and taking orders from the Ten-Lords Commission.
Living beings are susceptible to the corporeal and mental existence of the self, but gold and metal will never be swayed and will unwaveringly follow the Ten-Lords' edicts.
These aurumaton law enforcers use their strength to subdue evils that have strayed from the natural order of life, and bring them to the Netherworld to meet their sentence. Its authority is sometimes even greater than that of a judge.

Targets with Strong Reverberation cannot take action.

skills.name: Soul Warrant
skills.description: When there are targets afflicted with Strong Reverberation on the field, lock on to those targets and during the next action, use Heaven's Fall on them

skills.name: Summons Prison Guard
skills.description: Summons Wraith Warden.

skills.name: Heaven's Fall
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target. If the target is afflicted with Strong Reverberation, they additionally take Physical DMG, and Strong Reverberation is then dispelled.

2022010.name: Mara-Struck Soldier
2022010.description: Soldiers of the Xianzhou who somehow fell into madness. Their bodies continue to grow and mutate and have long lost their humanoid form. It is said that the long-lived Xianzhou natives would eventually be stricken with mara.

skills.name: Callous Tailwind
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

skills.name: Rejuvenate
skills.description: Upon receiving a killing blow, restores a certain amount of HP. This effect does not have a time limit but can be dispelled. This effect can only trigger 1 time per battle.

skills.name: Callous Tailwind
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

2022020.name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Internal Alchemist
2022020.description:
A member of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus, the secret sect that hid within the Xianzhou Luofu. 
With medicine, purify the heart. With elixir, transform one's body. They long to revive the ancient mysteries of Abundance, hoping to spur Xianzhou natives towards their next stage of evolution.

skills.name: Seeding Core
skills.description: Inflicts a single target with Spur of Thunderwoe.

skills.name: Thundering Reign
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Core Rupture
skills.description: Upon receiving a killing blow, this unit deals Lightning DMG to any targets that were inflicted with Spur of Thunderwoe by them. Afterward, Spur of Thunderwoe on these targets will be removed.

2022040.name: Abundance Sprite: Golden Hound
2022040.description:
A gilded hunting hound that moves with grace and speed.
When the Ambrosial Arbor still stood, the Xianzhou people bred many fantastic creatures with esoteric techniques. Golden Hounds were one of the war beasts that walked alongside the army.

skills.name: Horn Gore
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Rebound Roar
skills.description: Upon receiving a killing blow, Advances Forward friendly units adjacent to self.

2022050.name: Abundance Sprite: Wooden Lupus
2022050.description:
A wolf surrounded with haze, its movement is elusive and unexpected.
When the Ambrosial Arbor still stood, the Xianzhou people bred many fantastic creatures with esoteric techniques. Wooden Lupuses were one of the war beasts that walked alongside the army.

skills.name: Wolf Predation
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

skills.name: Rallying Howl
skills.description: Summons 1 Shadow Jackhyena with the same Current HP as itself.

2022051.name: Shadow Jackhyena
2022051.description: Illusion formed by a Wooden Lupus.

skills.name: Wolf Predation
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

2022060.name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Ballistarius
2022060.description:
A member of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus, the secret organization that had lain hidden in the Xianzhou Luofu.
They pursue cultivation using tools and merge with them. They long to revive the lost secrets of Abundance, hoping to spur Xianzhou natives toward their next stage of evolution.

skills.name: Mounted Crossbow
skills.description: Deals successive Lightning DMG to random targets.

2022070.name: Twig of Wintry Wind
2022070.description: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint

skills.name: Outrage
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to one target with a high chance of inflicting "Outrage." Targets afflicted by "Outrage" cannot take action for a number of turns and will attack a random unit friendly to this unit.

2022071.name: Twig of Wintry Wind
2022071.description: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint

skills.name: Outrage
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to one target with a high chance to inflict "Outrage" and "Wind Shear" on the target. Targets afflicted by "Outrage" cannot take action for a number of turns and will attack a random unit friendly to this unit.

2022080.name: Twig of Marple Leaf
2022080.description: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint

skills.name: Engender
skills.description: Enhances the Abundant Ebon Deer and slightly increases its ATK.

skills.name: Retaliation
skills.description: Enters the Counter state: When attacked, immediately uses "Leaf Hinging" on the attacker.

skills.name: Leaf Hinging
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target.

2022081.name: Twig of Marple Leaf
2022081.description: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint.

skills.name: Engender
skills.description: Enhances the Abundant Ebon Deer and increases its ATK.

skills.name: Retaliation
skills.description: Enters the Counter state: When attacked, immediately uses "Leaf Hinging" on the attacker.

skills.name: Leaf Hinging
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

2022090.name: Twig of Glorious Blooms
2022090.description: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint

skills.name: Last Spring
skills.description: Immediately restores all friendly units' HP.

2022091.name: Twig of Glorious Blooms
2022091.description: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint.

skills.name: Last Spring
skills.description: Immediately restores all friendly units' HP.

2022100.name: Twig of Lavish Fruits
2022100.description: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint

skills.name: Crude Fruits
skills.description: Produces Lavish Fruits to accumulate Energy for the Abundant Ebon Deer to launch Flamboyant Gore.

skills.name: Mellow Fruits
skills.description: Produces Lavish Fruits to accumulate Energy for the Abundant Ebon Deer to launch Flamboyant Gore.

2022101.name: Twig of Lavish Fruits
2022101.description: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint.

skills.name: Crude Fruits
skills.description: Produces Lavish Fruits to accumulate Energy for the Abundant Ebon Deer to launch Flamboyant Gore.

skills.name: Mellow Fruits
skills.description: Produces Lavish Fruits to accumulate Energy for the Abundant Ebon Deer to launch Flamboyant Gore.

2022110.name: Mara-Struck Warden
2022110.description:
A Ten-Lords Commission soldier that has fallen to mara.
As long as they are still mortals of flesh and blood, the people of Xianzhou will never be able to escape their fate.

skills.name: Sawing Evil: Chop
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Sawing Evil: Sever
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Maddened
skills.description: Enters the Maddened state at the start of battle. While in the Maddened state, uses Sawing Evil: Sever.

2023010.name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Shape Shifter
2023010.description:
A cultivator who longs to revive the ancient mysteries of Abundance, and to guide the Xianzhou natives back on the liberating path of immortality.
Now, their wish has been fulfilled. Gifted by the power of the ancient miracle and using it as both weapon and armor, they managed to touch on the secret of immortality.

skills.name: Thunder-Shock
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Punishing Bolts
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Thudding Calamity
skills.description: Deals massive Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Mara-Summon
skills.description: Consumes HP to summon Mara-Struck Soldiers

skills.name: Vigor Draining
skills.description: When there are other friendly units with Rebirth on the field, they have Draining Hit. When hitting a target, they will restore HP.

2023011.name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Shape Shifter (Bug)
2023011.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a cultivator who longs to revive the ancient mysteries of Abundance, and to guide the Xianzhou natives back on the liberating path of immortality.
Now, their wish has been fulfilled. Gifted by the power of the ancient miracle and using it as both weapon and armor, they managed to touch on the secret of immortality.

skills.name: Thunder-Shock
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Punishing Bolts
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and adjacent units.

skills.name: Thudding Calamity
skills.description: Deals massive Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Sympathicus
skills.description: Consumes this unit's own HP to summon Mara-Struck Soldier and Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Internal Alchemist. At the same time, lock on to the target with the lowest current HP percentage and make all friendly units focus their attacks on this target.

skills.name: Vigor Draining
skills.description: While there are other friendly units with Rebirth on the field, this unit will possess Draining Hit. When hitting a target, this unit will restore HP.

2023020.name: Abundance Sprite: Malefic Ape
2023020.description:
An ape as tall as mountainous boulders with terrifying might.
When the Ambrosial Arbor still stood, the Xianzhou people bred many fantastic creatures with their esoteric techniques. Malefic Apes were one of the war beasts that walked alongside the army.

skills.name: Simian Strike
skills.description: Consumes 1 stack of Gusto and deals Quantum DMG to a Monitored target.

skills.name: Simian Strike
skills.description: Consumes 1 stack of Gusto and deals Quantum DMG to a Monitored target.

skills.name: Fiery Majesty
skills.description: Increases DMG dealt. This DMG boosting effect is stackable.

skills.name: Wrathful Roar
skills.description: Gains 3 stacks of Gusto and marks a random target for Monitoring. Until Gusto is exhausted, any target that uses their Skill will become the new Monitored target.

2023021.name: Abundance Sprite: Malefic Ape (Bug)
2023021.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an ape as tall as mountainous boulders with terrifying might.
When the Ambrosial Arbor still stood, the Xianzhou people bred many fantastic creatures with their esoteric techniques. Malefic Apes were one of the war beasts that walked alongside the army.

skills.name: Simian Strike
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Wrathful Roar
skills.description: Locks onto a random target. Whenever any target uses their Skill, they will become the new lock-on target, and this unit gains 1 stack of Gusto. The next time this unit uses Simian Strike, consume all current Gusto stacks and increase this unit's ATK based on the number of stacks consumed. Accumulated Gusto stacks will be cleared when this unit has its Weakness Broken.

skills.name: Simian Howl
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets.

2023030.name: The Ascended
2023030.description:
The form that the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus crave. A true appearance that cast off the burdens of humanity and has been reforged using the way of immortality.
In ancient times, those who sought immortality received wisdom from the Ambrosial Arbor and called themselves Celestials. They lived without restraints and molded the flesh of themselves and others at will. They have long forgotten their original appearances after countless metamorphoses.

skills.name: Rite of Great Arbor Metamorphosis
skills.description: Continuously deal Wind DMG to a random target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Guiding Vulturnus
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to the targeted and adjacent allies, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Arboreal Thorns
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Rite of Subduing Prana
skills.description: Enters Japa. Cast "Black Prana's Snare" on all targets during the next action.

skills.name: Black Prana's Snare
skills.description: Has a high chance for all targets to become afflicted with Prana-Siphon.

2023031.name: The Ascended (Bug)
2023031.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the form that the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus crave. A true shape that cast off the burdens of humanity and has been reforged using the way of immortality.
In ancient times, those who sought immortality received wisdom from the Ambrosial Arbor and called themselves Celestials. They lived without restraints, and molded the flesh of themselves and others at will. They have long forgotten their original appearances after countless metamorphoses.

skills.name: Arboreal Thorns
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Black Prana's Snare
skills.description: Has a high chance for all targets to become afflicted with Prana-Siphon.

skills.name: Vitals Drained
skills.description: When attacking targets in the Prana-Siphon state, the DMG dealt by this attack will be converted to the extent of Max HP reduced by Prana-Siphon, and refresh Prana-Siphon's duration. Prana-Siphon can reduce Maximum Restorable HP by up to <unbreak>50%</unbreak>.

2024010.name: Abundant Ebon Deer
2024010.description:
An auspicious spiritual beast wrought into being by the Ambrosial Arbor and protects its roots. Its arrival brings along exuberant vegetation and promises good fortune.
Once destroyed during ancient wars, the Ambrosial Arbor is mended by the Stellaron and finally revives. Rare creatures and legendary beasts made by celestials of the past all return to this world, like an old dream coming alive again.

skills.name: Pedicel: Wintry Wind
skills.description: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Wintry Wind"

skills.name: Pedicel: Marple Leaf
skills.description: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Marple Leaf"

skills.name: Pedicel: Glorious Blooms
skills.description: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Glorious Blooms"

skills.name: Pedicel: Lavish Fruits

skills.name: Wavering Bleat
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Caress of Wind
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Hardy Leaf Sheath
skills.description: Increases DEF. Toughness cannot be reduced.

skills.name: Flamboyant Gore
skills.description: Uses this ability immediately when there are 2 Lavish Fruits on the field. Deals Lightning DMG to all targets. Deals more damage for every "Ambrosial Arbor Branches" on the field. After the ability is used, remove all "Ambrosial Arbor Branches" on the field.

skills.name: Back to Life
skills.description: Absorbs Ambrosial Arbor energy and restores all HP.

skills.description: After a friendly unit launches an attack, applies 1 stack of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" to <u>friendly units who can enter the "Moon Rage" effect</u>. skills.name: Worldpurge
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Realm Exterminator
skills.description: Use while in the Resonate State. Deals Wind DMG to all targets, with a high chance to inflict <u>Weaken</u>.

skills.name: Safeguard
skills.description: Enters the Safeguard state. While not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

2032062.name: Worldpurge Tail
2032062.description: Tail of the Inner Beast, bringer of storms, purger of mortal worlds.

skills.name: Worldpurge
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Realm Exterminator
skills.description: Use while in the Resonate State. Deals Wind DMG to all targets, with a high chance to inflict <u>Weaken</u>.

2033010.name: Howling Casket
2033010.description: A combat machine developed by the Intelligentsia Guild, utilizing borisin biological tissues. These machines possess the tenacious vitality of long-life species and the "Slaughter Algorithm" evolved over countless ages.

skills.name: Bionic Claws
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Thunderous Roar
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Moon Rage Mimicry
skills.description: Enters the <u>Moon Rage</u> state.

skills.name: Lupitoxin Synthesis
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets, with a high chance of inflicting "<u>Terror Grip</u>" on all allies.

skills.name: Slaughter Algorithm
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and adjacent units. When the target enters the "<u>Terror Grip</u>" or "<u>Terrified</u>" state, additionally deals DMG.

skills.name: Borisin Instinct
skills.description: When entering battle, decreases the number of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" stacks needed to enter "<u>Moon Rage</u>." After a friendly unit launches an attack, applies 1 stack of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" to <u>friendly units who can enter the "Moon Rage" effect</u>. When "<u>Bloodlust</u>" reaches a certain number of stacks, the friendly unit enters the "<u>Moon Rage</u>" state.\nA "Moon Rage" countdown icon appears in the Action Order. When the countdown's turn begins, "<u>Moon Rage</u>" is dispelled for all friendly units.

2033011.name: Howling Casket (Bug)
2033011.description: A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referenced entity is a combat machine developed by the Intelligentsia Guild, utilizing borisin biological tissues. These machines possess the tenacious vitality of long-life species and the "Slaughter Algorithm" evolved over countless ages.

skills.name: Bionic Claws
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to the designated target, with a high chance of inflicting "<u>Terror Grip</u>" on the attacked target.

skills.name: Thunderous Roar
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target and their adjacent targets, with a high chance of inflicting "<u>Terror Grip</u>" on the attacked target.

skills.name: Moon Rage Mimicry
skills.description: Enters the "<u>Moon Rage</u>" state.

skills.name: Lupitoxin Synthesis
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets, with a high chance of inflicting "<u>Terror Grip</u>" on all targets.

skills.name: Slaughter Algorithm
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and adjacent units. When the target enters the "<u>Terror Grip</u>" or "<u>Terrified</u>" state, additionally deals DMG.

skills.name: Borisin Instinct
skills.description: When entering battle, decreases the number of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" stacks needed to enter "<u>Moon Rage</u>." After a friendly unit launches an attack, applies 1 stack of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" to <u>friendly units who can enter the "Moon Rage" effect</u>. When "<u>Bloodlust</u>" reaches a certain number of stacks, the friendly unit enters the "<u>Moon Rage</u>" state.\nA "Moon Rage" countdown icon appears in the Action Order. When the countdown's turn begins, "<u>Moon Rage</u>" is dispelled for all friendly units.

2033020.name: Ecliptic Inner Beast & Shadow of "Feixiao"
2033020.description:
Provoking the temptations within, usurping the powerful spirit, transforming in appearance... The abomination lurking inside Feixiao has begun its hunt for her.
At the end of this stalking pursuit, the surviving party would obtain the right to walk the world as the Merlin's Claw.

skills.name: Seance
skills.description: Nebula Devourer, Planeshred Claws, and Worldpurge Tail share their HP with the Shadow of "Feixiao."

2033021.name: Ecliptic Inner Beast & Shadow of "Feixiao"
2033021.description:
Provoking the temptations within, usurping the powerful spirit, transforming in appearance... The abomination lurking inside Feixiao has begun its hunt for her.
At the end of this stalking pursuit, the surviving party would obtain the right to walk the world as the Merlin's Claw.

skills.name: Seance
skills.description: Nebula Devourer, Planeshred Claws, and Worldpurge Tail share their HP with the Shadow of "Feixiao."

2033022.name: Sanerot Hearteater
2033022.description:
Provoking their temptations within, usurping their powerful spirit, transforming into their appearance... The Crimson Moon will conduct a targeted hunt based on its host's weakness.
Is Feixiao the hunter or the prey in this endless pursuit?

skills.name: Seance
skills.description: "Nebula Devourer," "Planeshred Claws," and "Worldpurge Tail" share their HP with "Hellcharred Shadow General."

skills.name: Synchronization
skills.description: When "Nebula Devourer," "Planeshred Claws," "Worldpurge Tail," and "Hellcharred Shadow General" have their Weakness Broken, "Sanerot Hearteater's" Toughness is reduced.

2034010.name: Borisin Warhead: Hoolay
2034010.description:
A borisin leader who committed the Ten Unpardonable Sins, eternally imprisoned at the bottom of The Shackling Prison.
Bearing the hatred of seven centuries of bitter confinement, the Lord of Wolves challenges the entire Xianzhou Luofu upon breaking free from his cage. Yet, there seems to be another objective hidden behind his maddened actions...

skills.name: Broken Blades as Fang
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Severed Iron as Claws
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and adjacent units.

skills.name: Barrenness of Earth Gouged
skills.description: Causes all targets (except this unit) to have their action delayed and deals minor Lightning DMG.

skills.name: Decimation of Roaring Storms
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Lupine Chase Calls Bloody Gleam
skills.description: Deals massive Lightning DMG to a designated single target, with a high chance of inflicting <u>Terror Grip</u>.

skills.name: Warhead Moon Rage
skills.description: After a friendly unit launches an attack, apply 1 stack of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" to <u>friendly units who can enter the "Moon Rage" state</u>. When "<u>Bloodlust</u>" reaches a certain number of stacks, the friendly unit enters the "<u>Moon Rage</u>" state.\nA "Moon Rage" countdown icon appears in the Action Order. When the countdown's turn begins, "<u>Moon Rage</u>" is dispelled across all friendly units.

skills.name: Moonhowl Lupus
skills.description: While Hoolay is in the <u>Moon Rage</u> state, applies 1 stack of Irate to Hoolay after every attack launched by friendly units. If Hoolay uses an attack, additionally applies 1 stack of Irate. After every attack used by target units, reduce 1 stack of Irate. Irate will have an initial set of stacks. When a certain number of Irate stacks is reached, Hoolay will release Lupine Chase Calls Bloody Gleam and remove all Irate stacks. Whenever Irate stacks are reduced to 0 due to attacks from player characters, Hoolay's Toughness will be reduced and reset Irate to a set number of stacks.

skills.name: To My Howls the Pack Obeys
skills.description: Adds Summon the Pack to the Action Order. Whenever Summon the Pack takes action, summons Sableclaw Wolftrooper or Eclipse Wolftrooper. When any enemy enters the <u>Moon Rage</u> state, Summon the Pack's action is delayed.

skills.name: Muster
skills.description: After entering Phase 3, the SPD of "Summon the Pack" will increase, and this unit will immediately enter the "<u>Moon Rage</u>" state when entering Phase 3.

skills.name: Crimson Moon's Might
skills.description: Increases Hoolay's DMG dealt whenever Hoolay uses "Decimation of Roaring Storms."

2034014.name: Fulminating Wolflord
2034014.description:
A borisin leader who committed the Ten Unpardonable Sins, eternally imprisoned at the bottom of The Shackling Prison.
Bearing the hatred of seven centuries of bitter confinement, the Lord of Wolves challenges the entire Xianzhou Luofu upon breaking free from his cage. Yet, there seems to be another objective hidden behind his maddened actions...

skills.name: Broken Blades as Fang
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Severed Iron as Claws
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Barrenness of Earth Gouged
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to all targets except this unit.

skills.name: Decimation of Roaring Storms
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Lupine Chase Calls Bloody Gleam
skills.description: Deals massive Lightning DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Sanguine Hunger Howls
skills.description: Hoolay's Toughness cannot be reduced before entering the "Lunar Devourer" state. After a friendly unit launches an attack, applies 1 stack of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" to <u>friendly units that can enter the "Lunar Devourer" state</u>. When "<u>Bloodlust</u>" reaches a certain stack, Hoolay will enter the "<u>Lunar Devourer</u>" state and use "Going Solo."

skills.name: Surrounded by Lupine Shrieks
skills.description: When Hoolay enters the "<u>Lunar Devourer</u>" state, DMG taken decreases, their Toughness can be reduced, and they apply "Irate" to themselves. "Irate" has a starting stack number that decreases by 1 after every target's turn ends. This unit will exit the "Lunar Devourer" state whenever "Irate" reduces to 0 stacks.

skills.name: Pack's Edict, Followed by Lightning
skills.description: Whenever a target deals a killing blow to other friendly units, deals DMG and reduces Hoolay's Toughness and adds "<u>Blood Surge</u>" to all target characters. Also, applies 1 stack of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" to <u>all friendly units that can enter the "Lunar Devourer" state</u> and summon "Sableclaw Wolftrooper" or "Eclipse Wolftrooper."

skills.name: Going Solo
skills.description: Enters the "Going Solo" state. Increases Hoolay's DMG dealt. Targets can select one character and their summon to enter the "Going Solo" state. After the selection, deals Lightning DMG to one designated target, and all targets and friendly units will become <u>Departed</u> until "Irate" is completely expended. After the target enters the "Going Solo" state, causes the target's team to recover Skill Points, and increases this unit's Max HP and ATK based on the total Max HP and ATK of all target characters, as well as activating "<u>Blood Surge</u>." This unit also gains "<u>Rising War Spirits</u>" based on the number of "<u>Blood Surge</u>" stacks. The "<u>Blood Surge</u>" stacks of all target characters will be removed after the "Going Solo" state ends.

2035010.name: Shadow of "Feixiao"
2035010.description: Hoolay, who used the Crimson Moon to escape death, has manifested in the form of Feixiao, standing opposite her, as if in a mirror.

skills.name: Gunblade: Swordfang
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Great Ax: Irontalon
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict <u>Weaken</u>.

skills.name: Heaven's Binds
skills.description: Enhances self to gain additional action.

skills.name: Wreathed in Storm
skills.description: Resonates with all parts of the Ecliptic Inner Beast and dispels their Weakness Broken state. This unit cannot be attacked before its next action. In the next action, this unit will use Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth on all targets.

skills.name: Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth
skills.description: Deals massive Wind DMG to all targets and Enhances this unit based on the parts that have yet to be Weakness Broken. Every part that has yet to be Broken will increase the DMG dealt by this ability, and this ability will enhance the parts that are not Weakness Broken.

skills.name: Passing Tempest
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Beastbond Strike
skills.description: The additional action from Shadow of "Feixiao" will resonate with the Ecliptic Inner Beast's body parts. Resonance will restore a certain amount of Toughness for the Ecliptic Inner Beast's parts and increase the Toughness value reduced when attacked. The next action becomes Enhanced. Resonance with "Nebula Devourer" has a high chance of inflicting <u>Outrage</u> on all targets. Resonance with "Planeshred Claws" additionally greatly increases DMG. Resonance with "Worldpurge Tail" has a high chance of inflicting <u>Weaken</u> on all targets.

2035012.name: Hellcharred Shadow General
2035012.description: Under the influence of Crimson Moon, Feixiao commands the giant beast like a goddess, emanating terrifying power with her every move.

skills.name: Gunblade: Swordfang
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Great Ax: Irontalon
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to one designated target, with a high chance to inflict <u>Weaken</u>.

skills.name: Heaven's Binds
skills.description: Enhances self to gain additional action.

skills.name: Wreathed in Storm
skills.description: Resonates with all parts of the Ecliptic Inner Beast and dispels their Weakness Broken state. This unit cannot be attacked before its next action. In the next action, this unit will use "Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth" on all targets.

skills.name: Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth
skills.description: Deals massive Wind DMG to all targets and Enhances this unit based on the parts that have yet to be Weakness Broken. Every part that has yet to be Broken will increase the DMG dealt by this ability, and this ability will enhance the parts that are not Weakness Broken.

skills.name: Soul-Shattering Malediction
skills.description: Target can select one character. Then, deals Wind DMG to the selected character and causes them to enter the "Malediction" state. In the "Malediction" state, the target and their summon are <u>Departed</u>. At the same time, summons "Bloodstained Lupine" to replace the Departed character in battle, and "Bloodstained Lupine" is considered as a target character.

skills.name: Union of Minds
skills.description: "Hellcharred Shadow General's" extra turn will Resonate with "Sanerot Hearteater's" parts. The Resonance will dispel the Weakness Broken state on "Sanerot Hearteater's" parts, and their next action becomes an enhanced action. "Nebula Devourer's" Resonance has a high chance of causing all targets to enter <u>Outrage</u> state. "Planeshred Claws's" Resonance greatly increases DMG. "Worldpurge Tail's" Resonance has a high chance of causing all targets to enter <u>Weaken</u> state.

3001010.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Spring Loader
3001010.description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a tool for entertainment on the card table, it is still shaking the dice in its hands after losing control, continuing the game in a crude manner.

skills.name: Throw Die
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a chance to reduce the target's Effect RES.

3001020.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Birdskull
3001020.description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a prop in the theater, it is still performing the farce on the stage after losing control, bringing cacophonic dance steps to every direction.

skills.name: Dance Invite
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a chance to inflict Bleed on them.

3002010.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Mr. Domescreen
3002010.description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally an entertainer in TV shows, it is still portraying its ever-changing roles after losing control and continues to bring surprises or scares to the audience.

skills.name: Surprise Variety Show
skills.description: Regenerates Energy for a target. This ability can only be used while under the Surprise Channel state.

skills.name: Startling Broadcast
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and causes all targets' Energy to be reduced. This ability can only be used while in the Fright Channel state.

skills.name: Channel Switch
skills.description: Switches the Surprise Channel status to the Fright Channel status.

skills.name: Channel Crossover
skills.description: After being attacked, this unit will switch from the Surprise Channel status to the Fright Channel status, or vice versa.

3002011.name: Banacademic Office's Assistanana
3002011.description: Originally a Mr. Domescreen loaded with the general syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. It shifts between banarocky seriousness and sunny banapassion. An indisposable banamployee and a monkey who's a worthy banafriend.

skills.name: Banappiness Holiday
skills.description: Regenerates Energy for one designated target. This ability can only be used while under the "Off-Class Channel" state.

skills.name: Banascary Semester
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and causes all targets' Energy to be reduced. This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

skills.name: Change Banasyllabus
skills.description: Switches the "Off-Class Channel" state to the "Classroom Channel" state.

skills.name: Disrupt Banasyllabus
skills.description: After being attacked, switches the "Classroom Channel" state to the "Off-Class Channel" state. When in "Off-Class Channel" state, will not switch channels after being attacked.

3002012.name: Banacademic Office's Assistanana
3002012.description: Originally a Mr. Domescreen loaded with the general syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. skills.name: Change Banasyllabus
skills.description: Switches the "Off-Class Channel" state to the "Classroom Channel" state.

skills.name: Banacademic Incident
skills.description: After being attacked for a number of times, switches the "Classroom Channel" state to the "Off-Class Channel" state and enters the Weakness Broken state.

3002014.description: Skott, split into countless bodies by Assassin's power. Each Mass-Production Machine possesses strength on par with its Prototype.

skills.name: Wolf's Succor
skills.description: Regenerates Energy for one designated target. This ability can only be used while under the "Succor" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Curse
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and causes all targets' Energy to be reduced. This ability can only be used while in the "Curse" state.

skills.name: Lone Wolf Never Abandons
skills.description: Switches "Succor" state to "Curse" state.

skills.name: Lone Wolf's Escape
skills.description: After being attacked, this unit will switch from the "Succor" state to the "Curse" status, or vice versa.

3002015.name: Envious Skott
3002015.description: Skott, who gathered all the filming resources to become the greatest protagonist of all protagonists. With his consciousness and soul scattered by a Servant, he seeks revenge from the Trailblazer in a thousand different appearances.

skills.name: Wolf's Succor
skills.description: Regenerates Energy for one designated target. This ability can only be used while under the "Mocked" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Curse
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and causes all targets' Energy to be reduced. This ability can only be used while in the "Rabid" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Escape

3002020.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Fortune Seller
3002020.description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a prize-drawing robot made to bring surprise to guests, it still bears all kinds of gifts even after losing control, and longs to prove the good luck of the guest by sacrificing itself.

skills.name: Lottery Warmup
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Dreamjolt Prizepool
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow from the designated attack type, triggers different effects based on the attack type. When simultaneously receiving attacks of multiple types, the effects will be triggered in the following order of priority: Lost the <unbreak>50</unbreak>/<unbreak>50</unbreak>!, Hit the Guarantee!, and Jackpot!

skills.name: Lost the <unbreak>50</unbreak>/<unbreak>50</unbreak>!
skills.description: After suffering a killing blow from a Basic ATK or DoT, recovers Skill Points for targets.

skills.name: Hit the Guarantee!
skills.description: After suffering a killing blow from a Skill, Memosprite Skill, or a Follow-up ATK, regenerates Energy for all targets.

skills.name: Jackpot!
skills.description: After suffering a killing blow from an Ultimate, regenerates Energy and Skill Points for all targets.

3002021.name: Banacademic Office's Fortune BananAdvisor
3002021.description: Originally a Fortune Seller loaded with the Fortune Academy syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. A brain as cunning as bananas is the best weapon in the market, and the banaxchanges full of unpredictable outcomes are banastressing out the monkeys.

skills.name: Good Monkeys Get Grades
skills.description: Regenerates Skill Points for the team. This ability can only be used while under the "Off-Class Channel" state.

skills.name: Bad Monkeys Get Demerits
skills.description: Reduces Skill Points for the team. This ability can only be used while under the "Classroom Channel" state.
