3002030.description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a delivery robot of SoulGlad, it is still dispensing sweetness after losing control, inviting everyone to taste this delicacy.

skills.name: Drink Invite
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Libation of Sweetness
skills.description: Upon taking a killing blow, deals Physical DMG to adjacent friendly units, increases their SPD, and inflicts them with Bleed.

skills.name: Hearty Revelry
skills.description: Upon being attacked or taking DMG from DoT effects, gains a stack of SoulGlad Revel. Each stack increases DMG dealt.

3002040.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Winder Goon
3002040.description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a waiter in The Reverie, it is still performing its duty of announcing the time after losing control, jolting dreamers awake in the most crude manner.

skills.name: Set Alarm
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses Wake-Up Alarm for the next action.

skills.name: Wake-Up Alarm
skills.description: Causes all friendly units apart from this unit to immediately take action.

skills.name: Wake-Up Punch
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

3002041.name: Banacademic Office's Dreamweaver BananAdvisor
3002041.description: Originally a Winder Goon loaded with the Dreamweaver Academy syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. Its banatiful figure in the construction site looks like an iron wall, occasionally letting out monkghty sounds of bells to banawaken slumbering banastudents and banacolleagues.

3002050.name: Lordly Trashcan
3002050.description: A peculiar entity born within the realm of fiction, its story documented in the nameless chronicles: A lone and valiant trashcan bearing the mission of the Garbage King to seek formidable warriors to eliminate all waste that threatens the world.

skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: The Can's Tribulations
skills.description: Increases this unit's ATK. This effect is stackable and unremovable.

skills.name: The Can's Creed
skills.description: When this unit is Weakness Broken, it will leave the battle. When attacked, Weaknesses corresponding to the attack's Type will be implanted, up to 2 Weaknesses.

3003010.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Beyond Overcooked

Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a culinary robot, it is still breathing fire for grilling ingredients after losing control, intending to burn the diners to crisps.

skills.name: Ladle Swirl

skills.name: Tornado Toss
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Ignite Stove

skills.name: Flaming Stir-Fry

skills.name: Kitchen Mishap

skills.name: Flame-Forged Feast

skills.name: Inferno Stove
skills.description: When attacking, this unit has a chance to Slow the target. When this unit is attacked or takes DoT, gains 1 stack of Stove Heating.

skills.description: After entering the Charging state, deals massive Fire DMG to all friendly units and decreases this unit's DEF once Stove Heating has a certain number of stacks. Then, clears all Stove Heating stacks.

skills.name: Flame-Forged Feast
skills.description: While not under the Charging state, upon reaching a certain number of Stove Heating stacks, immediately takes action and uses Stove Detonation.

skills.name: Inferno Stove
skills.description: When attacking, this unit has a high chance to Slow the target. When this unit is attacked or takes DoT, gains 1 stack of Stove Heating.

3003013.name: Banacademic Office's Charmony BananAdvisor
3003013.description: Originally a Beyond Overcooked loaded with the Charmony Academy syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. The banaxious heart on stage brews a banaphony of flames, vowing to barbeque bad banastudents who don't listen to banadvice to charbanas.

skills.name: Physical Banashment! Take This!
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to one target and their adjacent targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn." This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

skills.name: Collective Banashment! Take This!
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to all targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn" on all targets. This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

skills.name: Monkey No! Emergency Tutoring!
skills.description: Makes one random friendly unit and this unit switch to the "Classroom Channel" state and applies "<u>Tutoring</u>" to them. This can only be used in the "Off-Class Channel" state.

skills.name: Monkey Yes! Holiday Activities!
skills.description: Increases all targets' ATK. This ability can only be used while under the "Off-Class Channel" state.

skills.name: Disrupt Banasyllabus
skills.description: After being attacked, switches the "Classroom Channel" state to the "Off-Class Channel" state. When in "Off-Class Channel" state, will not switch channels after being attacked.

skills.name: Teach Monkeys a Banalesson
skills.description: When attacking, this unit has a chance to apply the Slow state on the target.

3003014.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Beyond Overcooked
3003014.description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a culinary robot, it is still breathing fire for grilling ingredients after losing control, intending to burn the diners to crisps.

skills.name: Ladle Swirl
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Tornado Toss
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Combusting Stove
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Until Stove Heating has reached a certain number of stacks, this unit will use Flaming Stir-Fry at every turn. When already in the Charging state, reduces current Stove Heating stacks.

skills.name: Flaming Stir-Fry
skills.description: Deals massive Fire DMG to all targets.

skills.description: After being attacked for a number of times, switches the "Classroom Channel" state to the "Off-Class Channel" state and enters the Weakness Broken state.

3003017.name: Wrathful Skott
3003017.description: Skott, who gathered all the filming resources to become the greatest protagonist of all protagonists. With his consciousness and soul scattered by a Servant, he seeks revenge from the Trailblazer in a thousand different appearances.

skills.name: Wolf's Agony
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to one target and adjacent targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn." This ability can only be used while in the "Rabid" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Fury
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to all targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn." This ability can only be used while in the "Rabid" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Overtime
skills.description: Makes one random friendly unit and this unit switch to the "Rabid" state and applies "<u>Overworked</u>" to them. This can only be used in the "Mocked" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Charity
skills.description: Increases all targets' ATK. This ability can only be used while under the "Mocked" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Retreat

3003020.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Sweet Gorilla
3003020.description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a transport robot of SoulGlad, it is still carrying the burden of the delicacy after losing control while launching its gift to guests passing by.

skills.name: Limited Free Drinks
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to this unit with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

skills.name: Unlimited Free Drinks
skills.description: Deals 4 hits of Ice DMG to one random target. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to self with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

skills.name: SoulGlad Party
skills.description: Summons 2 Bubble Hounds.

skills.name: Celebration Fountain
skills.description: Enters the Charging stage and gains Toughness Protection. Uses Unlimited Free Drinks during the next action.

3003021.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Sweet Gorilla (Projection)
3003021.description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a transport robot of SoulGlad, it is still carrying the burden of the delicacy after losing control while launching its gift to guests passing by.

skills.name: Limited Free Drinks
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target and Advances the target's action Forward. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to this unit with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

skills.name: Unlimited Free Drinks
skills.description: Deals 4 hits of Ice DMG to one Monitored target and Advances the target's action Forward. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to a random friendly unit with a high chance to decrease the affected unit's DEF.

skills.name: SoulGlad Party
skills.description: Summons 2 Bubble Hounds.

skills.name: Celebration Fountain
skills.description: Enters the Charging state and gains Toughness Protection. When taking action the next time, uses Unlimited Free Drinks. At the same time, marks a random target for Monitoring. Any target that uses their Skill will become the new Monitored target. While in this state, this unit's action will be Advanced Forward when attacked.

3003022.name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Sweet Gorilla (Bug)
3003022.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is one Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a transport robot of SoulGlad, it is still carrying the burden of the delicacy after losing control while launching its gift to guests passing by.

skills.name: Limitless Free Drinks
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. When hitting targets without a Shield, there is a small chance of Freezing the attacked target. If the target has a Shield, additionally deals Ice DMG to this unit with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

skills.name: Frenzied Free Drinks
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a random single target for 4 times. When each hit lands on a target that has no Shield, there is a high chance of Freezing the target. If the target has a Shield, then after dealing DMG, this attacking unit also deals Ice DMG on itself, with a high chance to decrease its own DEF.

skills.name: SoulGlad Party
skills.description: Summons 2 Bubble Hounds.

skills.name: Celebration Fountain
skills.description: Enters the Charging state and gains Toughness Protection. Uses Frenzied Free Drinks during the next action.

3003030.name: "Past Confined and Caged"
3003030.description: An artist playing the role of the prisoner in the Sweet Dreams Troupe. It should be performing in the Charmony Festival, but it is now bound by Order and keeps performing scenes of the "Past." The past is an immortal chain, its tranquil flame igniting within a cage, beckoning the jailer's authority with mere candlelight.

skills.name: Cleansing Flagellation
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Admonishment of the Masses
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Shackle-Bearing Messenger
skills.description: Locks onto one target and enters the Charging state. In the next action, uses "Desmios Evangelion." During the Charging state, if this unit is attacked by another target, it will also lock onto the attacking target. Delays the unit's action when they are Weakness Broken during the Charging state.

skills.name: Desmios Evangelion
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to one designated locked-on target, the DMG is <u>evenly distributed</u> across all targets.

3003040.name: "Tomorrow in Harmonious Chords"
3003040.description: A musician responsible for playing the harmonious tune in the Sweet Dreams Troupe. It should be playing in the Charmony Festival, but it is now bound by Order and keeps performing scenes of the "Future." The future is an eternal ballad, a vision of happiness strung together, calling to the composing sovereign with the melody of a harp.

3003050.name: "Present Inebriated in Revelry"
3003050.description: A waiter responsible for entertaining the guests in the Sweet Dreams Troupe. It should be serving in the Charmony Festival, but it is now bound by Order and keeps performing scenes of the "Present." The present is a feast lasting through the night, desire for joy rippling in each cup, offering fine brews to the host who sets the banquet.

skills.name: Precious Blood Shed For You
skills.description: High chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> to a single target.

skills.name: Feast That Is Set For You
skills.description: High chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> to all targets.

skills.name: A Cup Runneth Over For You
skills.description: Enters the Charging state, with a high chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> to all targets. In the next Action, uses "Wash Away All Sins For You".

skills.name: Wash Away All Sins For You
skills.description: Immediately causes all DoT effects currently active on all targets to deal damage 1 time and dispels all DoT effects on all targets.

3004010.name: The Past, Present, and Eternal Show
3004010.description: The actors of the Sweet Dreams Troupe have accepted the grace of the Order and become puppets that declare the law. They dance under the supreme commandments, beginning a show that will welcome the coming of paradise.

skills.name: Hearing, Together As One
skills.description: In this battle, "The Past, Present, and Eternal Show" shares HP with all "Puppets of the Order"

skills.name: Appeal, Singular Grace
skills.description: When entering battle, chooses a Puppet of the Order to become Impresario, granting them an extra action each turn and a small increase to their SPD. When that friendly unit's Weakness is Broken, causes their action to be delayed and re-selects another Puppet of the Order to become Impresario. If all Puppets of the Order are Weakness Broken at this time, this unit will receive DMG and delay all Puppets of the Order's actions while also increasing the DMG they receive. When any Puppet of the Order recovers from being Weakness Broken, they will be designated as the new Impresario.

skills.name: Decree, Unified with Divine
skills.description: Causes all Puppets of the Order to become Impresario, granting them an extra action each turn and a small increase to their SPD. When the target's Weakness is Broken, causes their action to be delayed. If all Puppets of the Order are Weakness Broken at this time, this unit will receive DMG and delay all Puppets of the Order's actions while also increasing the DMG they receive. When a Puppets of the Order recovers from being Weakness Broken, they will be designated as the new Impresario.

skills.name: Enact, Heed Thy Command
skills.description: Adds Commandment to the Action Order. Every time Commandment acts, dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Broken states afflicting the Puppets of the Order on the field and unleashes "Dance for Synchrony." Whenever a Puppet of the Order is Weakness Broken, Commandment will suffer a slight action delay.

skills.name: Dance for Synchrony
skills.description: There is a high chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> on all targets. There is a high chance of inflicting the <u>Alien Dream</u> state on all targets, dealing massive Physical DMG.

3004011.name: The Past, Present, and Eternal Show (Complete)
3004011.description: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the actors of the Sweet Dreams Troupe who have accepted the grace of the Order and become puppets that declare the law. They dance under the supreme commandments, beginning a show that will welcome the coming of paradise.

skills.name: Hearing, Together As One
skills.description: In this battle, "The Past, Present, and Eternal Show" shares HP with all "Puppets of the Order."

skills.name: Appeal, Singular Grace
skills.description: When entering battle, chooses a Puppet of the Order to become Impresario, granting them an extra action each turn and a small increase to their SPD. When that friendly unit's Weakness is Broken, causes their action to be delayed and re-selects another Puppet of the Order to become Impresario. If all Puppets of the Order are Weakness Broken at this time, this unit will receive DMG and delay all Puppets of the Order's actions while also increasing the DMG they receive. When any Puppet of the Order recovers from being Weakness Broken, they will be designated as the new Impresario.

skills.name: Decree, Unified with Divine
skills.description: Causes all Puppets of the Order to become Impresario and enter the Safeguard state, granting them an extra action each turn and a small increase to their SPD. When the target's Weakness is Broken, causes their action to be delayed. If all Puppets of the Order are Weakness Broken at this time, this unit will receive DMG and delay all Puppets of the Order's actions while also increasing the DMG they receive. When a Puppet of the Order recovers from being Weakness Broken, they will be designated as the new Impresario.

skills.name: Enact, Heed Thy Command
skills.description: Adds Commandment to the Action Order. Every time Commandment acts, dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Broken states afflicting the Puppets of the Order on the field and unleashes "Dance for Synchrony." Whenever a Puppet of the Order is Weakness Broken, Commandment will suffer a slight action delay.

skills.name: Verdict, Eternal Life
skills.description: Adds Commandment to the Action Order once.

skills.name: Dance for Synchrony
skills.description: There is a high chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> on all targets. There is a high chance of inflicting the <u>Alien Dream</u> state on all targets, dealing massive Physical DMG.

3004020.name: Wonder Forest's Banacademic Office Staff
3004020.description: Sweet Dreams Troupe with their reason clouded by the shade of the AtaviSearch Forest. They carry with them the memetic virus borne into fruit in the Wonder Forest, banaoldly promoting the banacreed of the Slumbernana Monkey and Dr. Primitive's banadvice.

skills.name: Pride of the Monkey Pack
skills.description: In this battle, Wonder Forest's Banacademic Office Staff shares HP with all Banacademic Office members.

skills.name: Banacademic Curriculum
skills.description: Adds "End-of-Semester Dinner" in the Action Order. Every time "End-of-Semester Dinner" takes action, dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Broken states on all Banacademic Office members on the field, switches all "Off-Class Channel" states on all Banacademic Office members on the field to "Classroom Channel" states, and uses "To the Doctor: Banacademic Report." Every time a Banacademic Office member's Weakness is Broken, the action of "End-of-Semester Dinner" is slightly delayed.

skills.name: To the Doctor: Banacademic Report
skills.description: Increases all friendly units' ATK. Reduces all target units' Energy and Skill Points and deals Quantum and Fire DMG to all target units, with a chance to apply Slow and a high chance to inflict "Burn."

3004021.name: Blaznana Monkey Trick
3004021.description: Sweet Dreams Troupe with their reason clouded by the shade of the AtaviSearch Forest. They carry with them the memetic virus borne into fruit in the Wonder Forest, banaoldly promoting the banacreed of the Slumbernana Monkey and Dr. Primitive's banadvice.

skills.description: In this battle, Blaznana Monkey Trick shares HP with all Banacademic Office members.

skills.description: Increases all friendly units' ATK. Reduces all target units' Energy and Skill Points and deals Quantum and Fire DMG to all target units, with a chance to apply Slow and a high chance to inflict "Burn."

skills.name: Regular Examination
skills.description: When enemy units in the "Classroom Channel" state are switched to "Off-Class Channel" via either Breaking their Weaknesses or accumulating the tally, reduces the Toughness of "Blaznana Monkey Trick". When all enemy units are Weakness Broken, attacking any enemy units can reduce the Toughness of "Blaznana Monkey Trick" by a minor amount. When "Blaznana Monkey Trick" is Weakness Broken, all enemy targets will be Broken, and the "Blaznana Monkey Trick" will enter the "Safeguard Breach" state.

3004022.name: Wonder Forest's Banacademic Office Staff (Complete)
3004022.description: A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a Sweet Dreams Troupe with their reason clouded by the shade of the AtaviSearch Forest. They carry with them the memetic virus borne into fruit in the Wonder Forest, banaoldly promoting the banacreed of the Slumbernana Monkey and Dr. Primitive's banadvice.

skills.name: Braised Blaznana
skills.description: All friendly units in the "Classroom Channel" state will possess <u>Switch Tally</u>. At the start of every turn, friendly targets in the "Classroom Channel" state will lose a certain amount of <u>Switch Tally</u>.

skills.name: Regular Examination
skills.description: When "Wonder Forest's Banacademic Office Staff (Complete)" is Weakness Broken, deals DMG to this unit and action delays all Banacademic Office members.

3004023.name: Thousand-Faced Skott
3004023.description: Skott, who gathered all the filming resources to become the greatest protagonist of all protagonists. With his consciousness and soul scattered by a Servant, he seeks revenge from the Trailblazer in a thousand different appearances.

skills.name: Wolf's Resilience
skills.description: In this battle, "Thousand-Faced Skott" shares HP with all other "Skott" units.

skills.name: Wolf's Temptation
skills.description: Adds "Roar of the Lone Wolf" on the Action Order. Every time "Roar of the Lone Wolf" takes action, dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Broken states on all "Skott" units on the field, switches all "Mocked" states on all "Skott" units on the field to "Rabid" states, and uses "To the Lone Wolf: Ignoble Life." Every time a "Skott" is Weakness Broken, the action of "Roar of the Lone Wolf" is slightly delayed.

skills.name: To the Lone Wolf: Ignoble Life
skills.description: Increases all friendly units' ATK. Reduces all target units' Energy and Skill Points and deals Quantum and Fire DMG to all target units, with a chance to apply Slow and a high chance to inflict "Burn."

3004024.name: Thousand-Faced Skott (Corrupted)
3004024.description: Skott, who gathered all the filming resources to become the greatest protagonist of all protagonists. With his consciousness and soul scattered by a Servant, he seeks revenge from the Trailblazer in a thousand different appearances.

skills.name: Pay to Work
skills.description: Black Mud will appear in battle to enhance the Boss. After enhancement, "Wrathful Skott (Corrupted)" will immediately use "Wolf's Overtime."

3004025.description: Skott, who gathered all the filming resources to become the greatest protagonist of all protagonists. With his consciousness and soul scattered by a Servant, he seeks revenge from the Trailblazer in a thousand different appearances.

3011010.name: Memory Zone Meme "Allseer"
3011010.description:
An entity infused with a certain cognition, constructed from fragments of subconsciousness in the Memory Zone.
Observation, retrospection, inspection... In the pursuit of preservation and existential understanding of the self, the memories of "seeing" and "looking" go hand-in-hand, eventually becoming an integral part of life itself.

skills.name: Glare of the Other
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single target and delays the attacked target's action.

3012010.name: Memory Zone Meme "Something In The Mirror"
3012010.description:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
Life forms use mirrors to understand the world and build their self-cognition. The shapeless memetic entity reflects in the mirror, leaving behind ever-shifting mirages.

skills.name: Mirror Cognition
skills.description: Transforms into other friendly units and copies their abilities. After the transformation, this unit's Base Stats are inherited.

3012020.name: Memory Zone Meme "Heartbreaker"
3012020.description:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
Life is parceled in impenetrable barriers, obstructing the intrusion of the alien. But beneath that ironclad shell, there is a region both nameless and fragile.

skills.name: Structural Deviation
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Aegis of the Unyielding
skills.description: Enters the Safeguard state. When not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

3012030.name: Sombrous Sepulcher
3012030.description:
Shattered existences serve as symbols of ultimate closure. Across the ethereal expanse, spirits cast their gaze upon the mortal realm, their eyes reflecting the etchings of oblivion and separation.
Innocent souls slumber within the Sombrous Sepulcher. Defeat the Tomb to awaken them.

skills.name: Slumber Awakening
skills.description: After Sombrous Sepulcher receives a killing blow, dispels Morbid Dream from the corresponding target, restoring their HP and regenerating Energy.

skills.name: Temporal Departure
skills.description: Sombrous Sepulcher will not take action.

skills.name: Eternal Continuation
skills.description: Sombrous Sepulcher has a fixed amount of HP bars. Each time it is attacked, Weakness Broken, or receives DMG from DoT, 1 bar of HP will be depleted.

3012031.name: Sombrous Sepulcher
3012031.description:

Innocent souls slumber within the Sombrous Sepulcher. Defeat the Tomb to awaken them.

3012040.name: Memory Zone Meme "Insatiable Vanity"
3012040.description:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
The boasting of bystanders, the clinging of the weak, the flattery of the servile... The endless vanity shifts into a memetic lifeform, seeking a host that covets both fame and fortune.

skills.name: Crowned in Mortal Name
skills.description: Possesses a single friendly target and applies the Deception's Crown state, dispels the target's control effect and restoring their Toughness.

skills.name: The Authentic Plunges
skills.description: Friendly units in the Deception's Crown state restore HP after being attacked but additionally gain Physical and Fire-Type Weaknesses, and take increased Break DMG. When this unit is defeated or Weakness Broken, dispels the Deception's Crown state and defeats Insatiable Vanity.

3013010.name: Memory Zone Meme "Shell of Faded Rage"
3013010.description:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
Memories of anguish burn like flames, scorching the heart. When the suffering fades away, the life born from resentment will rise from the ashes, accumulating boundless fury.

skills.name: Grudging Courtesy
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target and gains 1 stack of Obscure Blaze.

skills.name: Roar of Furious Thunder
skills.description: Gains 3 stacks of Obscure Blaze.

skills.name: Tide of Enduring Grudges
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and gains 1 stack of Obscure Blaze.

skills.name: Bonepiercing Odium
skills.description: Deals minor successive Quantum DMG to a random target. Each stack of Obscure Blaze additionally deals DMG 1 time.

skills.name: Disembodied Shell
skills.description: Enters the Safeguard state. When not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be additionally delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

skills.name: Sobs of the Tempest
skills.description: Enters the Charging state, gains 3 stacks of Obscure Blaze and 1 stack of Terrathorn. Deals Bonepiercing Odium with each action, and loses the Charging state after being Weakness Broken.

skills.name: Tide of Enduring Grudges

3013013.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The reference entity is imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
Memories of anguish burn like flames, scorching the heart. When the suffering fades away, the life born from resentment will rise from the ashes, accumulating boundless fury.

skills.name: Grudging Courtesy
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target and gain 1 "Scorchbone Inferno" stack.

skills.name: Roar of Furious Thunder
skills.description: Gain many "Scorchbone Inferno" stacks.

skills.name: Tide of Enduring Grudges
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and gain 1 "Scorchbone Inferno" stack.

skills.name: Bonepiercing Odium
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG continuously to one random target and their adjacent targets. Each "Scorchbone Inferno" stack deals 1 additional instance of damage.

skills.name: Disembodied Shell
skills.description: Enters the "Safeguard" state. While not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

3014020.name: Memory Zone Meme "Something Unto Death"
3014020.description:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
A mysterious and dangerous Memory Zone Meme, seen as the "death" that shouldn't exist in dreams. Its sinister shadow wanders within the Twelve Hours, bringing unforeseen calamity wherever it goes. It spreads misfortune like a sharp blade, casting a shadow of death over beautiful dreams.

skills.name: Funereal Kiss
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Sunken Rain
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Biting Obituary
skills.description: Greatly increases DMG dealt for 1 turn. This effect is removed when this unit becomes Weakness Broken.

skills.name: Fading Radiance
skills.description: Enters the Sunset state. Gains 1 stack each time a character uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate. When Sunset reaches 3 stacks, immediately use Losing Eventide Light on the last-acting target. This effect is removed after using Losing Eventide Light once or after becoming Weakness Broken.

skills.name: Losing Eventide Light
skills.description: Immediately launches a killing blow on the last-acting target who used Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and inflicts Morbid Dream on them.

skills.name: Go Into That Good Night
skills.description: Enters the Nightfall state, regenerates energy for all targets, and locks onto the 2 targets who are due to act next. Uses Watery Dissolution in the next action.

skills.name: Watery Dissolution
skills.description: Immediately launches a killing blow on all locked-on targets and inflicts Morbid Dream on them. If there are no locked-on targets, launches a killing blow on 2 random targets and inflicts Morbid Dream on them.

skills.name: Sad True Lover Never Find My Grave
skills.description: Whenever a target gets inflicted with Morbid Dream, summons a corresponding Sombrous Sepulcher. When all targets get inflicted with Morbid Dream or are knocked down, this battle will be considered a defeat.

3014023.description:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
A mysterious and dangerous Memory Zone Meme, seen as the "death" that shouldn't exist in dreams. Its sinister shadow wanders within the Twelve Hours, bringing unforeseen calamity wherever it goes. It spreads misfortune like a sharp blade, casting a shadow of death over beautiful dreams.

skills.name: Funereal Kiss
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Sunken Rain
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Harrowing Obituary
skills.description: Increases the DMG dealt by this unit for 1 turn. This effect is removed when this unit becomes Weakness Broken. Every time this ability is used, gains 1 stack of DMG Boost, and increases the HP of any subsequently summoned Sombrous Sepulcher by 1 bar.

skills.name: Fading Radiance
skills.description: Enters the "Sunset" state. Gains 1 stack each time a character uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate. When "Sunset" reaches 3 stacks, immediately uses "Losing Eventide Light" on the last-acting target. This effect is removed after using "Losing Eventide Light" once or after becoming Weakness Broken.

skills.name: Losing Eventide Light
skills.description: Immediately launches a killing blow on the last-acting target who used Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and inflicts Morbid Dream on them.

skills.name: Go Into That Good Night
skills.description: Enters the Nightfall state, gains the Weakness Protected effect, regenerates energy for all characters, and locks onto the character who is due to act next. Uses Watery Dissolution in the next action.

skills.name: Watery Dissolution
skills.description: Immediately launches a killing blow on all locked-on targets and inflicts Morbid Dream on them. If there are no locked-on targets, launches a killing blow on a random target and inflicts Morbid Dream on them.

skills.name: Sad True Lover Never Find My Grave
skills.description: Whenever a character gets afflicted with Morbid Dream, summons a corresponding Sombrous Sepulcher. When all characters get afflicted with Morbid Dream or are knocked down, this battle will be considered a defeat.

skills.name: Watery Dissolution
skills.description: Immediately launches a killing blow on all locked-on targets and inflicts Morbid Dream on them. If there are no locked-on targets, launches a killing blow on 2 random targets and inflicts Morbid Dream on them.

skills.name: Go Into That Good Night
skills.description: Enters the Nightfall state, gains the Weakness Protected effect, regenerates energy for all characters, and locks onto the 2 characters who are due to act next. Uses Watery Dissolution in the next action.

3021020.name: "The Honored"
3021020.description: A statue of "The Honored." Legend has it that there was once a rose kissed by the Beauty, imbuing it with everlasting appeal.

skills.name: Honors of the Red Queen
skills.description: Applies 1 stack of DMG Boost to enemy Argenti. When in the Soulfreed state, increases DMG Boost stacks.

skills.name: Stone of Plummeting Foundation
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, applies 1 stack of DMG Boost to the attacker. When in the Soulfreed state, increases DMG Boost stacks.

3021021.name: "The Honored"
3021021.description: A statue of "The Honored." Legend has it that there was once a rose kissed by the goddess, imbuing it with everlasting appeal.

skills.name: Honors of the Red Queen
skills.description: Applies 1 stack of stackable DMG Boost effect to enemy Argenti. When in the Soulfreed state, increases the applied DMG Boost stacks.

skills.name: Stone of Plummeting Foundation
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, applies 1 stack of stackable DMG Boost effect to the attacker. When in the Soulfreed state, increases the applied DMG Boost stacks.

3021022.name: The Honored
3021022.description: A statue of "The Honored." Legend has it that there was once a rose kissed by the Beauty, imbuing it with everlasting appeal.

skills.name: Honors of the Red Queen
skills.description: Applies 1 stack of Wreath to Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry and greatly increases the DMG from the next use of Undeniable Fate.

skills.name: Stone of Plummeting Foundation
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, targets will additionally gain one stack of Soul Enhancement.

3021030.name: "Speartip"
3021030.description: A statue of "The Spear." Encircling the Soul of the Beauty, the Spear and Shield are interdependent, and the Spear stands for the courage to pierce through the darkness.

skills.name: So Cometh Beauty's Knight
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets. Increases DMG dealt while in the Soulfreed state.

skills.name: Amor of Destined Death
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Physical DMG to all friendly units. Increases DMG dealt while in the Soulfreed state.

3021031.name: "Speartip"
3021031.description: A statue of "The Spear." Encircling the Soul of the Beauty, the Spear and Shield are interdependent, and the Spear stands for the courage to pierce through the darkness.

skills.name: So Cometh Beauty's Knight
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets. Increases DMG dealt while in the Soulfreed state.

skills.name: Amor of Destined Death
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Physical DMG to all friendly units. Increases DMG dealt while in the Soulfreed state.

3021032.name: Speartip
3021032.description: A statue of "The Spear." Encircling the Soul of the Beauty, the Spear and Shield are interdependent, and the Spear stands for the courage to pierce through the darkness.

skills.name: So Cometh Beauty's Knight
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets. Increases DMG dealt while in the Soulfreed state.

skills.name: Amor of Destined Death
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Physical DMG to all friendly units.

3021040.name: "The Shield"
3021040.description: A statue of "The Shield." Encircling the Soul of the Beauty, the Spear and Shield are interdependent, and the Shield stands for the determination to defend the living.

skills.name: Diadem of the Stale
skills.description: Applies a Barrier to enemy Argenti. Applies Barriers to all friendly units while in the Soulfreed state.

skills.name: Imitation of Alacritous Desire
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, applies a Barrier to the attacker. Applies Barriers to all targets while in the Soulfreed state.

3021041.name: "The Shield"
3021041.description: A statue of "The Shield." Encircling the Soul of the Beauty, the Spear and Shield are interdependent, and the Shield stands for the determination to defend the living.

skills.name: Diadem of the Stale

skills.name: Imitation of Alacritous Desire

3021042.name: The Shield
3021042.description: A statue of "The Shield." Encircling the Soul of the Beauty, the Spear and Shield are interdependent, and the Shield stands for the determination to defend the living.

skills.name: Diadem of the Stale
skills.description: Applies a Shield to this unit. The Shield Effect increases when under the Soulfreed state.

skills.name: Imitation of Alacritous Desire
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, provide all targets with a stackable Shield.

3022010.name: Echo of Faded Dreams
3022010.description: The echoes of the memories someone once held of their beloved family. Across the long night, they will accompany him in the past, present, and future.

skills.name: Afflitto
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target and delays their action slightly.

skills.name: Come In Incubo
skills.description: All DMG dealt to this unit is taken by the Harmonious Choir instead.

3022011.name: Echo of Faded Dreams
3022011.description: The echoes of the memories someone once held of their beloved family. Across the long night, they will accompany him in the past, present, and future.

skills.name: Afflitto
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one target and delays their action slightly.

skills.name: Come In Incubo
skills.description: All DMG dealt to this unit is taken by Cacophonic Conductor instead.

3024010.name: Argenti
3024010.description:
A paragon knight of the Knights of Beauty who is piously seeking his missing Aeon, Idrila the Beauty.
Forthright and candid, he wanders the cosmos espousing the virtues of Idrila's good name.

skills.name: Piety
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Imbue Devotion
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Spear & Shield
skills.description: Randomly summons statues of "Speartip," "The Shield," and "The Honored."

skills.name: Soul of Tenacity
skills.description: Casts a Soul of Beauty from one of the statues and causes the ability of the statue that cast the soul to be enhanced.

skills.name: Hymn of Gorgeous Courage
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Spear & Shield
skills.description: Randomly summons statues of "Speartip," "The Shield," and "The Honored."

3024011.name: Argenti (Complete)
3024011.description: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a paragon among the Knights of Beauty.

skills.name: Piety
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Imbue Devotion
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Spear & Shield
skills.description: Randomly summons statues of "Speartip," "The Shield," and "The Honored."

skills.name: Thus Spoke The Spirit of Love
skills.description: Casts a Soul of Beauty from one of the statues. Causes the ability of the Soulfreed statue to be enhanced and to immediately take action.

skills.name: Hymn of Gorgeous Courage
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Sin and Absolution
skills.description: Casts the Souls of Beauty from all statues. Causes the ability of the Soulfreed statue to be enhanced.

skills.name: Knights
skills.description: Summons 4 Speartips. If statues are currently present on the field, heal their HP back to full.

skills.name: Martyrdom of Grandiosity
skills.description: After every use of Hymn of Gorgeous Courage, increases DMG. This effect is stackable.

3024013.name: Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry
3024013.description:
A paragon knight of the Knights of Beauty who is piously seeking his missing Aeon, Idrila the Beauty.

skills.name: Piety
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Imbue Devotion
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Hymn of Gorgeous Courage
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Lance's Summon
skills.description: Summons 4 statues of Speartips. If 4 statues of Speartip already exist on the field, use Sweeping Lance.

skills.name: Shield's Summon
skills.description: Summons 4 statues of The Shield.

skills.name: Honored Multitudes
skills.description: Summon 4 statues of The Honored.

skills.name: Sweeping Lance
skills.description: Releases the power in the Speartip statue and deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Shield's Retribution
skills.description: Releases the power in The Shield statue. Commands The Shield statue to Taunt the target directly facing the statue, and adjusts the statue's Weakness Type according to the targets facing it.

skills.name: Strength of Honor
skills.description: Enters an unselectable state. In the next turn, use Undeniable Fate.

skills.name: Soul Regained
skills.description: Regains Soulfreed from all statues and Enhances this unit based on the number of Soulfreed, lasting for 1 turn.

skills.name: Soulfreed
skills.description: Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry will apply Soulfreed to the summoned statues. When the unit with Soulfreed is defeated, apply Soul Enhancement to all targets and increase all DMG dealt. If Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry regains Soulfreed, it will instead increase the DMG dealt by Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry in the next turn.

skills.name: Undeniable Fate
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets. Additionally, apply Physical DMG 1 time for every stack of Wreath.

skills.name: Unstoppable Momentum
skills.description: Damage received by Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry is greatly reduced. However, after being Weakness Broken, its action is additionally delayed and it receives more DMG, as well as recovering all targets' Skill Points and activating all targets' Ultimates.

skills.name: Reversal of Fortune
skills.description: The Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry can switch their own <u>Combat Stance</u> in battle and summon different statues to fight. When characters defeat statues in the Soulfreed state, DMG dealt by the team in this battle will be increased.

skills.name: Turn Back the Tide
skills.description: When the Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry uses Soulfreed in their second phase, they will target all the statues.

skills.name: Stellar Aegis
skills.description: For every unit on the enemy's side of the field aside from the Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry, all enemies receive less DMG and deal more DMG.

3024014.name: Argenti
3024014.description:
A paragon knight of the Knights of Beauty who is piously seeking his missing Aeon, Idrila the Beauty.
Forthright and candid, he wanders the cosmos espousing the virtues of Idrila's good name.

skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Sin and Absolution

skills.name: Martyrdom of Grandiosity
skills.description: After every use of Hymn of Gorgeous Courage, increases DMG. This effect is stackable.

3024020.name: Stellaron Hunter: Sam
3024020.description: One of the Stellaron Hunters, a mysterious warrior donning formidable armor. The mech suit wields the power to unleash fiery onslaughts, engulfing the battlefield in flames.

skills.name: BHF: Fiery Advance
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target.

skills.name: BHF: Heavenly Fire
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and any adjacent targets.

skills.name: BBHF: Scorched Earth
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to all targets.

skills.name: DHGDR: Secondary Combustion
skills.description: Consumes HP to enter the Secondary Combustion state and dispels the Weakness Protected effect. Becomes significantly more powerful in this state, but all attacks consume HP.

skills.name: DHGDR: Supernova Overload
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to all targets, with a high chance to Burn them.

skills.name: SGE: Molten Core
skills.description: After entering Secondary Combustion, Combusts both the area and targets' Skill Points. When consuming Combusted Skill Points, targets lose HP and additionally deal a set amount of Fire DMG equal to a certain percentage of the original DMG. When they receive healing from sources other than oneself, the amount of HP restored is massively reduced.

skills.name: SGE: Molten Engine
skills.description: While in Secondary Combustion, Sam possesses Molten Energy. When Sam is attacked and the attack consumes Skill Points, a corresponding amount of Molten Energy is reduced. When Molten Energy is depleted or when the Weakness is Broken, dispels Secondary Combustion. When Secondary Combustion is dispelled, Sam receives increased DMG, and recovers all Skill Points for the targets.

3024023.description: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is one of the Stellaron Hunters, a mysterious warrior donning formidable armor. The mech suit wields the power to unleash fiery onslaughts, engulfing the battlefield in flames.

skills.name: BHF: Fiery Advance
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target.

skills.name: BHF: Fiery Advance
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and locks on to the target. In the next action, uses DHGDR: Fire and Cinders on the locked on target.

skills.name: BHF: Heavenly Fire
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and any adjacent targets.

skills.name: BBHF: Scorched Earth

When Molten Energy is depleted or when the Weakness is Broken, dispel Secondary Combustion. When Secondary Combustion is dispelled, Sam receives increased DMG and recovers all Skill Points for the targets.

skills.name: DHGDR: Fire and Cinders
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single target. When using the ability, the more Molten Energy stacks there are, the higher the damage dealt.

skills.name: SEG: Thermocumulative Upgrade
skills.description: Whenever Sam loses HP due to the Secondary Combustion effect while attacking, increase the DMG they deal.

skills.name: SEG: Thermobaric Field
skills.description: When a target uses Combusted Skill Points or receives Burn DMG, inflict <u>Immolation</u> on the target. When Sam dispels the Secondary Combustion, the <u>Immolation</u> effect is removed.

3025010.name: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus
3025010.description: Dominicus, the wisher of the Harmonious Choir, is one of the many embodiments of Xipe the Harmony. Due to the interferences from the Order, his appearance is different from before. Materialized as the Hive Mind's response to wishes, the hymns he conducts can reshape the world and create new laws per the wishes, and all who made this wish will become the source of his power.

skills.name: Grazioso
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Maestoso
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Vaneggiando
skills.description: Makes a single target have a high chance of entering <u>Alien Dream</u>.

skills.name: Accelerando
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Volteggiando" in the next turn.

skills.name: Accrescendo
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Tempestoso" in the next turn.

skills.name: Volteggiando
skills.description: Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

skills.name: Volteggiando
skills.description: Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

skills.name: Tempestoso
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets, and makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to all targets. After using this ability, restores Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

skills.name: Allargando
skills.description: Enters the "If We Live In the Light" state, gains a Shield, increases the DMG dealt, decreases the DMG taken, and makes Toughness immune to reduction.

skills.name: Im Anfang war das Wort
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. After 7 turns, uses "Im Anfang war die Tat."

skills.name: Im Anfang war die Tat
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets. This DMG application ignores the targets' DEF.

skills.name: Work of Creation
skills.description: "Embryo of Philosophy" Sunday has weaknesses of all Types. While "Embryo of Philosophy" Sunday is in the "Im Anfang war die Kraft" state, it will immediately take action after every action taken by targets and becomes immune to action delay effects caused by targets. When it becomes Weakness Broken, its action is additionally delayed. Moreover, after one stack of its Toughness is Broken, it applies <u>Walk in the Light</u> to targets.

skills.name: Come Un Sogno
skills.description: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus summons 4 "Echoes of Faded Dreams." The DMG dealt to the Echoes of Faded Dreams is completely redistributed to "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus instead. When this unit and Echoes of Faded Dreams become Weakness Broken, additionally delays action. For every stack of this unit's Toughness that is broken, apply the <u>Walk in the Light</u> state to targets.

3025011.name: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus
3025011.description: Dominicus, the wisher of the Harmonious Choir, is one of the many embodiments of Xipe the Harmony. Due to the interferences from the Order, his appearance is different from before. Materialized as the Hive Mind's response to wishes, the hymns he conducts can reshape the world and create new laws per the wishes, and all who made this wish will become the source of his power.

4012010.name: Furiae Warrior
4012010.description: A Titankin sculpted by "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. Their robust bodies are the shields of the army, and they use their stony corpus to cut off their foes, while their powerful limbs carry rations across the battlefield. They are also used as sparring partners by the soldiers of Kremnos.

skills.name: Collision of the Third Orbit
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target. When "War Armor" stacks are not 0 on this unit, there is a chance to inflict "Reverberation" on the target. When this unit has 0 "War Armor" stacks, inflict "Reverberation" on this unit.

skills.name: Polis Protector
skills.description: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4012020.name: Furiae Philosopher
4012020.description: A Titankin sculpted by "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. They contain plundered "rationality" within their vessels. The reason behind their creation is not truly toward the study of universal knowledge, but to delve deep into brutal martial tactics and the merciless laws of survival, further spreading madness masquerading as philosophy.

skills.name: Just War
skills.description: Enters the "Proselytize" state, increasing one friendly unit's SPD and DMG dealt.

skills.name: War, Father of All
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Living Eternal Flame
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, increases the attacker's SPD and DMG dealt.

skills.name: Polis Protector
skills.description: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4012030.name: Furiae Archer
4012030.description: A Titankin sculpted by "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. With faith as steadfast as flying arrows, they are the means to find prey for Kremnos' forces, hunting down beasts and foes across the wastes, and ensuring none survive within firing range.

skills.name: Weeping Arrow
skills.description: Launches several rounds of attacks from the right side of the target team, and delivers a 1 time priority attack to each target, with the remaining attack counts attacking random targets. Each attack deals minor Lightning DMG. When a target is hit more than once in this ability, additionally deals Lightning DMG. When the "War Armor" stack reaches 0, the next attack count of "Weeping Arrow" will be reduced.

skills.name: Polis Protector

4012040.name: Furiae Troupe
4012040.description: A Titankin sculpted by "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. They are singers under the Lance of Fury. In their lyrics come praises for soldiers and the mad king, using divine spells to call upon Nikador's blessings.

skills.name: Praise Nikador
skills.description: Enters the "War Song" state. Increases max "War Armor" stacks for friendly units aside from this unit. When entering battle, immediately enters the "War Song" state.

skills.name: Into the Supple Fire
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

4012050.name: "Spirithief" Bartholos
4012050.description: The twin sprites roaming the wilds and alleys of Amphoreus, taking pleasure in stealing valuables and playing tricks on travelers. They often outpace Treasure Hunters at the last moment, leaving only a coin as a harmless joke.

skills.name: Brainteaser-Repeating Pun
skills.description: "Bartholos" presents a brainteaser, entering the "Brainteaser" state. Targets can respond with "Basic ATK," "Skill," or "Ultimate."

skills.name: Brainteaser-Repeating Pun
skills.description: "Bartholos" presents a brainteaser, entering the "Brainteaser" state. Targets can respond with "Basic ATK," "Skill," or "Ultimate."

skills.name: Brainteaser-Repeating Pun
skills.description: "Bartholos" presents a brainteaser, entering the "Brainteaser" state. Targets can respond with "Basic ATK," "Skill," or "Ultimate."

skills.name: Looping Explanation
skills.description: Use the correct attack method to respond to "Bartholos"'s brainteaser, and "Bartholos" will immediately change the brainteaser, taking Physical DMG based on a percentage of its Max HP. When "Bartholos" leaves the battle, increases the DMG dealt by all targets.

4012051.name: "Spirithief" Bartholos
4012051.description: The twin sprites roaming the wilds and alleys of Amphoreus, taking pleasure in stealing valuables and playing tricks on travelers. They often outpace Treasure Hunters at the last moment, leaving only a coin as a harmless joke.

4012060.name: Conquer or Be Conquered
4012060.description:
The tip of its spear has drawn a boundless border.
The people and soldiers within the border are marked as conquered, or ones to be conquered.
The blood of the fearful will become honey for the divine body, and the souls of the defiant will walk into the palace of glory under the River of Souls.

skills.name: Tyrant of the Vanquished
skills.description: "Conquer or Be Conquered" will not take action.

skills.name: Bearing All Wounds
skills.description: When attacked by a target with the corresponding "Conquered" state, the DMG taken increases greatly. When receiving a killing blow, consumes the HP of "The Giver, Master of Legions, Lance of Fury."

4012070.name: The Long Arms of Sorrow
4012070.description: All who wish to futilely escape the end must face the underworld's pursuit.

skills.name: The Living Shan't Flee
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one target.

skills.name: The Dead Shan't Avoid
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one target and its adjacent targets. This DMG converts to Quantum "<u>Atrophy DMG</u>" against targets with HP above a certain percentage.

skills.name: Between Life and Death
skills.description: While in the "Overdue Obituary" state, "The Living Shan't Flee" enhances to "The Dead Shan't Avoid."

When Breaking "The Long Arms of Sorrow," reduces "Guide of Withering and Decay's" Toughness and HP. 4012077.description: All who wish to futilely escape the end must face the underworld's pursuit.

skills.name: The Living Shan't Flee
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one target.

skills.name: The Dead Shan't Avoid
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG and Quantum <u>"Atrophy DMG"</u> to one target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Death Blooms
skills.description: While "Guide of Withering and Decay" is in <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state, "The Long Arms of Sorrow's" "The Living Shan't Flee" is enhanced to "The Dead Shan't Avoid." When Breaking "The Long Arms of Sorrow," reduces "Guide of Withering and Decay's" Toughness and HP. If "Guide of Withering and Decay" is in the <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state at this time, all targets additionally restore HP.

4012080.name: Daythunder Raven
4012080.description: A crow from the flock surrounding the Theos Synthetos. Possesses the ability to polarize the weather. Leaving them unchecked could be dangerous.

skills.name: Discharge
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Heat It Up
skills.description: Increases current "<u>Temperature</u>." When this unit is Weakness Broken, reduces current "<u>Temperature</u>."

skills.name: Polarization
skills.description: Increases the number of "<u>Thunderclouds</u>." When this unit is Weakness Broken, reduces number of "<u>Thunderclouds</u>."

4012090.name: Twig of Hundred Eyes
4012090.description: Theos Synthetos's wandering monocular eye. It lacks imaging capability and primarily functions to assist the main eye in polarizing the weather.

4012091.name: Shoot of Hundred Eyes
4012091.description: Theos Synthetos's wandering monocular eye. It lacks imaging capability and primarily functions to assist the main eye in polarizing the weather.

4012092.name: Languid Ethmoid Bone
4012092.description: The skeletal structure that once supported Theos Synthetos's monocular eye. After being taken over by the black tide, it has inherited the ability to polarize weather.

4012093.name: Dried Lacrimal Bone
4012093.description: The skeletal structure that once supported Theos Synthetos's monocular eye. After being taken over by the black tide, it has inherited the ability to polarize weather.

4013010.name: Furiae Praetor
4013010.description:
A Titankin sculpted by "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. They are mighty constructs capable of housing a Titan's soul. With their greatswords, they stand ready to repel the rush of the black tide or turn their blade in a countering onslaught in times of war.
Furiae Praetor will sacrifice their weaker kin, exchanging atrocity for divine punishments from the Titan.

skills.name: From Skyveil to Dawn
skills.description: Starting from the leftmost target, uses a sweeping attack on 3 consecutive targets, dealing minor Imaginary DMG.

skills.name: From Dawn to Skyveil
skills.description: Starting from the rightmost target, uses a sweeping attack on 3 consecutive targets, dealing minor Imaginary DMG.

skills.name: Resembling Furious Lion
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Drowned in the Crimson Sea" in the next turn.

skills.name: Drowned in the Crimson Sea
skills.description: Absorbs "Furiae Warrior," then deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets and inflicts Vulnerability on them. The DMG and Vulnerability states are <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets. The more "Furiae Warriors" absorbed, the higher the DMG dealt.

skills.name: Rise from the Grave
skills.description: Summons "Furiae Warrior."

skills.name: Polis Protector
skills.description: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4013011.name: Furiae Praetor
4013011.description:
A Titankin sculpted by "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. They are mighty constructs capable of housing a Titan's soul. With their greatswords, they stand ready to repel the rush of the black tide or turn their blade in a countering onslaught in times of war.
Furiae Praetor will sacrifice their weaker kin, exchanging atrocity for divine punishments from the Titan.

skills.name: From Skyveil to Dawn
skills.description: Starting from the leftmost target, uses a sweeping attack on 3 consecutive targets, dealing minor Imaginary DMG.

skills.name: From Dawn to Skyveil
skills.description: Starting from the rightmost target, uses a sweeping attack on 3 consecutive targets, dealing minor Imaginary DMG.

skills.name: Resembling Furious Lion
skills.description: Enters the Charging state and absorbs adjacent targets. Uses "Drowned in the Crimson Sea" in the next turn.

skills.name: Drowned in the Crimson Sea
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets and inflicts "Vulnerability" on them. The DMG and "Vulnerability" are <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets.

skills.name: Rise from the Grave
skills.description: Summons "Furiae Warrior."

skills.name: Polis Protector
skills.description: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit when attacked. When at 0 stacks, immediately uses "Resembling Furious Lion." After absorbing targets, deals massive Imaginary DMG to all friendly units and regenerate Energy to the target that destroyed "War Armor." After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4013012.description:

4013013.description:

They are mighty constructs capable of housing a Titan's soul. skills.description: Starting from the rightmost target, uses a sweeping attack on 3 consecutive targets, dealing minor Imaginary DMG.

skills.name: Resembling Furious Lion
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Drowned in the Crimson Sea" in the next turn.

skills.name: Drowned in the Crimson Sea
skills.description: Absorbs "Furiae Warrior," then deals massive Imaginary DMG to all ally targets and inflicts "Vulnerability." The DMG and Vulnerability states are <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets. The more "Furiae Warriors" absorbed, the higher the DMG dealt.

skills.name: Rise from the Grave
skills.description: Summons "Furiae Warrior."

skills.name: Polis Protector
skills.description: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4014010.name: Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife
4014010.description:
The Titan of Strife continues the mad war in their frenzy, becoming the unconquerable fear of the masses of Amphoreus.
They once were famed through glory, earning respect from gods and from the people of the land. And yet, the city that revered them was sundered, and the poems that praised their name were destroyed. Only their evil reputation lingers in this lightless era and end times, tainting the Throne of Worlds' brilliance.

skills.name: Lightning Spear of the Firmament
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Worldsplitting Spine
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Hewing of the River of Souls
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Survivors Unto Dead Waters
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Unceasing Flames of War
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Pyre of High Graves
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Sky-Piercing Lance
skills.description: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random single targets.

skills.name: Ruination of Night and Light
skills.description: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random single targets.

skills.name: Calamity Eternal
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets and apply <u>"Glory"</u>. At the same time, this unit obtains "Titanic Corpus." When "Titanic Corpus" stacks are reduced to 0, this unit's action is delayed, takes massive Imaginary DMG, and regenerates Energy for all targets. Possessing "Titanic Corpus" will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next attack, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on all attacked targets.

skills.name: All Realms Leveled, All Legions to Dust
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets. The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets.

skills.name: Polis Protector
skills.description: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

skills.name: Valorous Death Before Glorious Return
skills.description: When using "Calamity Eternal," apply <u>"Glory"</u> to all targets. Every stack of <u>"Glory"</u> increases DMG dealt and Energy Regeneration Rate. When the affected target uses Skill or Ultimate, <u>"Glory"</u> can be stacked. After the next action by "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife," dispel <u>"Glory"</u> from all targets.

When max "<u>Glory</u>" stacks are active, gain immunity to Crowd Control debuffs.

skills.name: Borrowed Mercy
skills.description: Each time a target is inflicted with Imprisonment, slightly increase this unit's DMG dealt.

4014016.name: Victor, Acropolis, and Lord of Strife
4014016.description:
A supporter of "Strife." Their madness has been tamed by that tenacious soul, and their master remains unwavering ever since.
Like a war song and the northern wind, they wield their spear with resolution: To decimate enemies, to temper the soldiers, to deliver glory, respect, and determination to their friend and savior.
