skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets and apply <u>"Glory"</u>. At the same time, this unit obtains "Titanic Corpus." When "Titanic Corpus" stacks reduce to 0, this unit's action is delayed, takes massive Imaginary DMG, and regenerates Energy for all targets. Possessing "Titanic Corpus" will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next attack, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on all attacked targets.

skills.name: All Realms Leveled, All Legions to Dust
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets. The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets.

skills.name: Polis Protector
skills.description: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

skills.name: Valorous Death Before Glorious Return
skills.description: When using "Calamity Eternal," apply <u>"Glory"</u> to all targets. Every stack of <u>"Glory"</u> increases DMG dealt and Energy Regeneration Rate. When the affected target uses Skill or Ultimate, <u>"Glory"</u> can be stacked. After the next action by "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife," dispel <u>"Glory"</u> from all targets.

skills.name: Kremnos War Song
skills.description: Black Mud will appear in battle to enhance the Boss. After enhancement, "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife (Corrupted)" can take consecutive actions.

4014020.name: The Giver, Master of Legions, Lance of Fury
4014020.description:
The undefeated. The sovereign of all battles. The king of Castrum Kremnos and of ruins,
Grand Artisan of the war chariot, the throne upon a mountain of corpses, and father of victory,
The tyrant of glories, the lightning that split the sea, the Guardian of Amphoreus,
The Titan of Strife, the Lance of Fury: Nikador.
A general that all the world should heed, the eternal sharp sword, the law of Strife and of ending Strife.
Praise Nikador, greatest of conquerors, greatest of guardians.

skills.name: The Vanquished Behold Woe
skills.description: Every target character generates 1 corresponding "Conquer or Be Conquered," which inflicts "Conquered" to the corresponding character. "Conquered" will decrease the character's Maximum Restorable HP. Decreasing the HP of the corresponding "Conquer or Be Conquered" can restore an equal percentage of the character's Maximum Restorable HP.

skills.name: Glory to All Honorable Dead
skills.description: Apply "Strife-Granted Fear" to all target characters. When "Conquered" is dispelled, the corresponding "Strife-Granted Fear" is also dispelled.

skills.name: Fury Falls, and All Bows to Strife
skills.description: Controls "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife" to deal Imaginary DMG to all ally target characters based on a percentage of their Max HP. This DMG ignores the target's DEF, with a high chance of applying Imprisonment to targets in the "Conquered" state.

skills.name: The Fallen Feeds My Might
skills.description: Absorbs remaining "Conquer or Be Conquered" to enhance "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife." At the same time, adds Toughness Protection and dispels Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Break debuffs on "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife."

4014022.name: The Giver, Master of Legions, Lance of Fury (Complete)
4014022.description:
A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The reference entity is The undefeated. The sovereign of all battles. The king of Castrum Kremnos and of ruins,
Grand Artisan of the war chariot, the throne upon a mountain of corpses, and father of victory,
The tyrant of glories, the lightning that split the sea, the Guardian of Amphoreus,
The Titan of Strife, the Lance of Fury: Nikador.
A general that all the world should heed, the eternal sharp sword, the law of Strife and of ending Strife.
Praise Nikador, greatest of conquerors, greatest of guardians.

skills.name: The Vanquished Behold Woe
skills.description: Every target character spawns a corresponding "Conquer or Be Conquered," and causes the corresponding character to enter a "Conquered" state. "Conquered" will reduce the character's Maximum Restorable HP. Reducing the HP of the corresponding "Conquer or Be Conquered" restores the corresponding Maximum Restorable HP. If there are undefeated "Conquer or Be Conquered," the remaining "Conquered" effect will be converted into a proportion of "Conquered Eon."

skills.name: Glory to All Honorable Dead
skills.description: Inflicts "Drowning in Terror" on all target characters. When "Conquered" state is dispelled, the corresponding "Drowning in Terror" is also dispelled.

skills.name: Fury Falls, and All Bows to Strife
skills.description: Controls "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife" to deal Imaginary DMG to all target characters based on a percentage of their Max HP. This DMG ignores the target's DEF, with a high chance of applying Imprisonment to targets in the "Conquered" state.

skills.name: The Fallen Feeds My Might
skills.description: Absorbs remaining "Conquer or Be Conquered" to enhance "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife." At the same time, adds Toughness Protection and dispels Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Break debuffs on "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife."

4014023.name: Mydeimos, Lance of Fury
4014023.description:
The undefeated. The sovereign of all battles. The king of Castrum Kremnos and of ruins,
Grand Artisan of the war chariot, the throne upon a mountain of corpses, and Father of Victory,
The tyrant of glories, the lightning that split the sea, the Guardian of Amphoreus,
The demigod of Strife, the Lance of Fury, Mydeimos.
A general that all the world should heed, the eternal sharp sword, the law of Strife and of ending Strife.
Praise Mydeimos, greatest of conquerors, greatest of guardians, the strongest of all.

skills.name: The Vanquished Behold Woe
skills.description: Every target character generates 1 corresponding "Conquer or Be Conquered," which inflicts "Conquered" to the corresponding character. "Conquered" will decrease the character's Maximum Restorable HP. Decreasing the HP of the corresponding "Conquer or Be Conquered" can restore an equal percentage of the character's Maximum Restorable HP.

skills.name: Glory to All Honorable Dead
skills.description: Apply "Strife-Granted Fear" to all target characters. When "Conquered" is dispelled, the corresponding "Strife-Granted Fear" is also dispelled.

skills.name: Fury Falls, and All Bows to Strife
skills.description: Controls "Victor, Acropolis, and Lord of Strife" to deal Imaginary DMG to all target characters based on a percentage of their Max HP. This DMG ignores the target's DEF, with a high chance of applying Imprisonment to targets in the "Conquered" state.

skills.name: The Fallen Feeds My Might
skills.description: Absorbs remaining "Conquer or Be Conquered" to enhance "Victor, Acropolis, and Lord of Strife." At the same time, adds Toughness Protection and dispels Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Break debuffs on "Victor, Acropolis, and Lord of Strife."

4014030.name: Pollux, Netherwing Husk, Ferry of Souls
4014030.description:
Netherwing, slumbering dormant in the River of Souls, has been reawakened by an alchemical summoning and morphed into a thing of rot and decay.
It once was the Death Titan, swimming upstream in the River of Souls' currents, leaving the realm of non-existence and stranded in the mortal world. Once, they followed the tides of the River of Souls to drown the living lands, branding all things in Amphoreus with a fated end. All the existences that will die or have died will feel a shudder in the depths of their souls with the dragon's return.

skills.name: To Stay the Fallen
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one target. This DMG converts to Quantum "<u>Atrophy DMG</u>" against targets with HP above a certain percentage.

skills.name: To Bury the Slumbered
skills.description: Deals massive Quantum DMG to all targets. The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among all target units. Against targets with HP above a certain percentage, this DMG converts to Quantum "<u>Atrophy DMG</u>."

skills.name: To Mourn the Departing
skills.description: Deals Quantum "<u>Atrophy DMG</u>" to 3 random targets.

skills.name: Bitterness Delivers Belated Evil News
skills.description: Causes "The Long Arms of Sorrow" to be enhanced and advances its action, lasting for 3 turns.

skills.name: To Die in Aromatic Pain
skills.description: Enters the <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state and deals massive Quantum "<u>Atrophy DMG</u>" to all target characters. This DMG is "<u>Non-fatal</u>" and inflicts all target characters with <u>"Indulging Slumber."</u> In the second phase and before this unit's next action, its Toughness cannot be reduced, and it is immune to action delay effects caused by targets.

skills.name: Death Wishes For More Death
skills.description: Deals Quantum "<u>Atrophy DMG</u>" to all targets. Deals additional Quantum "<u>Atrophy DMG</u>" to targets in the <u>"Indulging Slumber"</u> state, delaying their action with a high chance of inflicting Entanglement.

skills.name: Inky Fog of a Near-Death Dream
skills.description: Decreases the initial DMG this unit and "The Long Arms of Sorrow" receive. When targets lose HP, they accumulate "Desperate Bubble." When "Desperate Bubble" reaches the limit, advances this unit's action and enters the <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state in its next turn. Under that state, removes this unit's and "The Long Arms of Sorrow"'s DMG Reduction state. When <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> is dispelled, this unit will take DMG and restore targets' HP.

skills.name: Because I Could Not Stop For Death
skills.description: When "Pollux" or "The Long Arms of Sorrow" hits a target with an ability, applies a special Unremovable DoT DMG state to the target. While under this state, the higher the target's HP percentage is, the more DMG they take. This DMG is "<u>Non-fatal</u>."

4014031.name: Pollux, Netherwing Husk, Ferry of Souls (Complete)
4014031.description:
A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referenced entity is Netherwing: Pollux, the slumbering dragon in the River of Souls, which has been reawakened by an alchemical summoning and morphed into a thing of rot and decay.
It once was the Death Titan, swimming upstream in the River of Souls' currents, leaving the realm of non-existence and stranded in the mortal world. Once, they followed the tides of the River of Souls to drown the living lands, branding all things in Amphoreus with a fated end. All the existences that will die or have died will feel a shudder in the depths of their souls with the dragon's return.

The DMG dealt is <u>"Non-fatal"</u> and inflicts <u>"Indulging Slumber"</u> to all targets. In Phase 3, immediately enters the <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state and enhances all of "The Long Arms of Sorrow." Additionally, targets with a lower HP percentage will enter <u>"Indulging Slumber"</u> state again.

skills.name: Death Wishes For More Death

When "Desperate Bubble" reaches the limit, this unit advances its action and enters the <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state when it takes its next action. When <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> is dispelled, this unit will take DMG and restore targets' HP.

skills.name: Because I Could Not Stop For Death

skills.name: Putrescence That Follows
skills.description: In <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state, the DMG dealt by this unit increases slightly each time their turn ends.

4014032.name: Pollux, Netherwing Husk, Ferry of Souls
4014032.description:

4014033.name: Castorice, Hand of Shadow
4014033.description:
The broken body of "Death" that remains in the limbo of life and death, they woke once again to fight against fate.
The demigod could not bear to witness a friend walk toward an end more cruel than Death, and thus reached out their long arm to stop the friend. Even though withered bones and rotting flesh are all they have left, their power and determination are not to be underestimated.

skills.name: Compassion in Death
skills.description: Black Mud will appear in battle to enhance the Boss. After enhancement, "Pollux, Netherwing Husk, Ferry of Souls (Corrupted)" will immediately enter the "Fragrance of Death" state and use "To Die in Aromatic Pain."

4014036.name: Guide of Withering and Decay
4014036.description:
Netherwing, slumbering dormant in the River of Souls, has been reawakened by an alchemical summoning and morphed into a thing of rot and decay.
It once was the Death Titan, swimming upstream in the River of Souls' currents, leaving the realm of non-existence and stranded in the mortal world. Once, they followed the tides of the River of Souls to drown the living lands, branding all things in Amphoreus with a fated end. All the existences that will die or have died will feel a shudder in the depths of their souls with the dragon's return.

skills.name: To Stay the Fallen
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one target. If "Guide of Withering and Decay" is in the <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state, additionally deals Quantum <u>"Atrophy DMG"</u>.

skills.name: To Bury the Slumbered
skills.description: Deals massive Quantum DMG to all targets, with the DMG <u>distributed evenly</u> among all target units. If "Guide of Withering and Decay" is in the <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state, additionally deals Quantum <u>"Atrophy DMG"</u> to each target.

skills.name: To Mourn the Departing
skills.description: Deals Quantum "<u>Atrophy DMG</u>" to 3 random targets.

skills.name: Bitterness Delivers Belated Evil News
skills.description: Causes all "The Long Arms of Sorrow" in the Weakness Broken state to dispel their Weakness Break, restore all Toughness, and immediately take action.

skills.name: To Die in Aromatic Pain
skills.description: Enters the <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state and deals massive Quantum <u>"Atrophy DMG"</u> to all target characters.

skills.name: Death Wishes For More Death
skills.description: Deals Quantum <u>"Atrophy DMG"</u> to all targets. Deals fatal damage to targets in the <u>"Death Rattle"</u> state.

skills.name: Inky Fog of a Near-Death Dream
skills.description: Decreases the initial DMG this unit and "The Long Arms of Sorrow" receive, and grants Toughness Protection state. When targets lose HP, they accumulate "Desperate Bubble." When "Desperate Bubble" reaches the maximum, this unit enters the <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> state. Under that state, removes this unit's and "The Long Arms of Sorrow"'s DMG Reduction and Toughness Protection states. When <u>"Fragrance of Death"</u> is dispelled, this unit takes DMG and enters Weakness Break state.

skills.name: Because I Could Not Stop For Death
skills.description: When "Guide of Withering and Decay" or "The Long Arms of Sorrow" attacks a target with an ability, applies a special Unremovable DoT state to the target. While under this state, the higher the target's HP percentage is, the more DMG they take.

skills.name: Dying Struggle
skills.description: All targets in the battle are inflicted with the <u>"Overloadable"</u> state. Targets in the <u>"Death Rattle"</u> state deal greatly reduced DMG and have greatly reduced Weakness Break Efficiency. If targets remain in the <u>"Death Rattle"</u> state for a certain number of turns, they will receive fatal damage.

skills.name: Flesh-Corroding Retaliation
skills.description: When the "Guide of Withering and Decay" is in the "Dream of Demise" state, "The Long Arms of Sorrow" will gain the <u>"Corrosive Retaliation"</u> state.

skills.name: Brilliance-Devouring Abyss
skills.description: "Guide of Withering and Decay" has no Weakness. When "The Long Arms of Sorrow" is in the Weakness Broken state, its initial Weakness will be added to all other enemy targets until it recovers from the Weakness Broken state.

4015010.name: Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky
4015010.description:
The Sky Titan. Theos Synthetos. Conquered by and fused with humanity, they no longer govern Amphoreus' cycle of day and night, yet their aloof pride remains unchanged.
In their mind, the shattered world's mundane mortals are unsightly  compared to a world safeguarded by light, the mindless human masses seem more befitting of the black tide.

skills.name: Three Thousand Leagues Ablaze
skills.description: Raises "<u>Temperature</u>." Launches several attacks from the left side of the target team, and delivers a 1-time priority attack to each target, with the remaining attack counts attacking one random target each. Each attack deals Fire DMG based on the current "<u>Temperature</u>," as well as <u>reinstates</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Flame Beyond the Horizon
skills.description: Raises "<u>Temperature</u>." Deals Fire DMG to all targets based on the current "<u>Temperature</u>," and <u>reinstates</u> "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Exhalation of the Month of Everday
skills.description: Raises "<u>Temperature</u>." Deals Fire DMG to all targets based on the current "<u>Temperature</u>." Delays all targets' actions based on the current "<u>Temperature</u>," and <u>reinstates</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes" and "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Splendor, Like Clouds Cresting the Sky
skills.description: Enters a Charging state and uses "Fury, Incineration of Dawn and Dusk" with the next action. Applies "<u>Helium Flash</u>" to this unit and summons "Daythunder Raven." When in this state, after a target uses an attack, reduces "<u>Helium Flash</u>" based on the number of friendly units hit in this attack.

skills.name: Fury, Incineration of Dawn and Dusk
skills.description: Deals massive Fire DMG to all targets based on this unit's current "<u>Helium Flash</u>." The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among targets while also raising the "<u>Temperature</u>" based on the current "<u>Helium Flash</u>" and <u>reinstating</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes" and "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Thunder From the Distance
skills.description: Increases the "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks. Launches several attacks from the left side of the target team, and delivers a 1-time priority attack to each target, with the remaining attack counts attacking one random target each. Each attack deals Lightning DMG as well as <u>reinstates</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Surge Across the Leagues
skills.description: Increases the "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks. Deals Lightning DMG to all targets and <u>reinstates</u> "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Illumination of the Month of Fortune
skills.description: Increases the "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks. Deals Lightning DMG to all targets and <u>reinstates</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes" and "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Thunderclap, Quake of Mount and Seas
skills.description: Increases "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks and enters Charging state. Uses "Wrath, Rend of Eternal Sky" in the next action. This unit gains "<u>Ionization</u>" and summons "Daythunder Raven." In this state, after targets attack, they seize "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks based on the number of friendly units hit in this attack. When "Daythunder Raven," "Shoot of Hundred Eyes," or "Twig of Hundred Eyes" receives a killing blow, seizes a set number of "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks. If all "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks have been seized by the targets, this unit will enter the Weakness Break state. If this unit is Weakness Broken, all "<u>Thunderclouds</u>" are lost, and deals minor Lightning DMG from all the "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks.

skills.name: Wrath, Rend of Eternal Sky
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to all targets and consumes a certain amount "<u>Thundercloud(s)</u>." Deals a corresponding amount of minor Lightning DMG to random target and <u>reinstates</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes" and "Twig of Hundred Eyes." Afterward, deals a corresponding amount of minor Lightning Additional DMG to this unit based on the contested Thunderclouds between the targets and this unit.

skills.name: Hundred Eyes
skills.description: During this battle, upon inflicting DMG to "Daythunder Raven," "Shoot of Hundred Eyes," and "Twig of Hundred Eyes," "Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky" will also lose an equivalent amount of HP. When "Daythunder Raven," "Shoot of Hundred Eyes," or "Twig of Hundred Eyes" receives a killing blow, "Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky" will also receive Toughness DMG, and "Shoot of Hundred Eyes" or "Twig of Hundred Eyes" will start healing and cannot be selected.

skills.name: Stormfall
skills.description: When it storms, the environment will have "<u>Thunderclouds</u>." When the "Daythunder Raven," "Shoot of Hundred Eyes," or "Twig of Hundred Eyes" receive a killing blow while "Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky" is not in "<u>Ionization</u>" state, reduces a certain amount of "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks and deal minor Lightning DMG to "Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky."

skills.name: The Sun Unyielding
skills.description: When it is sunny, the environment will have "<u>Temperature</u>." At the start of any target's turn, the "<u>Temperature</u>" rises. DMG dealt by targets will increase based on "<u>Temperature</u>." All targets enter the "Solar Storm" state. At the start of a target's turn, deals Fire DMG based on the "<u>Temperature</u>." This DMG is "<u>Non-fatal</u>." When the "Daythunder Raven," "Shoot of Hundred Eyes," and "Twig of Hundred Eyes" receive a killing blow, "<u>Temperature</u>" will be lowered.

4015011.name: Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky
4015011.description:
The Sky Titan. Theos Synthetos. Conquered by and fused with humanity, they no longer govern Amphoreus' cycle of day and night, yet their aloof pride remains unchanged.
In their mind, the shattered world's mundane mortals are unsightly  compared to a world safeguarded by light, the mindless human masses seem more befitting of the black tide.

skills.name: Three Thousand Leagues Ablaze
skills.description: Raises "<u>Temperature</u>." Launches several attacks from the left side of the target team, and delivers a 1-time priority attack to each target, with the remaining attack counts attacking one random target each. Each attack deals Fire DMG based on the current "<u>Temperature</u>," as well as <u>reinstates</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Flame Beyond the Horizon
skills.description: Raises "<u>Temperature</u>." Deals Fire DMG to all targets based on the current "<u>Temperature</u>," and <u>reinstates</u> "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Exhalation of the Month of Everday
skills.description: Raises "<u>Temperature</u>." Deals Fire DMG to all targets based on the current "<u>Temperature</u>." Delays all targets' actions based on the current "<u>Temperature</u>," and <u>reinstates</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes" and "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Splendor, Like Clouds Cresting the Sky
skills.description: Enters a Charging state and uses "Fury, Incineration of Dawn and Dusk" with the next action. Applies "<u>Helium Flash</u>" to this unit and summons "Daythunder Raven." When in this state, after a target uses an attack, reduces "<u>Helium Flash</u>" based on the number of friendly units hit in this attack.

skills.name: Fury, Incineration of Dawn and Dusk
skills.description: Deals massive Fire DMG to all targets based on this unit's current "<u>Helium Flash</u>." The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among targets while also raising the "<u>Temperature</u>" based on the current "<u>Helium Flash</u>" and <u>reinstating</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes" and "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Thunder From the Distance
skills.description: Increases the "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks. Launches several attacks from the left side of the target team, and delivers a 1-time priority attack to each target, with the remaining attack counts attacking one random target each. Each attack deals Lightning DMG as well as <u>reinstates</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Surge Across the Leagues
skills.description: Increases the "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks. Deals Lightning DMG to all targets and <u>reinstates</u> "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Illumination of the Month of Fortune
skills.description: Increases the "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks. Deals Lightning DMG to all targets and <u>reinstates</u> "Shoot of Hundred Eyes" and "Twig of Hundred Eyes."

skills.name: Thunderclap, Quake of Mount and Seas
skills.description: Increases "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks and enters Charging state. Uses "Wrath, Rend of Eternal Sky" in the next action. This unit gains "<u>Ionization</u>" and summons "Daythunder Raven." If all "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks have been seized by the targets, this unit will enter the Weakness Break state. If this unit is Weakness Broken, all "<u>Thunderclouds</u>" are lost, and deals minor Lightning DMG from all the "<u>Thundercloud</u>" stacks.

Afterward, deals a corresponding amount of minor Lightning Additional DMG to this unit based on the contested Thunderclouds between the targets and this unit.

When "Daythunder Raven," "Shoot of Hundred Eyes," or "Twig of Hundred Eyes" receives a killing blow, "Sublime, Radiant, Avatar of the Sky" will also receive Toughness DMG, and "Shoot of Hundred Eyes" or "Twig of Hundred Eyes" will start healing and cannot be selected.

skills.description: When it is sunny, the environment will have "<u>Temperature</u>." At the start of any target's turn, the "<u>Temperature</u>" rises. DMG dealt by targets will increase based on "<u>Temperature</u>." All targets enter the "Solar Storm" state. At the start of a target's turn, deals Fire DMG based on the "<u>Temperature</u>." This DMG is "<u>Non-fatal</u>." When the "Daythunder Raven," "Shoot of Hundred Eyes," and "Twig of Hundred Eyes" receive a killing blow, "<u>Temperature</u>" will be lowered.

skills.name: Ashes to the Distant Shore
skills.description: <u>Reinstates</u> the "Languid Ethmoid Bone" and deals a set amount of massive Imaginary DMG to one designated target, while inflicting "<u>Rot</u>" to them. "<u>Rot</u>" is stackable.

skills.name: Extinguishment of the Savaged Star
skills.description: <u>Reinstates</u> the "Dried Lacrimal Bone" and deals a set amount of massive Imaginary DMG to all targets. The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets.

skills.name: Eye of Terror
skills.description: Enters "The Dark Tides Cometh" state. Uses "Unmaking Ashes: Godsfall" in the next action, and <u>reinstates</u> the "Languid Ethmoid Bone" and "Dried Lacrimal Bone".

skills.name: Unmaking Ashes: Godsfall
skills.description: Deals a set amount of massive Imaginary DMG to all targets, and <u>reinstates</u> the "Languid Ethmoid Bone" and "Dried Lacrimal Bone".

skills.name: Remnants
skills.description: When inflicting DMG to "Languid Ethmoid Bone" or "Dried Lacrimal Bone" during this battle, an equal amount of HP will also be lost by "Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight." When "Languid Ethmoid Bone" or "Dried Lacrimal Bone" receive a killing blow, "Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight" will receive Toughness DMG, and "Languid Ethmoid Bone" or "Dried Lacrimal Bone" will restore HP and cannot be selected.

skills.name: Black Tide
skills.description: Adds "Black Tide" to Action Order. Every time the "Black Tide" takes action, inflicts all targets with "<u>Rot</u>." "<u>Rot</u>" is stackable. When targets suffer killing blows, inflicts "<u>Tide-Corrosion</u>" on them and Charges "Healing Rainbow." When all targets enter the "<u>Tide-Corrosion</u>" state or are downed, the battle ends in defeat.

skills.name: Tides Below
skills.description: During this battle, all DMG dealt by "Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight" will deal a set amount of DMG based on "Black Tide Sync Rate." After a target uses an attack, additionally deals "<u>Non-fatal</u>" <u>True DMG</u> based on "Black Tide Sync Rate." When "Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight" and "Black Tide" take action, increases "Black Tide Sync Rate." When "Languid Ethmoid Bone" or "Dried Lacrimal Bone" is defeated, reduces "Black Tide Sync Rate."

4015020.name: Decimator, Karma of Daythunder, Eye of Twilight
4015020.description: The image of the conqueror who once ruled the skies with absolute might, now consumed by the black tide. The rights and wrongs of their past may be difficult to judge, but at this moment, all that remains is a formless blaze of karmic destruction, seething with murderous intent.

4015021.name: Hyacinthia, Eye of Twilight
4015021.description:
This is what the demigod who mended the dawn with their smile looks like after they have been enveloped by the black tide. Although the brilliance of the Coreflame has been clouded, warmth still lingers 
The healer never wants to annihilate their old friend, instead vowing to disperse the gloomy clouds in the friend's heart.

4022010.name: Meteoric Eagle
4022010.description: In the ancient Era Creatura, Aquila, after forging the Dawn Device, collaborated with Kephale to bring forth the legendary beasts embodying the Titans. It is whispered that the Meteoric Eagle is a symbol of Aquila's celestial feathers that occasionally fall to the mortal realm.

skills.name: Pierce the Night Sky
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Shine Like Meteors
skills.description: Applies 1 stack of <u>"Stormride"</u> to one designated friendly unit. Units in the <u>"Stormride"</u> state will immediately take action at the end of their turn.

4023010.name: Noontide Gryphon
4023010.description: In the ancient Era Creatura, Aquila, after forging the Dawn Device, collaborated with Kephale to bring forth the legendary beasts embodying the Titans. The Noontide Gryphon is said to represent Aquila after opening their eyes to bestow light upon the world.

skills.name: Through the Darkness
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Heralding the Dawn
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to 3 consecutive targets, starting from the left side of the team, applies <u>Aquila's Mark</u> to targets hit, and also summons "Meteoric Eagle."

skills.name: Light the Future
skills.description: Lock on to 1 target and enters the "Light the Future" state. "Praise Aquila" will be used with next action.

skills.name: Praise Aquila
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to locked on targets and adjacent targets and applies <u>"Aquila's Mark"</u> to targets hit.

4023020.name: Moonlit Pegasus
4023020.description: In the ancient Era Creatura, Aquila, after forging the Dawn Device, collaborated with Kephale to bring forth the legendary beasts embodying the Titans. The Moonlit Pegasus is believed to represent Aquila's eternal rival, Oronyx.

skills.name: Creating Moonlight
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Triple Waning Moon
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to 3 consecutive targets, starting from the right side of the team, and applies <u>"Oronyx's Mark"</u> to targets hit.

skills.name: Double Waxing Moon
skills.description: Lock on to 2 targets and enters the "Double Waxing Moon" state. "Sixfold Plenilune" will be used with next action.

skills.name: Sixfold Plenilune
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to locked on targets and applies <u>"Oronyx's Mark"</u> to targets hit.

4032010.name: Tide-Eroded Blade
4032010.description:
A creature warped by the black tide, driven solely by an insatiable thirst for bloodshed.
Its razor-sharp blades can cleave through anything in its path, while its figure moves like a specter, spreading decay and corrosion to every corner of the world.

skills.name: Tip of Destruction
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Fated End
skills.description: When this unit's attack deals DMG to any target, converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to <u>"Corrosion"</u>.

4032020.name: Long-Shattered Vessel
4032020.description: Each and every clone summoned by the Flame Reaver using the Calamity Power is a seed of ruin harboring the will of destruction within.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Demise's Storm
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Fading Fate
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets. Converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to <u>"Corrosion"</u>.

skills.name: Prayers For Me
skills.description: Resists Crowd Control debuffs. When "Flame Reaver of the Deepest Dark" uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again and if this unit was summoned by that attack type, then this unit will attack alongside "Flame Reaver of the Deepest Dark." This unit is then absorbed by "Flame Reaver of the Deepest Dark," restoring the HP that was converted to "<u>Entangled By Agony,</u>" and granting "<u>Calamity Power</u>" to the Flame Reaver.

skills.name: Libations For Me
skills.description: After receiving a killing blow, if the number of "<u>Calamity Power</u>" stacks on "Flame Reaver of the Deepest Dark" is not 0, this unit is immediately resummoned. However, "Flame Reaver of the Deepest Dark" will lose 1 stack of "<u>Calamity Power</u>" and a certain percentage of HP. When "Flame Reaver of the Deepest Dark" uses "Cry Not For The Discarded," this unit will be absorbed and the HP that was converted to "<u>Entangled By Agony</u>" will be restored.

4032021.name: Long-Shattered Vessel
4032021.description: Each and every clone summoned by the Flame Reaver using the Calamity Power is a seed of ruin harboring the will of destruction within.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Demise's Storm
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target and its adjacent targets.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Fading Fate
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets. A portion of the hit target's reduced HP is converted to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Heed My Chants
skills.description: Resists Crowd Control debuffs. When "Flame Reaver of Doomsday Led Astray" is in the "Steadfast Safeguard" state, reduces DMG received by this unit. When "Flame Reaver of Doomsday Led Astray" uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again, if this unit was summoned by this attack, then this unit will attack together with "Flame Reaver of Doomsday Led Astray" and be absorbed afterward.

skills.name: Share In My Ritual
skills.description: After receiving a killing blow, if "Flame Reaver of Doomsday Led Astray" is still in the <u>"Shackle Shatter"</u> state, be instantly resummoned, but "Flame Reaver of Doomsday Led Astray" loses 1 <u>"Calamity Power"</u> stack and Toughness is reduced.

skills.name: Plummeting Strike
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Return to Faded Ashes
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target and is then absorbed by "Flame Reaver of Doomsday Led Astray," allowing them to gain 1 stack of <u>"Calamity Power"</u>.

4032022.description: Each and every fragment reflected from endless calamities is a seed of ruin harboring the will of destruction within.

4032023.name: Demon King's Minions
4032023.description: The Black Cloak Demon King's devoted retainers. Inherited part of the Demon King's power and violent personality. There's evidence of their crimes on every planet.

It is absorbed after this, restoring HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony"</u> and gaining "<u>Calamity Power</u>."

skills.description: Receives the killing blow when "Enfettered" is active. If "Black Cloak Demon King"'s <u>"Calamity Power"</u> stacks are not 0, this unit is immediately resummoned and enters "Enfettered" state, but will cause "Black Cloak Demon King" to lose 1 <u>"Calamity Power"</u> stack and a certain proportion of HP. skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets. A portion of the hit target's reduced HP is converted to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Prayers For Me
skills.description: Resists Crowd Control debuffs. When "Dawn-Denied Khaslana" uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again and if that attack summoned this unit, this unit will attack alongside "Dawn-Denied Khaslana." This unit is then absorbed by "Dawn-Denied Khaslana," restoring the HP that was converted to "<u>Entangled By Agony,</u>" and granting "<u>Calamity Power</u>" to "Dawn-Denied Khaslana."

skills.name: Libations For Me
skills.description: After receiving a killing blow, if the number of "<u>Calamity Power</u>" stacks on "Dawn-Denied Khaslana" is not 0, immediately resummoned this unit. However, "Dawn-Denied Khaslana" will lose 1 stack of "<u>Calamity Power</u>" and a certain percentage of HP. When "Dawn-Denied Khaslana" uses "Cry Not for the Discarded," this unit will be absorbed and the HP that was converted to "<u>Entangled By Agony</u>" will be restored.

4032030.name: Black Tide's Corroded Axe
4032030.description:
A creature warped by the black tide, driven solely by an insatiable thirst for bloodshed.
Wielding a massive axe weighing a thousand pounds, its charged strike can shatter even the hardest stone. Any living being that stands in its way is doomed to be crushed and corroded.

skills.name: Wrathful Blazing Axe
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Fire of Vengeance
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to all targets. The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among targets.

skills.name: Bitter Fracture
skills.description: When other friendly units are defeated, this unit immediately takes action and uses "Fire of Vengeance" once. When there are multiple "Black Tide's Corroded Axe" on the battlefield, only 1 "Black Tide's Corroded Axe"'s "Bitter Fracture" Talent can be triggered.

4032040.name: Black Tide Council
4032040.description:
A creature warped by the black tide, driven solely by an insatiable thirst for bloodshed.
Knowledge that once could have served humanity has inverted into civilization's foe. Specializing in ambush and strategic maneuvers, they hover like ravenous vultures, craving to deliver fresh sacrifices to the black tide.

skills.name: Lurking
skills.description: Causes this unit to enter the <u>"Lurking"</u> state.

skills.name: Broken Rationality
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Insidious Agitation
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target, then dispels the <u>"Lurking"</u> state. Can only be used while in the <u>"Lurking"</u> state.

skills.name: Flawed
skills.description: While this unit is in the <u>"Lurking"</u> state, increases their DMG taken. If the <u>"Lurking"</u> state is dispelled due to becoming Weakness Broken, this unit's action is delayed, and that Vulnerability effect lasts until the start of this unit's next action.

4032050.name: Black Tide's Decrepit Bow
4032050.description:
A creature warped by the black tide, driven solely by an insatiable thirst for bloodshed.
Holding a bow imbued with a curse, it can simultaneously attack targets in multiple directions while shooting. Any living being that enters its sight is doomed to face the inescapable aim of its arrows.

skills.name: Arrow of the Foul Tide
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Fated End
skills.description: When this unit's attack deals DMG to any target, converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to <u>"Corrosion"</u>.

4033010.name: Black Tide's Corroded Daemon
4033010.description:
A creature warped by the black tide, driven solely by an insatiable thirst for bloodshed.
Its once-human form is now engulfed in filth, exuding a nauseating aura of corrosion. Wherever the Corroded Beast treads, all life is stripped away.

skills.name: Shredding Landslide
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target. Converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Descending Decay
skills.description: Deals successive Physical DMG to one random target. Converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Filth Eater
skills.description: Absorbs target's <u>"Corrosion"</u>.

skills.name: Depravation
skills.description: This unit enters the "<u>Ominous Degeneration</u>" state. Uses "Torrential Surge" in the next action.

skills.name: Torrential Surge
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets and directly converts a percentage of all targets' Max HP to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Impurify
skills.description: Each time 1 target's "<u>Corrosion</u>" is absorbed, applies 1 stack of "Filth" to Black Tide's Corroded Daemon. When "Filth" is stacked to a certain amount, "Depravation" will be used in its next action, and clears all "Filth" stacks.

skills.name: Filth Eater
skills.description: Absorption of target's <u>"Corrosion"</u> failed, this unit's DEF is reduced.

4033020.name: Black Tide's Champion
4033020.description:
A creature warped by the black tide, driven solely by an insatiable thirst for bloodshed.
Its dueling spirit, once fierce in life, has been twisted by the black tide. Wielding a massive greatsword as tall as its shoulders, it wanders aimlessly, seeking any target to destroy, offering yet more entropy to the chaos of the world.

skills.name: Dreadtide
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Fatal Clash
skills.description: Causes this unit, a designated target character, and the target character's summon to enter the <u>"Duel"</u> state. Uses "Spirit Breaker" after 3 turns, prioritizing the target with the most number of buffs.

skills.name: Cast Marble
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Spirit Breaker
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Fated End
skills.description: When this unit's attack deals DMG to any target, converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to <u>"Corrosion"</u>.

4033030.name: Dark Sun Gryphon
4033030.description:
Noontide Gryphon corroded by the black tide, driven solely by an insatiable thirst for bloodshed.
Even after losing Aquila's blessings, the inexhaustible energy within the black tide has turned it into something even more horrifying.

skills.name: Blacklight Emission
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all targets. Converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Icon of Evernight
skills.description: Summons an "Archer of the Dark Sun." When "Archer of the Dark Sun" is defeated, this unit will lose a portion of HP. "Archers of the Dark Sun" will not actively take action. After this unit attacks, all summoned "Archers of the Dark Sun" will perform one attack.

skills.name: Prophecy of the Eclipse
skills.description: Enters the "The Dead Winds Cometh" state. Uses "Carol of Heat Death" in the next action.

skills.name: Carol of Heat Death
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all targets. The higher a target's <u>"Corrosion"</u> HP is, the higher the DMG dealt. All HP under the effect of <u>"Corrosion"</u> will also immediately be lost.

4034010.name: Flame Reaver of the Deepest Dark
4034010.description:
A nameless swordmaster who came with the black tide and is hunting down the Titans' Coreflame. None knows their true identity.
Their power is incredible, and their swordplay is nigh impeccable. Within their sword, madness and obsession entwine, once leading to the fall of the Grove of Epiphany and Aedes Elysiae.

skills.name: Demise's Storm
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Fading Fate
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets. Converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to <u>"Corrosion"</u>.

skills.name: Roads Mingled
skills.description: Causes "Long-Shattered Vessel" to enter the "Mutual Sacrifice" state. Uses "Underworld's Grief" in a certain number of turns.

skills.name: Underworld's Grief
skills.description: Unleashes "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" together with "Long-Shattered Vessel." Then, absorbs "Long-Shattered Vessel" to heal this unit and obtains <u>"Calamity Power."</u>

skills.name: Silent Sorrow
skills.description: Obtains <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and enters the "Silent Sorrow" state. Uses "Cry Not For The Discarded" in the next action.

skills.name: But Suffering is Essential
skills.description: Consumes all <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and deals several instances of minor Physical DMG hits to all targets, where the more consumed "Calamity Power" stacks, the higher the instances of DMG. Then, deals minor Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Cry Not For The Discarded
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets and consumes all <u>"Calamity Power"</u> to additionally deal several instances of minor Physical DMG. The more consumed "Calamity Power" stacks, the higher the instances of DMG.

skills.name: Pain of Parting
skills.description: When using "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate," consumes HP to summon "Long-Shattered Vessel" and convert the consumed HP into <u>"Entangled By Agony."</u> If the "Long-Shattered Vessel" summoned by this attack is defeated, additionally deals Physical DMG to this unit. When this unit uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again, the "Long-Shattered Vessel" that was summoned by the attacking ability will attack together with this unit. This unit will then absorb the Vessel, restoring the HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony"</u> and granting <u>"Calamity Power"</u> to this unit.

skills.name: Lost Sacrifice
skills.description: When using "Silent Sorrow," consumes HP to summon a "Long-Shattered Vessel" and converts the consumed HP into <u>"Entangled By Agony."</u> When stacks of <u>"Calamity Power"</u> are not at 0 and if a "Long-Shattered Vessel" receives a killing blow, immediately consumes 1 stack of <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and a percentage of HP to re-resummon a "Long-Shattered Vessel." When using "Cry Not For The Discarded," absorbs any "Long-Shattered Vessel" and restores the HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony."</u>

skills.name: Resolute Farewell
skills.description: Receives a certain number of stacks of "DMG reduction," reducing DMG received by this unit. 1 stack is lost after defeating 1 "Long-Shattered Vessel."

4034011.description:
A nameless swordmaster who came with the black tide and is hunting down the Titans' Coreflame. None knows their true identity.
Their power is incredible, and their swordplay is nigh impeccable. Within their sword, madness and obsession entwine, once leading to the fall of the Grove of Epiphany and Aedes Elysiae.

This unit will then absorb the Vessel, restoring the HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony"</u> and granting <u>"Calamity Power"</u> to this unit.

skills.name: Resolute Farewell
skills.description: Receives a certain number of stacks of "DMG reduction," reducing DMG received by this unit. 1 stack is lost after defeating 1 "Long-Shattered Vessel."

4034012.name: "Black Cloak Demon King"
4034012.description: A horrifying Demon King that resides in the depths of the cosmos, with the power to stomp on the galaxy and punch through black holes. Millions of planets have been shrouded under his black cloak, and the entire cosmos pleads for a hero who can overthrow the Demon King's reign.

skills.name: Demise's Storm
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Fading Fate
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets. Converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Roads Mingled
skills.description: Causes "Demon King's Minions" to enter the "Mutual Sacrifice" state. Uses "Underworld's Grief" within a certain number of turns.

skills.name: Underworld's Grief
skills.description: Uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" together with "Demon King's Minions." Then, absorbs "Demon King's Minions" to heal this unit while obtaining "<u>Calamity Power</u>."

skills.name: Silent Sorrow

skills.name: Pain of Parting

When this unit uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again, the "Demon King's Minions" that were summoned by the attacking ability will attack together with this unit. This unit will then absorb the Minions, restoring the HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony"</u> and granting <u>"Calamity Power"</u> to this unit.

skills.name: Lost Sacrifice
skills.description: When using "Silent Sorrow," consumes HP to summon "Demon King's Minions" and converts the consumed HP into "<u>Entangled By Agony</u>." When stacks of <u>"Calamity Power"</u> are not at 0 and if a "Demon King's Minion" receives a killing blow, immediately consumes 1 stack of <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and a percentage of HP to resummon a "Demon King's Minion." When using "Cry Not for the Discarded," absorbs any "Demon King's Minion" and restores the HP that was converted to "<u>Entangled By Agony</u>."

skills.name: Resolute Farewell
skills.description: Receives a certain number of stacks of "DMG reduction," reducing DMG received by this unit. 1 stack is lost after defeating 1 "Demon King's Minion."

skills.name: Behold! The Invincible Black Cloak
skills.description: Expands an invincible black cloak that reduces all DMG received by this unit and "Demon King's Minions" to 1.

4034013.name: Flame Reaver of Doomsday Led Astray
4034013.description:
A nameless swordmaster who came with the black tide and is hunting down the Titans' Coreflame. None knows their true identity.
Their power is incredible, and their swordplay is nigh impeccable. Within their swords, madness and obsession entwine, once leading to the fall of the Grove of Epiphany and Aedes Elysiae.

skills.name: Underworld's Grief

skills.name: Dying Sobs
skills.description: Obtains <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and enters the "Dying Sobs" state. Uses "But Suffering is Essential" in the next action.

skills.name: Silent Sorrow

skills.name: Pain of Parting
skills.description: When using "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate," summons "Long-Shattered Vessel." When "Long-Shattered Vessel" is defeated, this unit loses HP. When this unit uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again, "Long-Shattered Vessel" summoned by this attack will also attack, then become absorbed by this unit.

skills.name: Lost Sacrifice
skills.description: When using "Dying Sobs" or "Silent Sorrow," summons "Long-Shattered Vessel". When "Flame Reaver of Doomsday Led Astray" is in the <u>"Shackle Shatter"</u> state and "Long-Shattered Vessel" receives a killing blow, instantly resummons "Long-Shattered Vessel" and reduces the Toughness of "Flame Reaver of Doomsday Led Astray."

skills.name: Shackle Shatter
skills.description: Enters the <u>"Shackle Shatter"</u> state, summons 4 "Long-Shattered Vessels", and puts these "Long-Shattered Vessels" in the "Shackled" state.

skills.name: Calamity's Resurrection
skills.description: After losing the first layer of Toughness, dispels all Control debuffs, enters <u>"Shackle Shatter"</u> state, and immediately takes action. Before entering <u>"Shackle Shatter,"</u> Toughness will not become lower than 1 stack.

4034015.name: Dawn-Denied Khaslana
4034015.description:
A nameless swordsman, borne by the black tide to hunt Coreflames, wears a mask carved with the stoic visage of a deliverer... Yet his form crumbles like dying kindling.
 From the flames echoes hollowness: All is futility.

skills.description: When using "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate," consumes HP to summon "Long-Shattered Vessel" and convert the consumed HP into <u>"Entangled By Agony."</u> If the "Long-Shattered Vessel" summoned by this attack is defeated, additionally deals Physical DMG to this unit. When this unit uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again, the "Long-Shattered Vessel" that was summoned by the attacking ability will attack together with this unit. This unit will then absorb the Vessel, restoring the HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony"</u> and granting <u>"Calamity Power"</u> to this unit.

skills.name: Lost Sacrifice
skills.description: When using "Silent Sorrow," consumes HP to summon a "Long-Shattered Vessel" and converts the consumed HP into <u>"Entangled By Agony."</u> When stacks of <u>"Calamity Power"</u> are not at 0 and if a "Long-Shattered Vessel" receives a killing blow, immediately consumes 1 stack of <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and a percentage of HP to resummon a "Long-Shattered Vessel." When using "Cry Not for the Discarded," absorbs any "Long-Shattered Vessel" and restores the HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony."</u>

skills.name: Resolute Farewell
skills.description: Receives a certain number of stacks of "DMG reduction," reducing DMG received by this unit. 1 stack is lost after defeating 1 "Long-Shattered Vessel."

4034018.description:
A nameless swordsman, borne by the black tide to hunt Coreflames, wears a mask carved with the stoic visage of a deliverer... Yet his form crumbles like dying kindling.
 From the flames echoes hollowness: All is futility.

skills.name: Demise's Storm
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Fading Fate
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets. Converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Roads Mingled
skills.description: Causes "Long-Shattered Vessel" to enter the "Mutual Sacrifice" state.

skills.name: Underworld's Grief
skills.description: Unleashes "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" alongside "Long-Shattered Vessel," then absorbs "Long-Shattered Vessel."

skills.name: Dying Sobs
skills.description: Obtains <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and enters the "Dying Sobs" state. Uses "But Suffering is Essential" in the next action.

skills.name: Silent Sorrow
skills.description: Obtains <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and enters the "Silent Sorrow" state. Uses "Cry Not for the Discarded" in the next action.

skills.name: But Suffering is Essential
skills.description: Consumes all <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and deals several instances of minor Physical DMG hits to all targets. The more <u>"Calamity Power"</u> stacks are consumed, the more instances of DMG. Then, deals minor Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Cry Not for the Discarded
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets and consumes all <u>"Calamity Power"</u> to additionally deal several instances of minor Physical DMG. The more <u>"Calamity Power"</u> stacks are consumed, the more instances of DMG.

skills.name: Pain of Parting
skills.description: When using "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate," summons "Long-Shattered Vessel." When "Long-Shattered Vessel" is defeated, this unit loses HP. When this unit uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again, "Long-Shattered Vessel" summoned by this attack will also attack, then become absorbed by this unit.

skills.name: Lost Sacrifice
skills.description: When using "Silent Sorrow," summons "Long-Shattered Vessel". When "???" is in the <u>"Shackle Shatter"</u> state and "Long-Shattered Vessel" receives a killing blow, instantly resummons "Long-Shattered Vessel" and reduces the Toughness of "???."

skills.name: Shackle Shatter
skills.description: Enters the <u>"Shackle Shatter"</u> state, summons 4 "Long-Shattered Vessels", and puts these "Long-Shattered Vessels" in the "Shackled" state.

skills.name: Calamity's Resurrection
skills.description: After losing the first layer of Toughness, dispels all Control debuffs, enters <u>"Shackle Shatter"</u> state, and immediately takes action.

4034019.name: Flame Reaver of the Deepest Dark (Corrupted)
4034019.description:
A nameless swordmaster who came with the black tide and is hunting down the Titans' Coreflame. None knows their true identity.
Their power is incredible, and their swordplay is nigh impeccable. Within their swords, madness and obsession entwine, once leading to the fall of the Grove of Epiphany and Aedes Elysiae.

skills.name: Demise's Storm
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Fading Fate
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets. Converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Roads Mingled
skills.description: Causes "Long-Shattered Vessel" to enter the "Mutual Sacrifice" state. Uses "Underworld's Grief" in a certain number of turns.

skills.name: Underworld's Grief
skills.description: Uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" together with "Long-Shattered Vessel." Then, absorbs "Long-Shattered Vessel" to heal this unit while obtaining <u>"Calamity Power."</u>

skills.name: Silent Sorrow
skills.description: Obtains <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and enters the "Silent Sorrow" state. Uses "Cry Not for the Discarded" in the next action.

skills.name: But Suffering is Essential
skills.description: Consumes all <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and deals several instances of minor Physical DMG to all targets. The more "Calamity Power" stacks are consumed, the more instances of DMG. Then, deals minor Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Cry Not for the Discarded
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets and consumes all <u>"Calamity Power"</u> to additionally deal several instances of minor Physical DMG. The more "Calamity Power" stacks are consumed, the more instances of DMG.

When this unit uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again, the "Long-Shattered Vessel" that was summoned by the attacking ability will attack together with this unit. This unit will then absorb the Vessel, restoring the HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony"</u> and granting <u>"Calamity Power"</u> to this unit.

skills.name: Lost Sacrifice
skills.description: When using "Silent Sorrow," consumes HP to summon a "Long-Shattered Vessel" and converts the consumed HP into <u>"Entangled By Agony."</u> When stacks of <u>"Calamity Power"</u> are not at 0 and if a "Long-Shattered Vessel" receives a killing blow, immediately consumes 1 stack of <u>"Calamity Power"</u> and a percentage of HP to resummon a "Long-Shattered Vessel." When using "Cry Not for the Discarded," absorbs any "Long-Shattered Vessel" and restores the HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony."</u>

skills.name: Resolute Farewell
skills.description: Receives a certain number of stacks of "DMG reduction," reducing DMG received by this unit. 1 stack is lost after defeating 1 "Long-Shattered Vessel."

skills.name: The Flames Extinguished
skills.description: Black Mud will appear in battle to enhance the Boss. After enhancement, "Flame Reaver of the Deepest Dark (Corrupted)" will immediately use "But Suffering is Essential" or "Silent Sorrow."

4043010.name: Herta #ErrorModel
4043010.description: A Herta puppet corrupted by a Memory Zone Meme. As it is a perfect model, it still looks exquisite and practical despite the errors consuming its parameters.

skills.name: Converted Duplication
skills.description: Transforms into up to 5 other friendly units.

4044010.name: First Genius, Entelechy, Zandar
4044010.description: The Theoros who had silently observed hundreds of millions of cycles in the name of Lycurgus, and inherited the will of Genius Society member 1, Zandar One Kuwabara. With the authority of the very first Genius, he wields power beyond that of legends and gods, in an attempt to lead a long-running experiment toward the fate of Destruction.

skills.name: Celestial Displacement Theory
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Potential Realization Conjecture
skills.description: Grants <u>"Potential Realization"</u> effect to one designated enemy unit and causes them to immediately take action.

skills.name: Antinomy of Erudition
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one designated target, advances their action and dispels control states on them. Additionally, applies the "<u>Antinomy</u>" effect on them.

skills.name: Imaginary Geometric Inference Method
skills.description: Deals successive minor Quantum DMG to random single targets.

skills.name: SET Proof_Method=Black_Tide
skills.description: Switches to "Disputation Mode."

skills.name: DEL Invasion_Variable
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: DEFRAG Life_Optimization
skills.description: While this unit is in "Disputation Mode," permanently grants all friendly units (except this unit) the <u>"Stormride"</u> and <u>"Retribution of 'Law'"</u> effects.

skills.name: Origination && Destruction
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to 2 targets, advances their actions, and dispels control states on them. Additionally, applies the <u>"Antinomy"</u> effect on them.

skills.name: FORMAT Malfunction_Zone
skills.description: Deals successive minor Quantum DMG to random single targets.

skills.name: Query: Prime Mover's Outcome
skills.description: Deals massive Quantum DMG to all targets that is <u>distributed evenly</u>. DMG increases based on the number of enhancements, and has a high chance to inflict Entanglement on targets equal to the number of enhancements. Simultaneously, switches to "Evolution Mode."

skills.name: Mythos Axiom
skills.description: Currently in "Evolution Mode." Generates "Mythical Life Evolution System" in the Action Order. Each time "Mythical Life Evolution System" takes action, generates "Titankin" on the field. After a certain number of friendly units have been generated on the field or target memosprites have been summoned, Zandar will use "SET Proof_Method=Black_Tide."

skills.name: Logos ALG
skills.description: Currently in the "Disputation Mode." "Black Tide Creatures" will continuously appear on the field. "CALL _DESTRUCTION_THEOREM" will also be generated in the Action Order. Each time "CALL _DESTRUCTION_THEOREM" takes action, it enhances Zandar's next "Query: Prime Mover's Outcome." Zandar will use "Query: Prime Mover's Outcome" after a certain accumulation of friendly units being eliminated, target characters being knocked down, or memosprite disappearances is reached.

skills.name: Corporeal Formula
skills.description: Each mode switch increases this unit's DMG received.

4044011.name: First Genius, Entelechy, Zandar
4044011.description: The Theoros who had silently observed hundreds of millions of cycles in the name of Lycurgus, and inherited the will of Genius Society member 1, Zandar One Kuwabara. 4052010.name: Servant of Tides
4052010.description:
Daughters of the sea, their souls and flesh corroded by the sins of "Destruction," now dance and chant for the coming Dark Sun as hollow, twisted husks.
The remnant black tide flows from past ages into this world's tides
Loyal and fair waves, bathing in the mud that overflows from your master's cup... your pristine skirts stained with madness
You drift directionless between surges of life and death, finding no solace, no moment's peace.

skills.name: Undine's Fluttering Hem
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to all targets. When in the "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state, inflicts "<u>Black Tide Fever</u>" on the targets attacked, causing some DMG dealt to be taken in the form of DoT over a certain number of turns.

skills.name: River of Souls' Intolerable Solitude
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Ice DMG to all friendly units.

skills.name: Respite By The Waters
skills.description: Advances action after taking a certain number of attacks from Basic ATK, Skill, Ultimate, or Memosprite Skill. When in the "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state, decreases the number of attacks required to advance action.

4052012.name: Servant of Tides
4052012.description:
Daughters of the sea, their souls and flesh corroded by the sins of "Destruction," now dance and chant for the coming Dark Sun as hollow, twisted husks.
The remnant black tide flows from past ages into this world's tides
Loyal and fair waves, bathing in the mud that overflows from your master's cup... your pristine skirts stained with madness
You drift directionless between surges of life and death, finding no solace, no moment's peace.

4053010.name: Lady of Crashing Waves
4053010.description:
Daughters of the sea, their souls and flesh corroded by the sins of "Destruction," now dance and chant for the coming Dark Sun as hollow, twisted husks.
The remnant black tide flows from past ages into this world's tides
Enchanting waves, you drank calamity for your sovereign, and your visage is adorned with wine-stained petals and shattered pearls
You lie drunken in the frenzied abattoir, and in this grave of blood and honeyed ruin, you sing your elegy into the void.

skills.name: Intoxicating Corruption
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to one designated target and their adjacent targets.

skills.name: Honeyed Brew Sprinkled Like Stars
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to all targets and has a high chance to decrease the targets' DEF and All-Type RES.

skills.name: Melody of Invitation
skills.description: Summons "Servant of Tides."

skills.name: Heed The Ocean's Gift
skills.description: Enters "Yearning for a Shared Dance" state. Uses "Embrace From the Waves" in every action. If not in "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state, <u>friendly units that can enter the "Revel in Destruction" state</u> will enter the "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state. This causes some DMG taken to be received in the form of DoT over a certain number of turns.\nA "Revel in Destruction" countdown appears in the Action Order. When the countdown turn begins, all friendly units will have their "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state dispelled.

skills.name: Embrace From the Waves
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to all targets. When in the "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state, inflicts "<u>Black Tide Fever</u>" on the targets attacked, causing some DMG dealt to be taken in the form of DoT over a certain number of turns.

skills.name: Respite By The Waters
skills.description: Advances action after taking a certain number of attacks from Basic ATK, Skill, Ultimate, or Memosprite Skill. When in the "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state, decreases the number of attacks required to advance action.

When the countdown turn begins, all friendly units will have their "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state dispelled.

4062010.name: Ichor Memosprite: Pheasant
4062010.description:
A distorted monster formed from the Garden of Recollection's memetic lifeform by the Destruction using golden ichor. It has begun to take the shape of a bird.
It is both raucous and always moves in cohesive groups, showing that even with humanity evaporated, its instinct of following the Destruction manifests in this manner.

skills.name: Hemotort Graze
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Hemotort Resonance
skills.description: Causes this unit and other "Ichor Memosprites: Pheasant" on the field to enter the <u>"Hemotort Resonance"</u> state.

4062020.name: Ichor Memosprite: Canine
4062020.description:
A distorted monster formed from the Garden of Recollection's memetic lifeform by the Destruction using golden ichor. It has begun to take the shape of a dog.
It is aggressive, showing that even with humanity evaporated, its instinct of following the Destruction manifests in this manner.

skills.name: Hemotort Gnaw
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Hemotort Stain
skills.description: At the start of the battle, gains the <u>"Hemotort Stain"</u> state.

skills.name: Hemotort Entrustment
skills.description: Upon taking fatal DMG, grants adjacent friendly units the <u>"Hemotort Stain"</u> state.

4063010.name: Ichor Memosprite: Winged Serpent
4063010.description:
A distorted monster formed from the Garden of Recollection's memetic lifeform by the Destruction using golden ichor. It is in the rudimentary form of a flying snake, enough to intimidate its assailants.
Its twisted rationality went completely mad in the black tide, and its intense self-protecting impulse imperceptibly took on a fantastical flavor.

skills.name: Hemotort Whip
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Hemotort Spew
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Menacing Warning
skills.description: Enters the Charging state and gains "Whirl." If "Whirl" still persist during the next action, uses "Hemotort Vortex."

skills.name: Hemotort Vortex
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets and converts a portion of the targets' reduced HP to "Corrosion." The higher the "Whirl" stacks, the higher the DMG. Then, loses all "Whirl" stacks.

skills.name: Torque Counter
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets and converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to "Corrosion."

skills.name: Corkscrew Charge
skills.description: After being hit by attacks from target units, if the "Whirl" stack is not 0, uses "Torque Counter" and loses 1 stack of "Whirl." During any unit's turn, each target unit can only trigger this effect once. When the "Whirl" stack reaches 0, the Charging state is dispelled.

4064010.name: Ichor Memosprite: Judge of Oblivion
4064010.description:
A trace of lingering madness extracted and refined by Evernight from the countless corpses of ichor memosprites, then synthesized into more twisted and grotesque monsters.
It shall follow the creator's directive, determining what should be remembered and what should be forgotten, devouring redundant memories that serve no purpose and leaving them muted in the flow of time.
"If a new life is to be born, its seed has to be dead."

skills.name: Hemotort Teethgrind
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to one designated target. If the target has Shield, reduce this unit's Toughness instead. This Toughness Reduction effect will not reduce Toughness below 1.

skills.name: Execution in Place
skills.description: Summons "Ichor Memosprite: Pheasant." For every summon eliminated, reduces this unit's Toughness.

skills.name: Hemotort Glower
skills.description: Locks on to one designated character, increases this unit's SPD, and uses "Hemotort Teethgrind" and "Hemotort Saw" on the target within several turns. Take 1 extra action after using this ability.

skills.name: Hemotort Saw
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to one designated target and converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP into "<u>Corrosion</u>." If the target has Shield, reduce this unit's Toughness instead. This Toughness Reduction effect will not reduce Toughness below 1.

skills.name: Hemotort Clamps
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets and converts a portion of the targets' reduced HP to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Name the Culprit
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. In the next action, uses "Hemotort Decapitation." Selects 1 target to receive the highest DMG of "Hemotort Decapitation" and "<u>Hemotort Corruption</u>."

skills.name: Hemotort Decapitation
skills.description: Deals Imaginary Type DMG to target characters not selected with "Name the Culprit." Deals massive Imaginary Type DMG to target characters selected with "Name the Culprit," and applies "<u>Hemotort Corruption</u>" based on the amount of DMG taken (not offset by Shield) to the selected characters.

skills.name: Expedite Verdict
skills.description: Reduces DMG received when not Weakness Broken. When this unit is Weakness Broken, its action will be further delayed, and deals massive Imaginary DMG to this unit. While Weakness Broken, this unit receives increased DMG.

8001010.name: Flamespawn
8001010.description: Crystallized elements with only the simplest intelligence. It drifts in the Fragmentum in the form of a bird emitting intense heat, burning everything in its path.

skills.name: Distract
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target.

8001020.name: Frostspawn
8001020.description: Crystallized elements with only the simplest intelligence. It drifts in the Fragmentum in the form of a bird releasing eerily low temperatures, freezing everything around it.

skills.name: Distract
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

8001030.name: Mask of No Thought
8001030.description: Victims of Fragmentum corrosion pieced together into one bizarre creature, their numb faces forming a sphere without thought or emotion. Any part that was once human has since vanished.

skills.name: Iridescent Beam
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Focused Charge
skills.description: Increases the ATK of all friendly units.

skills.name: Energy Burst
skills.description: All targets' Energy gets regenerated after this unit suffers a killing blow.

8001040.name: Thunderspawn
8001040.description: Crystallized elements with only the simplest intelligence. It drifts in the Fragmentum in the form of a bird brimming with electricity, releasing thunderclaps in all directions.

skills.name: Thunderflash
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

8001050.name: Windspawn
8001050.description: Crystallized elements with only the simplest intelligence. It drifts in the Fragmentum in the form of a bird engulfed in twisting winds, raging on like a tornado.

skills.name: Windpath
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

8002010.name: Imaginary Weaver
8002010.description: Strange beings that do not belong to this world. Passing through countless barriers, they arrive from the other side of the vast, dark, starry sky. Their bodies are like diseased branches breaching into reality, using Imaginary power to twist reality at will.

skills.name: Carolbeam
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Carolburst
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Reverberating Carol
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target, and enters a Defensive Position. In the next turn, use Carolburst and massively increase the DMG dealt.

skills.name: Imaginary Armor
skills.description: Receives reduced DMG from non-Weakness Type attacks.

8002040.name: Warp Trotter
8002040.description: An interdimensional creature lost in the stars. Docile in nature. Sweet in taste. Inedible. Spends most of its life feeding and fleeing. Travelers who encounter these creatures see them as good omens.

skills.name: SSSScared
skills.description: The Treasure Trotter got spooked and will flee in 2 turns.

skills.name: Run... Run!
skills.description: The Treasure Trotter is panicking and will flee in 1 turn.

skills.name: Phew... Escaped
skills.description: The Trotter flees in an instant.
