8003010.name: Ice Out of Space
8003010.description:
A strange being that does not belong to this world. Nurtured in the Fragmentum brought by the Stellaron, it feeds upon this world's root structures to obtain energy. Its armor reflects the gloomy and profound starry sky.
In combat, the Ice Out of Space will freeze targets it touches.

skills.name: Chilling Lament
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target. Deals extra Ice DMG to the target if the target is currently Frozen and this unit is in the Freezing Point state.

skills.name: Frosty Absorption
skills.description: Enters the Freezing Point state. Everwinter Rain can be used in subsequent attacks.

skills.name: Everwinter Rain
skills.description: This ability is only available while in the Freezing Point state. Deals minor Ice DMG to all targets, with a chance to Freeze the targets.

skills.name: Chilling Lament
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. There is a chance to Freeze the target if the user is in the Freezing Point state.

8003011.name: Ice Out of Space (Bug)
8003011.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an alien life form that was born out of the Fragmentum brought by a Stellaron and feeds on this world's energy. Its armor reflects the gloomy and profound starry sky.
In combat, the Ice Out of Space (Bug) will freeze targets it touches and delay their actions.

skills.name: Chilling Lament
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target. Deals extra Ice DMG to the target if the target is currently Frozen and this unit is in the Freezing Point state.

skills.name: Frosty Absorption
skills.description: Enters the Freezing Point state. Everwinter Rain can be used in subsequent attacks.

skills.name: Everwinter Rain
skills.description: The ability will only be used when in the Freezing Point state. Casting the ability to deal Ice DMG to all targets, with a chance to Freeze the targets and delay their actions.

skills.name: Chilling Lament
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. There is a chance to Freeze the target if the user is in the Freezing Point state.

skills.name: Freeze Burst
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to Frozen targets. This also removes their Frozen state and deals Ice DMG to their adjacent units.

8003012.name: Ice Out of Space
8003012.description:
A strange being that does not belong to this world. Nurtured in the Fragmentum brought by the Stellaron, it feeds upon this world's root structures to obtain energy. Its armor reflects the gloomy and profound starry sky.
In combat, the Ice Out of Space will freeze targets it touches.

skills.name: Chilling Lament
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target. Deals extra Ice DMG to the target if the target is currently Frozen and this unit is in the Freezing Point state.

skills.name: Crystalline Condensation
skills.description: Enters the Freezing Point state. Everwinter Rain can be used in subsequent attacks and grants the character 1 stack of Crystallite.

skills.name: Everwinter Rain
skills.description: The ability will only be used when in the Freezing Point state. Casting the ability to deal Ice DMG to all targets, with a chance to Freeze the targets and delay their actions.

skills.name: Chilling Lament
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. There is a chance to Freeze the target if the user is in the Freezing Point state.

skills.name: Freeze Burst
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to Frozen targets. This also removes their Frozen state and deals Ice DMG to their adjacent units.

8003020.name: Blaze Out of Space
8003020.description:
A strange being that does not belong to this world. Nurtured in the Fragmentum created by the Stellaron, it parasitize upon this world's root structures to obtain energy. Its armor burns with the blazing flames in the core of stars.
In combat, the Blaze Out of Space will incinerate anything it touches.

skills.name: Bellowing Inferno
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Blazing Absorption
skills.description: Enters the Spontaneous Combustion state. Rain of Purifying Flames can be used in subsequent attacks.

skills.name: Rain of Purifying Flames
skills.description: Deals successive minor Fire DMG to a random single target, with a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Molten Fusion
skills.description: Gains ATK. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.

8003021.name: Blaze Out of Space (Bug)
8003021.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an alien life form that was born out of the Fragmentum brought by a Stellaron and feeds on this world's energy. Its armor carries the flames taken from the core of a star.
In combat, the Blaze Out of Space (Bug) will incinerate anything it touches.

skills.name: Bellowing Inferno
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Blazing Absorption
skills.description: Enters the Spontaneous Combustion state. Rain of Purifying Flames can be used in subsequent attacks.

skills.name: Rain of Purifying Flames
skills.description: Deals successive minor Fire DMG to a random single target, with a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Molten Fusion
skills.description: Increases this unit's ATK.

skills.name: Bomb Warning
skills.description: Starts charging, and absorbs all the Enkindle statuses that are inflicted on all targets.

skills.name: Bomb en Masse
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to all targets and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle to all targets. The more Enkindle absorbed, the more DMG this attack will deal.

8003022.name: Blaze Out of Space
8003022.description:
Born of the Fragmentum and created by the Stellaron, this alien life form feeds on this world's energy. The blazing fires from the core of a star burn on its armor.
In combat, the Blaze Out of Space will incinerate anything it touches.

skills.name: Bellowing Inferno
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Inferno Detonation
skills.description: Enters the Spontaneous Combustion state. Rain of Purifying Flames can be used in subsequent attacks and increases character's ATK.

skills.name: Rain of Purifying Flames
skills.description: Deals successive minor Fire DMG to a random single target, with a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Molten Fusion
skills.description: Increases this unit's ATK.

skills.name: Bomb Warning
skills.description: Starts charging, and absorbs all the Enkindle statuses that are inflicted on all targets.

skills.name: Bomb en Masse
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to all targets and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle to all targets. The more Enkindle absorbed, the more DMG this attack will deal.

8003030.name: Guardian Shadow
8003030.description:
A shadow manifested by the power of a Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.
A living being of energy born from the projection of the desires of sentient lifeforms into the Fragmentum, akin to a pearl created from a single grain of sand. This energy wanders around aimlessly, acting only when executing the will of its master.

skills.name: Lightning Recollection
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Lightning Condemnation
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Tranquil Ban
skills.description: Your team is imposed with a ban on attacking the Guardian Shadow. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.

skills.name: Disarm Ban
skills.description: Your team is imposed with a ban on using Basic ATK. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.

skills.name: Silent Ban
skills.description: Your team is imposed with a ban on using Skill. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.

skills.name: Thunderstorm Condemnation
skills.description: Deals successive minor Lightning DMG to a random target, with a chance to inflict Shock.

skills.name: Inevitable Punishment
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to whoever violates the ban.

8003031.name: Guardian Shadow (Bug)
8003031.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a shadow manifested by the power of Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.
A physical manifestation of the desires of intelligent life in the Fragmentum, like a pearl created from a single grain of sand. This force wanders around aimlessly, acting only when executing the will of its master.

8003040.name: Decaying Shadow
8003040.description:
A shadow manifested by the power of a Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.
A living being of energy born from the projection of the desires of sentient lifeforms into the Fragmentum, akin to a pearl created from a single grain of sand. However, the desire that drove it has long since been twisted and distorted.

skills.name: Fleeting Gilded Spikes
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Fleeting Punishment
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Binding of the Golden Age
skills.description: Enters the Charging state and gains 9 Gauge Recollection stacks. Casts Liberation of the Golden Age in the next action. Every time this unit is attacked, lose 1 stack of Gauge Recollection.

skills.name: Liberation of the Golden Age
skills.description: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to a random target. The number of attacks is equal to the "Gauge Recollection" stacks remaining. If there is no "Gauge Recollection," this ability will fail.

skills.name: Fleeting Veil
skills.description: Slightly reduces the Basic ATK, Skill, Ultimate, and Follow-up ATK DMG received by this unit, with a small chance to inflict Imprisonment on the target attacked by Decaying Shadow.

8003041.name: Decaying Shadow (Bug)

A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a shadow manifested by the power of Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.

skills.description: Enters the Charging state and gains 9 Gauge Recollection stacks. Casts Liberation of the Golden Age in the next action. Every time this unit is attacked, lose 1 stack of Gauge Recollection.

skills.description: Deals successive Imaginary DMG to a random target. If there are no Gauge Recollection stacks, this ability will fail.

skills.name: Fleeting Veil
skills.description: Slightly reduces the Basic ATK, Skill, Ultimate, and Follow-up ATK DMG received by this unit, with a chance to inflict Imprisonment on the target attacked by Decaying Shadow.

skills.name: Liberation of the Golden Age
skills.description: Deals successive Imaginary DMG to a random target. The number of attacks is equal to the "Gauge Recollection" stacks remaining. If there is no "Gauge Recollection," this ability will fail.

8003042.name: Decaying Shadow
8003042.description:
A shadow manifested by the power of Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.
A physical embodiment of the desires of intelligent life in the Fragmentum, like a pearl created from a single grain of sand. However, its purpose has long been twisted and distorted.

skills.name: Fleeting Gilded Spikes
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Fleeting Punishment
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Binding of the Golden Age
skills.description: Enters the Charging state and gains 9 Gauge Recollection stacks. Casts Liberation of the Golden Age in the next action. Every time this unit is attacked, lose 1 stack of Gauge Recollection.

skills.name: Liberation of the Golden Age
skills.description: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to a random target. The number of attacks is equal to the Gauge Recollection stacks remaining. If there is no Gauge Recollection, this ability will fail.

skills.name: Fleeting Veil
skills.description: Slightly reduces the Basic ATK, Skill, Ultimate, and Follow-up ATK DMG received by this unit, with a small chance to inflict Imprisonment on the target attacked by Decaying Shadow.

8003050.name: Stormbringer
8003050.description:
Monsters that have experienced corrosion as the Fragmentum expanded. They now have a more nimble way of fighting after the source of their power mutated.
Stormbringers utilize the power of the wind to aid them in battle, enabling them to fire arrows more rapidly.

skills.name: Watchful Meteor
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

skills.name: Wind Walker
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to the target and units adjacent to the target, with a chance to inflict Wind Shear.

skills.name: Wind-Twisting Crossbow
skills.description: Enters the Charging state and locks on to all targets currently suffering Wind Shear. Cast Windfall Storm in the next action.

skills.name: Windfall Storm
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to targets afflicted with Wind Shear. This ability fails if no one on the target team suffers Wind Shear.

skills.name: Storm Cyclone
skills.description: Slightly increases ATK after attacking a target afflicted with Wind Shear. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.

skills.name: Windfall Storm
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to targets afflicted with Wind Shear. This ability fails if no one on the target team suffers Wind Shear.

8003051.name: Stormbringer (Bug)
8003051.description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a monster that underwent corrosion in the expanse of the Fragmentum. It has developed a more agile fighting style ever since its original form became distorted.
The Stormbringer utilizes the power of the wind to its advantage in battle, enabling it to fire arrows more rapidly. It can also summon Windspawn to aid in combat.

8011010.name: Baryon
8011010.description:
In order to prevent antiparticles from dissipating and annihilating normal matter, the Antimatter Legion created two types of miniature ion traps for transportation, collectively referred to as Baryons and Antibaryons.
Baryons have basic intelligence, and can clear the path according to the commands and summons of Voidrangers on the battlefield.

skills.name: Obliterate
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single target.

8011020.name: Antibaryon
8011020.description:
In order to prevent antiparticles from dissipating and annihilating normal matter, the Antimatter Legion created two types of miniature ion traps for transportation, collectively referred to as Baryons and Antibaryons.
Antibaryons have basic intelligence, and can clear the path according to the commands and summons of Voidrangers on the battlefield.

skills.name: Obliterate
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

8012010.name: Voidranger: Reaver
8012010.description:
Warriors yet to perish were recast in the Warforge and gained Destruction's power. Antimatter completes their bodies and negative particles reverberate throughout their forms.
Violently aggressive, they embody the will of Destruction and are basic combat units of the Antimatter Legion, acting only according to their destructive instincts.

skills.name: Hunting Blade
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Vortex Leap
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.
Increases SPD after attacking.

8012020.name: Voidranger: Distorter
8012020.description:
A Voidranger that has successfully survived particle annihilation, the positive and negative particles in its body have temporarily achieved a strange balance, granting them more power than ordinary reavers.
Basic combat units of the Antimatter Legion. They possess some intelligence and are able to control reavers within a small surrounding area.

skills.name: Nihility's Command
skills.description: Locks Onto a random unit on your team, making them the target for incoming attacks from all of their enemies.

skills.name: Shadowless Void Strike
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target.

8012021.name: Voidranger: Distorter
8012021.description:
A Voidranger that has successfully survived particle annihilation, the positive and negative particles in its body have temporarily achieved a strange balance, granting them more power than ordinary reavers.
Basic combat units of the Antimatter Legion. They possess some intelligence and are able to control reavers within a small surrounding area.

8012030.name: Voidranger: Eliminator
8012030.description:
Bodies that continued to be corroded by the Fragmentum after death. While their vital signs have changed, they continue to carry out their orders to eliminate.
Voidranger: Eliminators will mark enemies they hit, causing them to take extra damage when attacked.

skills.name: Void Cannon
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a chance to afflict Detonated. This unit becomes Overloaded.

skills.name: Thermal Barrier
skills.description: Dispels this unit's Overloaded state.

8012140.name: Disaster's Right Hand
8012140.description:
Only the echoes of pain remain on the devastated earth  the march of the end times.
Disaster's Right Hand is adept at drawing upon Imaginary power to create large-scale attacks.

skills.name: Calamity Tear
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Tough Cuts

skills.name: The Breakdown of Tyranny

8012142.name: Dawn's Left Hand
8012142.description:
At the last dawn before the end, even the bright and clear morning sun will tremble and cower away.

skills.name: Total Annihilation
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG and Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Cataclysm Precursor
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. The next action uses "Impending Doom" on all targets.

skills.name: Impending Doom
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG and Imaginary DMG to all targets. After attacking, randomly inflicts Quantum Infusion or Imaginary Infusion on all targets.

skills.name: Doomsday Curse
skills.description: Randomly inflicts Quantum Infusion or Imaginary Infusion on all targets.

skills.name: Mass Infection
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG and Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Ruinous Collision
skills.description: When this unit uses their ability and causes a target to be in Quantum Infusion and Imaginary Infusion at the same time, dispels both Quantum Infusion and Imaginary Infusion on the target, and deals minor Quantum DMG and Imaginary DMG with a high chance of inflicting <u>Snarelock</u> to the target.

skills.name: Feigned Death
skills.description: After suffering a killing blow, enters Feigned Death.

8015010.name: Doomsday Beast
8015010.description: Using fragments of the Dusk Leviathan as the foundation, and the weeping bones of thousands of the dead in the Warforge as the agent, the Antimatter Legion cast the Doomsday Beast. The resentful spirits' senseless obsession turns into a tangible hand, and the shadow of the old disaster conceals the heavens. The Doomsday Beast detains the will of all beings that are not at ease and have yet to die. Anger, mourning, or delusional joy  all is revealed, and all evil eagerly throb. The Doomsday Beast's core is a dark matter engine.

skills.name: Leviathan's Vestige Valor
skills.description: The Doomsday Beast cannot be attacked until the Antimatter Engine, Disaster's Right Hand, and Dawn's Left Hand have all been destroyed.

8015011.name: Doomsday Beast
8015011.description: Using fragments of the Dusk Leviathan as the foundation, and the weeping bones of thousands of the dead in the Warforge as the agent, the Antimatter Legion cast the Doomsday Beast. The resentful spirits' senseless obsession turns into a tangible hand, and the shadow of the old disaster conceals the heavens. The Doomsday Beast detains the will of all beings that are not at ease and have yet to die. Anger, mourning, or delusional joy  all is revealed, and all evil eagerly throb. The Doomsday Beast's core is a dark matter engine.

skills.name: Leviathan's Vestige Valor
skills.description: The Doomsday Beast cannot be attacked until the Antimatter Engine, Disaster's Right Hand, and Dawn's Left Hand have all been destroyed.

8015012.name: Starbane Doombringer
8015012.description: Using fragments of the Dusk Leviathan as the foundation, and the weeping bones of thousands of the dead in the Warforge as the agent, the Antimatter Legion cast the Doomsday Beast. The resentful spirits' senseless obsession turns into a tangible hand, and the shadow of the old disaster conceals the heavens. The Doomsday Beast detains the will of all beings that are not at ease and have yet to die. Anger, mourning, or delusional joy  all is revealed, and all evil eagerly throb. The Doomsday Beast's core is a dark matter engine.

skills.name: Leviathan's Vestige Valor
skills.description: Starbane Doombringer cannot be directly attacked until the Antimatter Engine, Disaster's Right Hand, and Dawn's Left Hand have all been destroyed. When dealing DMG to its parts, the Starbane Doombringer will also lose equal amounts of HP.

8015020.name: Phantylia the Undying
8015020.description:
The body born out of the Ambrosial Arbor by Phantylia, Lord Ravager of the Antimatter Legion.
This flesh possesses the powers of both Destruction and Abundance, a form that embodies the cycle of death and rebirth. It is also the first "fruit" borne from the rejuvenated Ambrosial Arbor.

skills.name: Acchata: Forming Winds
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Cleansing Sweep
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Weaving Roots
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action.

skills.name: Burgeoning Bloom
skills.description: Summons Abundance Lotus.

skills.name: Acchata: Roaring Thunder
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Starfall, Mooncry
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Kalpa Descend
skills.description: Locks on a target and causes Destruction Lotus to Bloom. At the same time, dispels Destruction Lotus' Weakness Protected effect. Destruction Lotus's will use Havoc during its next action.

skills.name: Furor
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target and any adjacent targets.

skills.name: Arbor Apotheosis
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Weaving Roots
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target and delays their action.

skills.name: Burgeoning Bloom
skills.description: Summons Abundance Lotus.

skills.name: Kalpa Descend
skills.description: Locks on a target and causes Destruction Lotus to Bloom. At the same time, dispels Destruction Lotus' Weakness Protected effect. Destruction Lotus's will use Havoc during its next action.

8015022.name: Opportunistic Provocateur
8015022.description: This flesh possesses the powers of both Destruction and Abundance, a form that embodies the cycle of death and rebirth. It is also the first "fruit" borne from the rejuvenated Ambrosial Arbor.

skills.name: Acchata: Forming Winds
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Cleansing Sweep
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Entwining Roots: Abundance's Might
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action. At the same time, allows all Abundance Lotus on the field that can take action to launch an attack.

skills.name: Entwining Roots: Havoc's Might
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and delays their action. At the same time, allows all Destruction Lotus on the field that can take action to launch an attack.

skills.name: Acchata: Roaring Thunder
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Starfall, Mooncry: Abundance's Might
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all targets and shifts to Abundance Form.

skills.name: Starfall, Mooncry: Destruction's Might
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to all targets and shifts to Destruction Form.

skills.name: Twin Bond
skills.description: Summons Abundance Lotus and Destruction Lotus.

skills.name: Furor
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target and any adjacent targets.

skills.name: Arbor Apotheosis
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Twin Bond
skills.description: Summons Abundance Lotus and Destruction Lotus.

skills.name: Entwining Roots: Paramount Writhe
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets and delays their actions, while also causing all Lotuses on the field that can take action to launch an attack.

skills.name: Null
skills.description: Locks onto all targets. All lotuses' will use Eternal Condemnation in the next action.

skills.name: Eternal Condemnation
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to the locked-on target. The more locked-on targets there are, the higher the DMG.

8022010.name: Juvenile Sting
8022010.description: The youngling of a True Sting. Based on their growth stage, young True Stings can be further divided into Juvenile Stings and Lesser Stings.

skills.name: Wingflap
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

skills.name: Meiotic Division
skills.description: Produces 1 spawn of itself. This effect can be triggered again after 2 turns.

skills.name: Entomon Eulogy
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Wind DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to slightly increase their DMG received.

8022011.name: Juvenile Sting
8022011.description: The youngling of a True Sting. Based on their growth stage, young True Stings can be further divided into Juvenile Stings and Lesser Stings.

skills.name: Wingflap
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to one designated ally target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

skills.name: Meiotic Division
skills.description: Produces 1 spawn of itself. This effect can be triggered again after 2 turns.

skills.name: Entomon Eulogy
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Wind DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to slightly increase their DMG received.

8022020.name: Lesser Sting
8022020.description: The youngling of a True Sting. Based on their growth stage, young True Stings can be further divided into Juvenile Stings and Lesser Stings.

skills.name: Prepare to Fight
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses Bursting Detonation for the next action.

skills.name: Bursting Detonation
skills.description: Detonates self and deals Wind DMG to a target and its adjacent targets, with a high chance to cause Outrage to the target.

skills.name: Entomon Eulogy
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Wind DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to slightly increase their DMG received.

8022021.name: Lesser Sting
8022021.description: The youngling of a True Sting. Based on their growth stage, young True Stings can be further divided into Juvenile Stings and Lesser Stings.

skills.name: Prepare to Fight
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Bursting Detonation" for the next action.

skills.name: Bursting Detonation
skills.description: Detonates self and deals Wind DMG to a target and its adjacent targets, with a high chance to apply "Outrage" to the target.

skills.name: Entomon Eulogy
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Wind DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to slightly increase their DMG received.

skills.name: Nourishment
skills.description: Recover targets' Skill Points when receiving a killing blow.

skills.name: Hyper Growth
skills.description: Every stack of "Growth Hormones" increases ATK by a certain amount, stacking up to 3 times. Immediately take action when 3 stacks are reached.

8022030.name: Gnaw Sting
8022030.description: A subspecies of Stings that underwent mutations during reproduction, adept at using quantum toxins in their mandibles to corrode away the bodies of their prey.

skills.name: Horn Clash
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target, prioritizing Entangled targets, and applies one extra stack of Entanglement.

skills.name: Decay Eulogy
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Quantum DMG to all friendly units and increases their DMG received.

8022031.name: Gnaw Sting
8022031.description: A subspecies of Stings that underwent mutations during reproduction, adept at using quantum toxins in their mandibles to corrode away the bodies of their prey.

skills.name: Horn Clash
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target, prioritizing Entangled targets, and applies one extra stack of Entanglement.

skills.name: Decay Eulogy
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Quantum DMG to all friendly units and increases their DMG taken.

skills.name: Sustenance
skills.description: Restores a minor amount of HP to all targets when this unit receives a killing blow.

skills.name: Distract
skills.description: Every stack of "Growth Hormones" increases ATK by a certain amount, stacking up to 3 times. When 3 stacks are reached and if the target attacked by "Horn Clash" is not in the Entanglement state, there is a high chance of afflicting them with Entanglement.

8024010.name: Swarm: True Sting (Complete)
8024010.description: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a mature True Sting. Sir Duroy, a member of the Intelligentsia Guild, explored the starry seas and authored the thirty-volume of the *Chronicles of Interdimensional Insects*. The book provides detailed records of over a dozen confirmed species of lepisma and countless subspecies spanning across the stars.

skills.name: Time to Battle
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 2 stacks of Wind Shear.

skills.name: War Gear
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target. If the target is currently suffering from Wind Shear, Wind Shear immediately causes DMG 1 time.

skills.name: Cyclonic Swarm
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all targets, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Propagation
skills.description: Spawns True Stings.

skills.name: Ready Order
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses Swarm Onslaught for the next action.

skills.name: Swarm Onslaught
skills.description: Dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Break affecting True Stings. Deals Wind DMG to the target, and causes the target to have a high chance of being inflicted with 1 stack of Wind Shear every time they take DMG.

skills.name: Swarm Onslaught
skills.description: Dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Break affecting True Stings. Deals Wind DMG to the target, and causes the target to have a high chance of being inflicted with 1 stack of Wind Shear every time they take DMG.

skills.name: Transmission Pheromone
skills.description: Each time a True Sting is spawned, increases all True Stings' DMG dealt by 1 stack. Only 1 Transmission Pheromone effect can exist in battle at once.

skills.name: Entomon Eulogy
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Wind DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to slightly increase their DMG received.

skills.name: Propagation
skills.description: Spawns True Stings.

8025010.name: Starcrusher Swarm King: Skaracabaz (Synthetic)
8025010.description: The replica of the Emanator of Propagation cultivated by Ruan Mei, briefly manifesting in the world in an incomplete form. Its original form is a giant lepisma that inherited the mandibles of the Imperator Insectorum. It can collect in its mouthparts the death ray that fragmented celestial bodies, and make shattered stars incubators for procreating offspring. It was once one of the nightmares across multiple worlds during the Swarm Disaster.

skills.name: Swarm King Cannon
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target

skills.name: Radiating Venom
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Entanglement. Also summons 1 Gnaw Sting.

skills.name: Pyrolysis Death Beam
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Carapace of Begotten Spawn
skills.description: Enters the Multiply state until the next action. During this time, DMG taken is greatly reduced, and each attack taken summons a Gnaw Sting. If this unit is Weakness Broken while in the Multiply state, it will reduce all friendly units' Toughness by an amount equal to this unit's Max Toughness and increase the DMG taken by all other friendly units besides the target themselves.

skills.name: Ovum of Collapsed Star
skills.description: Deals massive Quantum DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Carapace of Nurtured Disaster
skills.description: Starts Charging and enters the Multiply state until the next action, whereupon Ovum of Collapsed Star will be used on all targets. During the Multiply state, DMG received is greatly reduced, and each attack taken will cause a Gnaw Sting and/or Lesser Sting to be summoned. If this unit is Weakness Broken while in the Multiply state, it will reduce all friendly units' Toughness by an amount equal to this unit's Max Toughness and increase the DMG taken by all other friendly units besides the target themselves.

8025011.name: Sky-Shrouding Stardevourer Swarm
8025011.description: The replica of the Emanator of Propagation cultivated by Ruan Mei, briefly manifesting in the world in an incomplete form. Its original form is a giant lepisma that inherited the mandibles of the Imperator Insectorum. It can collect in its mouthparts the death ray that fragmented celestial bodies, and make shattered stars incubators for procreating offspring. It was once one of the nightmares across multiple worlds during the Swarm Disaster.

skills.name: Swarm King Cannon
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target

skills.name: Radiating Venom
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target, with a high chance of inflicting Entanglement. Also summons 1 "Gnaw Sting."

skills.name: Pyrolysis Death Beam
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Cannibalism
skills.description: Consumes "Insect Egg" to enhance Swarm summons.

skills.name: Ovum of Collapsed Star
skills.description: Deals massive Quantum DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Nesting Incubation
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Gains Toughness Protection and a certain number of "Insect Eggs," lasting until the next action. During the next action, uses "Ovum of Collapsed Star" on all targets.

skills.name: Devoured by the Swarm
skills.description: Summons Swarm summons after being attacked. When this unit's Weakness is Broken, deals Quantum DMG to all friendly units, and all friendly units (except this unit) take more DMG and become Weakness Broken.

skills.name: Infinite Propagation
skills.description: Gain a set amount of "Insect Egg" at the end of every turn. Lose 1 "Insect Egg" when attacked by "Entomon Eulogy" or "Decay Eulogy."

8032010.name: Grunt: Field Personnel
8032010.description: An Interastral Peace Corporation grunt worker whose job mainly deals with shady "business oversights." With a meager salary, the only lodging they can afford is a shared room on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

skills.name: Clock In
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Performance Boost
skills.description: Receives 1 Performance Point after unleashing an attack. Performance Points can be seized by the attacker when this unit's Weakness is Broken or this unit receives a killing blow.

8032020.name: Grunt: Security Personnel
8032020.description: An Interastral Peace Corporation grunt worker whose job mainly involves maintaining order in locations ruled by the IPC. With a meager salary, the only lodging they can afford is a shared room on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

skills.name: Appeal
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Performance Boost
skills.description: Receives 1 Performance Point after unleashing an attack. Performance Points can be seized by the attacker when this unit's Weakness is Broken or this unit receives a killing blow.

8032030.name: "All or Nothing"
8032030.description: A game die metamorphosed from the "Aventurine of Stratagems," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

skills.name: Fickle Fortune
skills.description: Immune to DMG. When this unit is attacked by a target that has entered the Gamble, apply 1 random number (between 1 and 6) to the target.

8032031.name: "All or Nothing"
8032031.description: A game die metamorphosed from the "Aventurine of Stratagems," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

skills.name: Fickle Fortune
skills.description: HP cannot be reduced to lower than 1. When this unit is attacked by a target that has entered the Gamble, the target will receive a random number between 1 and 6. When HP is reduced to 1, gains the <u>Influx of Fortuity</u> effect. While under the <u>Influx of Fortuity</u> effect, this unit is guaranteed to receive the number 6 and uses Punishment of Defeat when the Gamble ends.

skills.name: Punishment of Defeat
skills.description: Self-destructs, dealing Imaginary DMG to Aventurine of Stratagems.

skills.name: Forever Concealed
skills.description: When this unit is attacked by a target that has entered the Gamble, the Gamble's odds are doubled.

8032032.name: "All or Nothing"
8032032.description: A game die metamorphosed from the "Aventurine of Stratagems," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

skills.name: Fickle Fortune
skills.description: HP cannot be reduced to lower than 1. When this unit is attacked by a target that has entered the Gamble, the target will receive a random number between 1 and 6. When HP is reduced to 1, gains the <u>Influx of Fortuity</u> effect. While under the <u>Influx of Fortuity</u> effect, this unit is guaranteed to receive the number 6 and uses Punishment of Defeat when the Gamble ends.

skills.name: Punishment of Defeat
skills.description: Self-destructs, dealing Imaginary DMG to Aventurine of Stratagems.

8032033.name: "All or Nothing"
8032033.description: A game die metamorphosed from "Daring Diceroller," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

skills.name: Bet
skills.description: After being defeated, this unit's Points will be added to targets. At the same time, reduces Daring Diceroller's Toughness, and causes them to lose a certain amount of HP.

8032034.name: "All or Nothing: Double Fortune"
8032034.description: A game die metamorphosed from "Daring Diceroller," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

skills.name: Temporary Good Fortune
skills.description: When taking action, this unit leaves the battle.

skills.name: Double Bet
skills.description: After being defeated, targets' Points will double. At the same time, reduces Daring Diceroller's Toughness, and causes them to lose a certain amount of HP.

8033010.name: Senior Staff: Team Leader
8033010.description: An Interastral Peace Corporation senior staff member with a minimal rank of project team leader. The mech they drive belongs to the IPC. If damaged, its repair fees have to be paid out-of-pocket. With a half-decent salary, they can at least afford to rent a one-bedroom apartment on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

skills.name: Disciplined
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Cost Reduction
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: In Training...
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses Work Culture Shock in the next action.

skills.name: Work Culture Shock
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: <unbreak>720</unbreak>-Degree Review
skills.description: Seizes all Performance Points from Grunt: Field Personnel and Grunt: Security Personnel.

skills.name: Team Building
skills.description: Summons Grunt: Field Personnel or Grunt: Security Personnel, then cause all Grunts: Field Personnel and Grunts: Security Personnel to acquire 1 Performance Point.

skills.name: Performance Boost
skills.description: Receives 1 Performance Point after unleashing an attack. Performance Points can be seized by the attacker when this unit's Weakness is Broken or this unit receives a killing blow.

8034010.name: Ten Stonehearts: Aventurine of Stratagems
8034010.description: A senior manager in the IPC Strategic Investment Department and one of the Ten Stonehearts. Using his Cornerstone, he obtained a share of the authority of an Emanator of Preservation. He throws his own body into the game as a die, ready to face death in order to walk away alive.

skills.name: Heavy Stakes
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Distributed Investment
skills.description: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random targets.

skills.name: Points Fountain
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets and reduce all targets' Energy.

skills.name: Time For A Bet
skills.description: Summons "All or Nothing" and makes a single target enter the Gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked by a target that is in the Gamble, the target will receive a random number between 1 and 6. After a target that is in the Gamble has finished their turn, targets with numbers lower than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have lost the Gamble and will be attacked, while those with a number higher than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have won the Gamble and will have their Ultimate activated. At the same time, targets that have not entered the Gamble are afflicted with the "Look, Don't Speak" status, which is dispelled when the Gamble ends.

skills.name: Big Spenders' Mad Party
skills.description: Summons "All or Nothing" and makes all targets enter the gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked, the target that launched the attack will receive a random number between 1 and 6. The next time "Aventurine of Stratagems" takes a turn, targets with numbers lower than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have lost the bet and will be attacked, while targets with numbers higher than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have won the bet and will have their Ultimates activated.

skills.name: The Loser's Time Is Over
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a target that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked target.

skills.name: The Winner Takes It All
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked targets.

skills.name: Stratagems' Wagering
skills.description: Every time a target wins the Gamble, they receive the "Favored by Fortune" effect that increases their DMG dealt. Every time a target loses the Gamble, they receive the "Down on Your Luck" effect that increases DMG taken.

8034011.name: Ten Stonehearts: Aventurine of Stratagems (Complete)
8034011.description: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a senior manager in the IPC Strategic Investment Department and one of the Ten Stonehearts. Using his Cornerstone, he obtained a share of the authority of an Emanator of Preservation. He throws his own body into the game as a die, ready to face death in order to walk away alive.

skills.name: Heavy Stakes
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Distributed Investment
skills.description: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random targets.

skills.name: Points Fountain
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets and reduce all targets' Energy.

skills.name: Time For A Bet
skills.description: Summons "All or Nothing" and makes a single target enter the Gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked by a target in the Gamble, the target that launched the attack will receive a random number between 1 and 6. When HP is reduced to 1, gains <u>Influx of Fortuity</u>. Each time the first "All or Nothing" is attacked, doubles the odds of the Gamble. After a target that is in the Gamble has finished their turn, targets with numbers lower than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have lost the Gamble and will be attacked, while those with a number higher than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have won the Gamble and will have their Ultimate activated. At the same time, targets that have not entered the Gamble are afflicted with the "Look, Don't Speak" status, which is dispelled when the Gamble ends.

skills.name: Big Spenders' Mad Party
skills.description: Summons "All or Nothing" and makes all targets enter the gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked, the target that launched the attack will receive a random number between 1 and 6. When HP is reduced to 1, gains <u>Influx of Fortuity</u>. Each time the first "All or Nothing" is attacked, doubles the odds of the Gamble. The next time "Aventurine of Stratagems" takes a turn, targets with numbers lower than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have lost the bet and will be attacked, while targets with numbers higher than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have won the bet and will have their Ultimates activated.

skills.name: The Mad Abyss
skills.description: Summons "All or Nothing," multiplies the numbers received, and makes all targets enter the gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked, the target that launched the attack will receive a random number between 1 and 6. When HP is reduced to 1, gains <u>Influx of Fortuity</u>. Each time the first "All or Nothing" is attacked, doubles the odds of the Gamble. The next time "Aventurine of Stratagems" takes a turn, if the sum of all targets' numbers is lower than that of "Aventurine of Stratagems," they are considered to have lost the bet and will be attacked. If the sum of all targets' numbers is higher than that of "Aventurine of Stratagems," they are considered to have won the bet and will have their Ultimates activated.

skills.name: The Loser's Time Is Over
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a target that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked target.

skills.name: The Winner Takes It All
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked targets.

skills.name: Eyes Once Closed for Lies
skills.description: The initial odds for the gamble is 1, up to a maximum of 4. Every time a target wins the gamble, they receive a number of <u>Fenge's Gift</u> stacks equal to the odds. Every time a target loses the gamble, they receive a number of <u>Fenge's Curse</u> stacks equal to the odds.

skills.name: Eyes Twice Closed for Trickery
skills.description: The initial odds for the gamble is 1, up to a maximum of 8. Every time a target wins the gamble, they receive a number of <u>Fenge's Gift</u> stacks equal to the odds. Every time a target loses the gamble, they receive a number of <u>Fenge's Curse</u> stacks equal to the odds.

skills.name: Eyes Thrice Closed for Schemes
skills.description: The initial odds for the gamble is 1, up to a maximum of <unbreak>16</unbreak>. Every time a target wins the gamble, all targets receive a number of <u>Fenge's Gift</u> stacks equal to the odds. Every time a target loses the gamble, all targets receive a number of <u>Fenge's Curse</u> stacks equal to the odds.

skills.name: Deep in Debt
skills.description: Aventurine of Stratagems' DMG increases every time the gamble is initiated.

8034012.name: Daring Diceroller
8034012.description: A senior manager in the IPC Strategic Investment Department and one of the Ten Stonehearts. Using his Cornerstone, he obtained a share of the authority of an Emanator of Preservation. He throws his own body into the game as a die, ready to face death in order to walk away alive.

skills.name: Heavy Stakes
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Distributed Investment
skills.description: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random targets.

skills.name: Profit Cut
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets and reduce all targets' Energy. In Phase 2 of the battle, additionally reduces targets' Points.

skills.name: Time For A Bet
skills.description: Summons "All or Nothing" and makes a single target enter the Gamble. At the same time, targets that have not entered the Gamble are afflicted with the "Look, Don't Speak" status, which is dispelled when the Gamble ends.

Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked, the target that launched the attack will receive a random number between 1 and 6. The next time "Aventurine of Stratagems" takes a turn, targets with numbers lower than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have lost the bet and will be attacked, while targets with numbers higher than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have won the bet and will have their Ultimates activated.

skills.name: The Loser's Time Is Over
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a target that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked target.

skills.name: The Winner Takes It All
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked targets.

skills.name: Stratagems' Wagering
skills.description: Every time a target wins the Gamble, they receive the "Favored by Fortune" effect that increases their DMG dealt. Every time a target loses the Gamble, they receive the "Down on Your Luck" effect that increases DMG taken.3

skills.name: Betting the Flop
skills.description: Activate two "All or Nothing," locks on to a single target, and uses Daring Wager on the locked-on target in the next turn. Defeat all activated "All or Nothing" monsters to prevent the use of Daring Wager and to activate a single target's Ultimate.

skills.name: Go All In
skills.description: Activates all "All or Nothing" and uses Doomed to Lose in the next action. Defeat all activated "All or Nothing" to prevent the use of Doomed to Lose and to activate all targets' Ultimate.

skills.name: Daring Wager
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single locked-on target and has a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment.

skills.name: Doomed to Lose
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets and has a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment.

skills.name: Points
skills.description: In the battle, all units gain a set number of Points that resets between Phases. When targets' Points are lower than friendly units', DMG received by friendly units is greatly reduced, and gains Toughness Protection. When targets' Points are equal to friendly units or more, DMG received by friendly units is increased.

skills.name: Call
skills.description: At the start of the Phase or when summons are defeated, summons up to <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> "All or Nothing."

skills.name: Blind Bet
skills.description: At the start of the Phase or when summons are defeated, summons up to <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> "All or Nothing" or "All or Nothing: Double Fortune."
